name: Clara Palmore
text: I like Dr.George at Parkway East but I received an email and text to come to pick up my glasses and no one is in the business lights off door locked. So I checked they were supposed to be open for business today 2/13/20 so I phoned Trussville and they are open this is unprofessional to not have a business, open when the hours on the door, says you are to be open.

resp.text:
Clara,

We are very disappointed to hear about your recent encounter. At MyEyeDr, we are committed to prioritizing your care and being ready to assist you during our business hours. We are sorry that we have fallen short in serving you. We take patient feedback seriously, and we have attempted to reach you by phone to further investigate and address your concerns. Please reach out to us at myeyedr.com/patientrelations. We want to make this right and improve your experience. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and we hope to hear from you soon!

Kind Regards,
Patient Relations

name: Mary Angrisano Ladner
text: This is my first visit for myself here. However lady fall I brought my 7yr old son for his first eye exam because I was sure he needed glasses.  They were so awesome with him, reassuring and patient . He did not want the drops! Now I am finally back for myself and the same courteous staff is still here. Friendly and have great attention to detail.  I  appreciate when people take time to do things right,  so I have no issue with various questions about eye history. I  can go on and on about this gem it's the best place for vision care! No doubt. I was seen by Dr. Patton and I highly recommend her and her team. You wont be disappointed if you're looking for quality care.

resp.text: Hi Mary, Thank you for trusting us with you and your family's vision care needs. We are extremely excited to hear that you all are enjoying your very first visits. We strongly believe in a great first impression and personalize the experience with a friendly approach. We like to identify our patients' vision concerns and address them appropriately and immediately. We love this review. MyEyeDr. looks forward to serving you all for a lifetime. Take care!

name: Sara Chandler Amthor
text: What doctor's office tells you to leave and reschedule when you show up 10 minutes late? If I'd known I'd get turned away for my 6-month-old's eye appointment, I would have saved myself the trouble when I knew I wouldn't make it on time because of traffic. They should tell you that if you don't get there exactly on time that you might as well not show up at all. Warning to moms: don't drag your cranky kid to this place unless you can guarantee all things will go right on the way there. Thanks for helping me waste an hour of my life and patience. You've lost the business of my whole family.

resp.text:
Hi Sara,

We sincerely apologize for the delay in responding to your feedback.  I apologize for the experience you had at our Parkway East location, our goal is to make sure all of our patients needs are met timely and we strive for excellence there. I would love to discuss your visit with you and find a resolution. I left you a voicemail but please feel free to email us at myeyedr.com/patientrelations so we can discuss.
Your feedback is truly valued and we wanted to make sure we addressed your issue.

name: Tan Col
text: Dr. Patton is a gem 💎. Her staff is phenomenal. From the tech to the secretaries. GREAT!! Place to get eye wear.💖

resp.text: Hi, we are glad to learn of the service Dr. Patton and the team have provided you with. Here at MyEyeDr, we are dedicated to providing our valued patient's with the best quality of service possible, and we are thrilled to have reached this goal. Your feedback is greatly appreciated, and we will sure to share it with the entire staff. Thank you for being our valued patient. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Best regards.

name: Phillip Malachi King
text: Not coming back here just not the nice atmosphere it use to be & they don’t seem urgent to wait on you!

resp.text: Phillip, It's upsetting to hear your last visit with us wasn't so great. Our goal is to give our patients outstanding service in a courteous manner. Feedback like yours is key to providing better services at our offices.  If you could provide your contact information here myeyedr.com/patientrelations , we would be more than happy to address these concerns.

name: Jessica Burton
text: Everyone  I came in contact with was courteous and thorough. The doctor even discovered my cholesterol was high via my eye exam. I love my frames and haven’t seen this well in years.

resp.text: Jessica, thank you again for letting our team and doctor know how we did! We are so happy to hear that you were pleased with your recent visit to our location!  We look forward to helping again in the future. Take care!

name: Jasmine Clark
text: Rude doctors, rude optical assistant, they were not kid friendly and very unprofessional. My only pleasent experience was the receptionist and the guy who helped pick out our frames. Our appointment was at 1pm we were not seen until 2pm and we didn't see the doctor for another 30 minutes. We didn't get out of this place until 4pm. STAY AWAY spend your time and money where business is appreciated.

name: G Harper
text: Satisfied with service. Still awaiting my lens

name: G Harper
text: Satisfied with service. Still awaiting my lens

name: Rusty Newman
text: Traveling and found myself with a ripped contact - called and staff said I just needed to have my rx faxed. They called when they received the fax and fixed me up with a pair. Very helpful staff

name: Missy Fantusi
text: Crowded, but they have the eyeglass cleaner that I use.

name: S. R. Reynolds
text: I had three pairs of lenses made for frames I already owned. The expertise of Patty in fitting the lenses was excellent but the customer service and the mind-blowing rudeness of the manager and even Patty, at times, was shocking and insulting. I spent well over $600 on these lenses and did not do ANYTHING to earn such treatment. I did not compalin, even when lenses were scratched by them and I had to wait another two weeks. I WILL NEVER do business there again.

name: Erin England
text: The staff here is terrific!  The prices are reasonable and they do great work.

name: Pamela Ezell
text: Dr. Morgan is great! Highly recommend.

text: It is Good :|

name: Sunasia Mims
text: Love this location! Very tentative and professional staff. They also have a great selection of frames.

resp.text: Hi Sunasia, Thank you for your feedback and kind 5 star review. We are thrilled to hear that our office was able to provide such a positive experience for you. Our trusted community doctors and associates are committed to prioritizing your care and assisting with all of your vision needs. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Warm Regards, Patient Relations.

name: Shareka Jackson
text: My kids have been going to this location for years. We had an appointment today but they refused to see them because I didn't have their insurance card. Is this stuff not on file? Why wasn't I informed on the phone when the appointment was made. Receptionist acted like she didn't care. Then the next available appointment isn't until March. I called the hoover location and got and appointment for next week and they have their info on file. Aren't you all the same come? Only in the hood.

resp.text:
Shareka,

We are very disappointed to hear about your recent encounter. At MyEyeDr, we are committed to prioritizing your care, and we strive to provide the highest quality of service at every interaction. We are sorry that we did not live up to our promise. We take patient feedback seriously, and we attempted to reach you by phone this afternoon to further address your concerns. Please reach out to us at myeyedr.com/patientrelations. We want to make this right, and we are confident that we can improve your experience. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and we hope to hear from you soon!

Kind Regards,
Patient Relations

name: Felicia Rucker
text: Very professional staff. Wouldn’t go anywhere else.

resp.text:
Hello Felicia Rucker,

Thank you for the great review. At MyEyeDr our standard is professionalism. We are glad to hear you have chosen us as your vison provider. We look forward to seeing you again. Best Regards Patient Relations.

name: L. Davis
text: Wouldn't take my children anywhere else. The doctor is great and the have the best selection of frames for Medicaid patients. By far the best selection 👌.

resp.text: Hi LaDonna, MyEyeDr. greatly appreciates your review. We are very thankful to know that your children are receiving the proper care and beautiful glasses they deserve. That is what are Five Points West, AL office strives for. We look forward to seeing you all again, and bring a friend!

name: Octavia “1SlimGoddessDaMac69” Sellers
text: I've been a patient here since the 3rd grade. Never had an issue. Service Speed is moderate. It's best to have insurance though because their prices are high. And with certain insurances your choice of glasses is limited. But for basic eye care meaning 1 eye glass exam per year, 2 pairs of glasses per year, with insurance no cash payment is needed. Schaeffer's eye center is best fit for kids up to age 18 with insurance. Medicaid or Medicare are acceptable. Nice doctors and desk service. Very clean area.

name: Ne'Yoshia K
text: Dr Blue is absolutely amazing and kid friendly!!!

resp.text: Hello NeYoshia, Your feedback makes us feel proud that we're helping you live your best life with our professional eye care services!  We look forward to seeing you again at your next annual eye exam! Take care!

name: Anthony Sanders
text: Dr. Blue is very professional, thorough, and caring doctor.

name: Tyra Michelle
text: Great. They just need to learn to answer the phone

resp.text: Hi Tyra, Thank you for your valued feedback it is very appreciated, and we will use this as an opportunity to improve.  Your recommendation means so much to us and we're so happy to have earned it. Thank you again for taking the time to let the world know about your positive experience. Have a great day!

text: Traveling and found myself with a ripped contact - called and staff said I just needed to have my rx faxed. They called when they received the fax and fixed me up with a pair. Very helpful staff

name: Missy Fantusi
text: Crowded, but they have the eyeglass cleaner that I use.

name: S. R. Reynolds
text: I had three pairs of lenses made for frames I already owned. The expertise of Patty in fitting the lenses was excellent but the customer service and the mind-blowing rudeness of the manager and even Patty, at times, was shocking and insulting. I spent well over $600 on these lenses and did not do ANYTHING to earn such treatment. I did not compalin, even when lenses were scratched by them and I had to wait another two weeks. I WILL NEVER do business there again.

name: Erin England
text: The staff here is terrific!  The prices are reasonable and they do great work.

name: Pamela Ezell
text: Dr. Morgan is great! Highly recommend.

name: tammy holder
text: It is Good :|

name: Niki Pessoney
text: I went

name: Sunasia Mims
text: Love this location! Very tentative and professional staff. They also have a great selection of frames.

resp.text: Hi Sunasia, Thank you for your feedback and kind 5 star review. We are thrilled to hear that our office was able to provide such a positive experience for you. Our trusted community doctors and associates are committed to prioritizing your care and assisting with all of your vision needs. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Warm Regards, Patient Relations.

name: Shareka Jackson
text: My kids have been going to this location for years. We had an appointment today but they refused to see them because I didn't have their insurance card. Is this stuff not on file? Why wasn't I informed on the phone when the appointment was made. Receptionist acted like she didn't care. Then the next available appointment isn't until March. I called the hoover location and got and appointment for next week and they have their info on file. Aren't you all the same come? Only in the hood.

resp.text:
Shareka,

We are very disappointed to hear about your recent encounter. At MyEyeDr, we are committed to prioritizing your care, and we strive to provide the highest quality of service at every interaction. We are sorry that we did not live up to our promise. We take patient feedback seriously, and we attempted to reach you by phone this afternoon to further address your concerns. Please reach out to us at myeyedr.com/patientrelations. We want to make this right, and we are confident that we can improve your experience. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and we hope to hear from you soon!

Kind Regards,
Patient Relations

name: Felicia Rucker
text: Very professional staff. Wouldn’t go anywhere else.

resp.text:
Hello Felicia Rucker,

Thank you for the great review. At MyEyeDr our standard is professionalism. We are glad to hear you have chosen us as your vison provider. We look forward to seeing you again. Best Regards Patient Relations.

name: L. Davis
text: Wouldn't take my children anywhere else. The doctor is great and the have the best selection of frames for Medicaid patients. By far the best selection 👌.

resp.text: Hi LaDonna, MyEyeDr. greatly appreciates your review. We are very thankful to know that your children are receiving the proper care and beautiful glasses they deserve. That is what are Five Points West, AL office strives for. We look forward to seeing you all again, and bring a friend!

name: Octavia “1SlimGoddessDaMac69” Sellers
text: I've been a patient here since the 3rd grade. Never had an issue. Service Speed is moderate. It's best to have insurance though because their prices are high. And with certain insurances your choice of glasses is limited. But for basic eye care meaning 1 eye glass exam per year, 2 pairs of glasses per year, with insurance no cash payment is needed. Schaeffer's eye center is best fit for kids up to age 18 with insurance. Medicaid or Medicare are acceptable. Nice doctors and desk service. Very clean area.

name: Ne'Yoshia K
text: Dr Blue is absolutely amazing and kid friendly!!!

resp.text: Hello NeYoshia, Your feedback makes us feel proud that we're helping you live your best life with our professional eye care services!  We look forward to seeing you again at your next annual eye exam! Take care!

name: A. L.
text: I have never felt so unwelcome at a business.  I got a new Rx yesterday and stopped by to check out their frame selection.  They had a sign on the door with their phone number stating that only one person at a time was allowed inside.  I called and was told that they were finishing up with a customer and then I could come in, so I waited on the sidewalk.  The employee, Beth,  held the door for the other customer to leave but stopped me before I could go in to tell me that they would be closing soon.  I asked when and she said at noon.  I pulled out my phone and it was 11:41. She kept repeating that they would be closing soon, wanting to make sure I knew that I had to be out by then. After hearing this several times, I gave up and left having never stepped foot inside. I found another place in town that was way more friendly and welcoming.  Fortunately, it wasn't hard to do.

name: Janice Cagle
text: Very professional staff and Dr. Griggs is wonderful! I also selected eyeglasses with the help of a very friendly and knowledgeable employee. They took very good care of me!

name: Heather Wilson
text: Do not do not buy anything or make an appointment at Jody’s Optical. Rude and unprofessional. This was the worst experience ever.

name: Rebekka Sharpe
text:
SLOW.
Everyone is nice, but nothing gets done in a timely manner.They are fine if you are willing wait at least a week for an appointment and another week or longer to actually get your glasses. If you actually need glasses go somewhere else.

**Apparently they are capable of making some glasses within a day however they are not upfront with you if they don't have your lenses in stock and it may take a few days or a week so ask them before you pay, or even before you pick frames.

And no matter what if you get transitions lenses it will take a week. (Also something they should tell you upfront)

name: KELI SPARKS
text:
Understand Dr. Griggs is the attending Optometrist, as well as the new owner, 2018.  We've received comprehensive eye exams, eye care tips and advice in a professional manner, in a clean, well-lit office.

He has a nice selection of frames, and his staff will order lenses, contacts, and work with your glasses until they are comfortable.  The staff is always pleasant, helpful, kind, and professional.

They've reviewed our vision benefits with us.  Twice staff has  confirmed vision benefits via phone calls.  Not everyone does that.

Kudos to the staff for double-checking, and finding TWO lens issues on a pair of glasses made by A DIFFERENT company, not - not - made at Jody's Vision.  After having fuzzy vision issues with lenses from a different company, I had to have the right lens re-done, and then the left lens re-done.  Axis was off 10%, then 5%.  This issue is almost resolved.  I will definitely bring my glasses back to Jody's Vision to check my lenses the third time!

Thank you, staff, for all the help!

name: John Pierson
text: Dr. Griggs was very through and explained all that he was doing and his findings.  His staff was friendly and professional.  I'd recommend them to any one.

name: david reynolds
text: Absolutely love Dr. Griggs and his staff. So glad he purchased the practice. They do an excellent job making my glasses. Wouldn't trust nobody but him and his staff with my eyes.

name: Kimberley Scott
text: The staff and Dr. Griggs are all very welcoming and enjoyable to deal with. Dr. Griggs was intentional about explaining his thoughts on various questions I had. Great experience overall. I switched to them after seeing how they dealt with my son’s appt.

name: Deane Windlin
text: Everyone was very nice never had such a great experience getting an eye exam. I will be looking forward to next years exam.

name: Juliette Alex
text: Always get great service and care when getting exams! Associates are also always happy to help when choosing new frames and making me aware of the cost and approximate wait time before the order is ready. Will come here for years to come!

name: Monchel Baker
text: My visit was wonderful. Dr. Collins and her staff were kind, professional, thorough, and knowledgeable. Considering the pandemic we are in, all protocol was followed to keep everyone safe. The chairs and other equipment was wiped down between each patient. And every one wore safety mask. Overall the visit was pleasant I look forward to my next eye exam to come in the future.

name: Brooke Hairston
text:
Dr.  Jacquelyn is great!  This is my second time having an eye exam by her.    She is punctual, answers all your questions and kind.
I have my husband going to see her as well for his exams.  I would recommend her to anyone.

name: Doretha Goggans
text: Dr. Collins was absolutely wonderful! She was personable, thorough, and didn't hesitate to explain things and address my particular concerns. Overall great experience. Will definitely be back.

name: MaryJo Marotta
text: I think it felt like a thorough exam. I will continue with Dr. Collins  with my eye exams in the future.

name: Marius Dockery
text: Excellent experience!  Being retired military, this was my first time ever having an exam by a private doctor.  Experience was great!

name: Daniel Weldon
text: Efficient and convenient. Appointment started when  it was supposed to, Dr. Collins is always welcoming and makes you feel like you are her only concern when you are there. Ease of scheduling an appointment on line was great, was able to have eye appointment and order new glasses at the attached Lenscrafters without wasting all day or spending a fortune!

name: Chastity Alexander
text: Dr. Collin's was incredibly helpful and a complete joy. She really cares about your eye health! Thank you for being so thorough.

name: Natina Clark
text: Dr. Collins was amazing 👏 👏.. It was very clean and she sanitized everything before I used it. She explained everything going on with my eyes throughly and made sure I had the best experience. Id recommend her to anyone.  Can't wait til my glasses come in! 😁😁

name: Abbe S
text: Dr. Collins and the entire staff were lovely. This was my first visit to see her. She was very thorough and explained everything as she went through the exam. I will definitely continue seeing her as my optometrist.

name: Jennifer VH
text: Love Dr J!! Recommend her all the time to friends and family

name: Pamela Hastings
text: I made an appointment online. It was the last available and needed my son to see an eye doctor quickly as he is home from college for a very short time and his glasses broke. This was the only place in an 80 mile radius that had availability on a Saturday. We drove over an hour to make his appointment on time only to be told it had been cancelled. No message, phone call, voicemail or email was made or sent. I even checked for an email or voice-mail before we left to make the hour plus drive. NOTHING! Just the confirmation email for his appointment. All they would have needed to do was send me a message and cancel but they couldn't even do that. Very disrespect and inconsiderate of other peoples time.

name: Scott Dennis
text: Office is well run.   Very little waiting ( very appreciated).    Dr. Collins appears very knowledgeable and explained things to me that had not explained during all my previous eye exams.  Plenty of parking, check in and billing was smooth and efficient.

name: Best Lee Sin NA
text: Dr Collins is always a huge help. She is patient, explains everything, and makes you feel welcome in her office. The staff are incredibly helpful too. Janet spent more than enough time explaining different types of lenses and coatings to me as well as how my lenses will turn out based on my specific prescription. Although I didn't learn everyone's name while I was there, the rest of the staff were courteous and thorough as well. I was happy with my choice of frames and lenses after the staff assisted me in picking ones that would hold my lenses properly. I have never had as good an experience going to the optometrist and optician. They will certainly be getting all my future business.

name: Leah Packard
text: 3 of my family members have used Dr. Collins and we all had great experiences.

name: Sam Chance III
text: Dr. Collins was the best eye doctor that I have seen in years. She was professional and knowledgeable. Would recommend her a hundred times over.

name: Fragrance Patton
text: I love coming to her she makes me feel so comfortable!  I love it

name: Debby Bonds- Pierce
text: I always enjoy my yearly cost,

name: Alicia Jackson
text: Dr. Collins was very thorough and pleasant. This was my 2nd year eye exam and both visits have been awesome!!

name: Yvonne Johnson
text: This was one of the BEST eye exams I have ever had. The staff is professional and friendly. Dr. Collins is very gentle and knowledgeable. She knew exactly how to accommodate me with my request for contacts while factoring in my eye condition. They were comfortable and they worked unlike previous attempts made prior to me making her my doctor. She came highly recommend to me and I can definitely say in good faith that I endorse that!!!! I DEFINITELY recommend her too!

text: Service is outstanding and Dr Collins is always friendly and professional. Best customer service ever. Keep up the awesome service. Thanks again for all y’all are doing to keep customers safe.

She made me laugh and made sure that I was comfortable she explained everything very well and I left with a doctor I will tell everyone about

text: Everyone was very friendly and nice. The Dr. and staff went over each step of the eye exam and why it was necessary. All my questions were answered. I left feeling very good about my eye exam.

name: Justin Boger
text: The staff was very informative and polite throughout the whole process. The exam was very detailed compared to the usual going to the local mom and pop eyeglass doctor. Well worth the extra time for travel and appointment!

name: Sarah Bang
text: This LensCrafters location is FANTASTIC. I had the absolute best experience with Dr. Collins, and with the associates I worked with (Robin and Pat). These women are living proof that you can be incredibly professional but also warm, personable, and trustworthy. Glasses are a big decision! Not just medically, they are going to part of your face, and how you are presented to the world. For everything from helping me pick out frames to paperwork to the eye exam itself, Dr. Collins has assembled a wonderful team. Thank you so very, very much!

text: Dr. Collins and her staff are very kind, personable, and thoughtful. I was asked more than once if I had any questions during my exam of which I did.  All of them were answered and I felt in good hands.  It was especially pleasant to talk with people who seemed happy to take care of me. I recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the compliment.  My staff and I greatly appreciate it.

text: Wonderful staff! Joshua Farmer was a fabulous help.

name: Jacob Duffy
text: Auburn Eye Care was amazing to work with! I was a bit worried since I do not have eye insurance but they are priced reasonably well compared to other eye doctors I have used in the past. Furthermore, when I called, I was able to get an appointment the next day which was nice. All the staff are good to work with and have a friendly aura around them. As long as I am a student here in auburn, I will absolutely use Auburn Eye Care and recommend anyone else in the auburn area as well!

name: Charlie Barton
text:
The doctor was awesome and always has been. Very attentive and seems to really care about your issues and concerns.
The young lady at the front not so nice and not very knowledgeable of the prices of the frames out front.
Each time you asked a question she couldn't answer she went back to ask she was still in your line of sight she would make unnecessary comments and her body language towards us was very unprofessional.
My insurance only allows 150.00 towards new frames and we asked where are the ones in that price range and she told us good luck finding them in that price.
Ended up leaving without ordering new glasses all together.
Sad to say probably won't be back and that's very unfortunate because the doctor and everyone else we interacted with was great.

name: Margaret Long
text: All the staff was so friendly. No complaints no regrets.

name: Holly Surrency
text: I'm so excited about my new contacts and glasses and Dr. Daniels was amazing! I've already definitely recommended to my friends!

name: gary loper
text: Need a good eye exam ? This is the place to go . Best eye glasses and best prices around this part of Alabama/ Georgia. One stop does it all.

name: becky mcpherson
text: My 92 year old mother had an eye infection and suffers with memory issues but needed to be seen. They could not have been more compassionate, thoughtful and helpful. The staff is amazing and we were seen by Lisa Daniel OD. She was so gentle and understanding and did what she could to evaluate her condition. I was impressed from the minute we walked in the door. Grateful for the care we received.

name: Carrie Prater
text: Super Friendly  and Helpful Staff 💜

name: Neal Niswender
text:
Overall a bad experience with shady actions. Went for a eye exam and was told I needed to try progressive lens. The lady who assisted me with my glasses said don't worry you have 30 days to try them. I tried them for 3 weeks but was not happy. I tried to take back the eyeglasses but was then told they do not do refunds I could only replace the lens with single vision, this was shady issue #1. Then when I went back to get my eyeglasses after the lens had been changed I asked for a refund for the difference since the single vision lens are half the cost. I was told they do not refund the difference even though they are cheaper, shady issue #2.

Please go somewhere else, save the headache. I should have been patient and waited the 2 months till my normal optometrist could get me in.

name: Jessica Peterson
text: They were very professional, and considerate. We're able to fit me in the next day after I called and gave me my glasses within an hour of buying them!!!

name: Laray Kelly
text: It was a pleasure to be seen by all the people at Auburn Eye Care. They were courteous, patient, and very professional in all areas of their expertise.

name: Domosaur Sid
text:
“we had to order specialty trial lenses for you due to your unusual medical condition which you are aware of.”

Breaking hipaa I see. Was gonna come here, but not gonna risk having my business put out there for the public to see :/

name: Alec Avery
text: This place is terrible and does not care about its customers. Long story short, I was fitted for contacts and was given a sample pair to hold me over until my contacts came in. 2 weeks went by and I called seeing if the contacts had arrived. The lady who answered told me she would check and call me back - never did. I called back a week later to see about the contacts again and THE EXACT SAME THING HAPPENED. I then waited another week (at this point it has been a month that I’ve been using a pair of sample contacts) and called back again to check on the contacts.... she tried to dodge me again and this time I put my foot down and demanded to speak to who was in charge. She put me on the phone with a man named brad who profusely apologized to me and assured me the contacts would be in by the following Tuesday - they we not and did not arrive until Thursday. Brad then calls me and tells me that I need to schedule an appointment to get fitted for these new contacts. This made no sense to me bc I had already been fitted for the contacts?! I then show up to pick up the contacts and they will not give them to me. At this point you have to realize that I am very mad because of how they have treated me. Brad writes me a check to refund my money and does not give me the contacts. Brad clearly has no medical knowledge because he could barley articulate a logical sentence explaining why he would not give me the contacts. Please do not go here

resp.text: We apologize that we were unable to please you, but you do not receive the product and a refund too.

name: Laura M.
text: Excellent!  Auburn Eye Care provides great care, attention to detail and goes above and beyond.  A few years ago,  I purchased glasses from a discount glasses location and found that I kept going back to my old glasses from Auburn Eye due to the superior quality of the lenses.  Recently,  I used an old frame, previously purchased from them and replaced the lenses.  Soon afterward, one of the temple pieces broke.  Auburn Eye worked with me to resolve the issue by my purchasing new glasses at a great discount.  I also prefer to support local businesses and not big chains.  Auburn Eye is more expensive than the discount stores, but after using them for over 15 years, I will not go anywhere else.

resp.text: Local businesses appreciate your patronage. We will always try to resolve any issues you have with your glasses.

text:
When I needed an eye doctor in Auburn, I wanted to first try someone local. Dr. Cowan had few reviews on Google but still had the best rating. I tried him first, and definitely will be going back when I need eye care.
Staff is nice and professional. Dr. Cowan gives much effort to make sure you have everything you need to have great eyesight.

If you need glasses, contacts, or a very thorough eye exam (where every detail is explained to you and plenty of time is given to ask questions and have them answered), this is the place for you!

name: AL Long
text:
Unprofessional and rude.
It took 2 hours just for a consultation! I arrived 15 minutes before my appointment with my paperwork already filled out. I waited in a small waiting room with no space between  chairs. When I was finally taken back I had to wait again because none of my info had been entered from the paperwork I brought when I arrived early. This took a while, but when completed, a different tech took me to a different section to check my eyes. She was rude and acted as though I was an inconvenience to her. I finally asked at one point how much longer it would be before I saw the Dr since I had to go back to work. She said it wouldn't be long and she would check on me in 5 minutes after she sent me back to the bright and packed waiting room with no eye protection after dilating my eyes.  About 30 minutes passed and she finally takes me back to another room. I ask again how long it will be because I HAVE to go back to work. She didn't like that but told me he would be in soon. He finally comes in the room and is in there less than 5 minutes to tell me I'm a candidate for lasik. I was also told that I would have to travel to their Columbus office for the surgery because the operating room there wasn't finished.
My wait was never acknowledged so of course I never received an apology for the 2 hours it took for a simple consultation. And the whole time I was waiting, the Dr was walking back and forth through the lobby as though he had nothing else to do.
Not impressed.

name: alfonzo murray
text:
Hororable appointment,no social distancing,more than one person in very small test rooms.
When I saw doctor he didn’t have mask on and tried too diagnose my condition.
I told him I was uncomfortable with him not wearing mask he had an off the wall excuse for not wearing one.
I asked if it was protocol for not wearing mask I got no answer.
So ended my appointment then and walked out the door..

name: Michael Minor
text: Used this business for 4 years & my fiance broke her glasses recently so I sent her over. Complete disaster of a visit....Was there for a simple eye exam & glasses. The Surgeon pushed Lasik & even made her an appointment for Lasik @ the Columbus location. Not what she was there for at all. The concern for patients is more or less a concern for Money. Lost her business as well as mine today. Couldn't even provide her with disposable protective sunglasses after dilating her eyes before they got her out the door...I MEAN COME ON.

It saddens me to give this place one star after my first visit being so great and staff was so nice and helpful.
I called back after initial visit to get prescription and pupil distance for my safety glasses to be ordered at my job. They first told me they did not do pupil distance! Then when my safety director at my job called they were so rude to her and refused to disclose the info over the phone! They made me drive to the location at get the info. Once I arrived they rushed me out and would not even give me the proper info I was asking for and not to mention entire staff was rude while I stood there waiting to be helped it was a very hostile environment! I don’t use this word a lot but I absolutely hate this place for how I was treated!

name: Mark Dale
text:
Had a nice experience getting my prescription yet a horrible experience after I received my glasses.
I went in March 2017 to get glasses. They broke 3 months later. I had purchased the insurance to cover breakage so I thought no issue, they will cover it. Yes they would repair them with a $100 deductible!!!!
“What deductible?” I said. “You never told me if a deductible or I would have not purchased it!” Then they asked how I took off my glasses and said I should have taken them off by the nose piece! “What??!!” “You never told me this!”
I walked out after asking for a manager, oops there was not one that day all day, go figure.
I spread the word every day when people ask why I use two pairs of glasses of what bad service I had by this store.
Ridiculous bad customer service and snotty attitude when you need help.
Reminds me of a used car salesman.
DO NIT VISIT THIS STORE!

resp.text: Hi Mark, thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear about your experience. We aim to consistently meet and surpass customers' expectations. Please go tohttp://bit.ly/2Di26GQ so we can follow up with you directly.

name: Briana Bradford
text: Teresa was Absolutely Wonderful at adjusting my glasses.  Very kind & courteous, and took her time to get my glasses adjusted correctly.

resp.text: Hi Briana! Thank you for your review. We are excited to hear Teresa was able to help make your experience at LensCrafters a great one. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Heather Morgan
text: My experience there was horrible! I would not recommend then to any one. The doctor group is horrible .

resp.text: Hi Heather, thank you for your review. We value your feedback as it helps us improve our service. Please go to bit.ly/LC-Support so we can follow up with you directly to learn more and have your issue resolved.

name: Tamra Higginbotham
text: Worst customer service ever.

resp.text: Hi there, thank you for your review. We are disappointed to hear about your experience. We strive to provide the best glasses and customer service in the industry.  Please go to https://www.luxotticacustomercare.com/lenscrafters so we can resolve this issue.

name: Petit J
text: Used Lenscrafters for years, but it is not the same anymore.  Multiple problems and customer service deteriorated significantly.  I finally have given up on them after submitting multiple complaints.  Went to a competitor today to order new glasses and what a difference.  It turned out that the last pair of glasses purchased from Lenscrafters  (ones I have been currently wearing) were too small and that is why they have been giving me headaches and digging into my skull.  Customer service at the competitor is five stars and very reasonably priced.  Goodbye and good riddance Lenscrafters.

name: Patrick Fikes
text: I was assisted by Meloney and she was amazing with helping a first time eye wear person feel comfortable.

name: Ethel Wilmer
text: I used to love this location now when you come in they don't even greet you...its a shame!!!

resp.text: Hi Ethel, thank you for your review. We value your feedback as it helps us improve our service. Please go to bit.ly/LC-LUX so we can follow up with you directly to learn more and have any outstanding issue resolved.

name: Johnny Kilgore
text: Bought an expensive Brooks Brothers glasses in May 2016 from Lens Crafters. I've traded with them for years. Went by their store in Trussville, AL today (Feb. 2017) because of loose frames, and they said to be repaired I had to have new glasses (lens & fames).  I cannot fork out another $700 when my lenses are perfectly fine.  I just need the frame fixed.  This doesn't make any sense.  I don't think they know what they are doing. I would not be trading with them again after purchasing a multiple number of glasses over a 25 year period.

name: M Phil
text: After just a few months, my lenses were scratched.  I bought my glasses with federal insurance that included a warranty.  Lenscrafters told me since i didn't purchase an additional warranty the only thing i could do was buy new lenses at full cost.  Glasses bought at different vendors lasted much longer than the four months at Lenscrafters.  I will not use Lenscrafters again. Every step of the process was a struggle.

name: Joan C.
text:
TRUSSVILLE LOCATION - VERY POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE

Lenscrafters has a great warranty - however, be prepared to have to use it with repeat trips at this location.  Also be prepared to be treated like you are a PROBLEM.  When the real problem is that the staff at this location is not skilled.

Other locations in Birmingham area are courteous and willing to correct mistakes  made by the staff at Trussville.

name: Treci Heard
text: The staff here is excellent. !! Well skilled and very professional ! . I've been purchasing here for 4 years now And I will always return .

name: Frank Pearson
text: Great experience, everyone treated me wonderfully. Oh and they fixed my grasses

name: Sydney Jemison
text: Very nice staff, and they are very knowledgeable with their product!! Also got my glasses when they were promised!!

name: Bruce Vining
text: Attentive staff, very friendly ...

resp.text: Great to know! We appreciate your review and hope to see you again!

name: Micah Martin
text: Excellent customer service

resp.text: Hi Micah! Thank you for your positive feedback! We look forward to serving you again!

name: J. Bobbs
text: N/a

name: Linda Paajanen
text: I can not say enough good things about Dr. Foster and his team.  I had the cataract surgery on both eyes.  My eyesight has been really really bad my whole life. It's like a miracle that I can see without glasses or contacts.  I can now see how to walk in the morning when I wake. Dr Foster is the best.  I recommend him to everyone who needs eye care.  Thank you again Dr. Foster.

name: Dennis Bulgatz
text: I am a "young" cataract patient at 55, when the average age is 75.  I was pretty nervous about the procedure, though I clearly needed it.  Dr. Stephens was an awesome surgeon, and my result was a pain-free, 20/20, with little fuss.  The office runs like a factory, which can be a little off-putting, but is very efficient, and everyone was very nice- you just do not get a lot of time with your doctor.  I commend the office and Dr. Stephens for running a great practice.

name: JP Tribble
text: If you have a problem, let them know, and the practice manager, Tammy, should be able to help.

resp.text: Hello, it is always difficult to hear about a bad experience in our office as we are committed to providing our patients with the best possible care. We take these reviews and patient feedback seriously. Due to HIPAA regulations, we can’t discuss the specifics about your comments online, but if you call our office at 256-705-3937 we will be happy to address any concerns.

name: Kayla Eckhardt
text: This place is amazing & they are so sweet & well respected & caring for their patients. Doctor Calderwood has done amazing work with my eyes. She has changed my life & gave me more confidence in myself. My EYES are perfect 👌

name: Byron Brown
text: I really like the Doctors in this practice.  They are very thorough and explain what is necessary to  know.  I feel the Doctors especially Dr. Frederick.  However, the front office staff are the cockiest, curt, and far from friendly as any doctor's office in Huntsville.  Makes me want to find a new Doctor just because of the rude office staff.

resp.text: Hello, it is always difficult to hear about a bad experience in our office as we are committed to providing our patients with the best possible care. We take these reviews and patient feedback seriously. Due to HIPAA regulations, we can’t discuss the specifics about your comments online, but if you call our office at 256-705-3937 we will be happy to address any concerns.

name: Kelly
text: My teenage son & I are both new patients here after having been patients at another practice in Huntsville. We changed to this practice because of negative experiences with contact fittings & education for my son and incorrect glasses for myself at the previous place. We truly love this office and the staff who have helped us. Denise Baldwin, COA, Contact Lens Specialist, in this office was incredible with my teenager! He has never had contacts before and she was very patient and kind with teaching him how to wear and take care of contacts. Our previous office was not so at all. We have had to wait a bit once or twice but not for too terribly long. (Most medical offices in Huntsville have a bit of a wait anyway because we're in need of more physicians.) But our brief wait here was definitely worth it due to the excellent care we received. The physician was quick & efficient, answered all of our questions, and wasted none of our time once we got to him. The front desk staff, although super busy and quite overwhelmed with taking temps and addressing non mask-wearing patients, stayed professional and kind and so did the employee at the checkout desk. We will absolutely continue to be patients here. As a nurse myself I am very particular about my family's and my medical office experiences so if I give a place a 5 star I really mean it.

name: Lynn Sparks
text: Dr. Hubickey's staff were so friendly and professional especially during these difficult times.  All were knowledgeable and could answer any question.  The thoroughness taken to determine which procedure was best for me was extensive and my appreciation for going above and beyond to help me make my decision for what was best for me.  Everything explained before, during and after the procedure was spot on so I knew what to expect.  I'm so thankful that I can see without the aid of glasses or contacts.  I just wish I had done it sooner.  Thanks Dr. Hubickey and Staff!!!!!!!

name: Lori Hall
text: Fantastic service from everyone I have ever encountered here. I’ve had cataract surgery by Dr. Derivaux and Lasek by Dr. Hubickey. I couldn’t see 1 foot in front of my face beforehand, and now after both surgeries, I do not need glasses for my near-sightedness. It has been a life-changing experience; hard to put into words. I would recommend both doctors 100%. My son recently had Dr. Hubickey perform his Lasek surgery as well, and my son is nothing short of amazed as well. Phenomenal, professional place.

name: Mary Moore
text: No stars people and staff hateful did not have time for me had to go back twice glasses still not right and after all of that they losted my co pay and telling me I need to pay the co pay again no way and the optical center made my glasses worng there mistake and I had to pay more money to fix them will never never never go back 😔

resp.text: Hello, it is always difficult to hear about a bad experience in our office as we are committed to providing our patients with the best possible care. Due to HIPAA regulations, we can’t discuss the specifics about your comments online, but if you call our office at 256-705-3937 we will be happy to address any concerns.

name: Scott Moss
text: The Doctors are great, the running of the office is a one star. Wife had to wait about an hour and 10 minutes past her appointment time. A person an HOUR late for their appointment was put ahead of her. Don't bother with contacts here, they are ridiculous. I would only recommend this place for eye emergencies or medical issues of the eye. Not any kind of eyeglasses or contacts. Going here though makes me feeling young and in great health.

name: Pamela Whitman
text: I am so glad I discovered The Eye Center!  I had been going to Birmingham to see an ophthalmologist for several years that I had been referred to by a now defunct optometrist office. That ophthalmologist just was bilking my Blue Cross and Blue Shield and my vision insurance.  I made an appointment with The Eye Center and was quickly seen by Dr. Frederick who scheduled back to back cataract surgeries and now I only need readers for reading small print.  After all my years of wearing glasses I love being able to just wear  regular sunglasses and OTC readers when I need them!

name: Michele Comisky
text: Great practice!  Very organized and friendly. Dr. Hubicky is a very skilled surgeon. He does an excellent Lasik procedure and I highly recommend.

name: Derek Huff
text: The staff is super friendly and thorough.  Dr. Foster is very knowledgeable and attentive.  They take great care of my eyes and have my glaucoma under control.  Would definitely recommend to anyone needing professional and courteous care.

name: Paula Kraft
text: Before I started working for The Eye Center my daughter was a patient of Dr. Malone since she was about 13 months now she is 13. Have always been professional and answered any concerns I may have had. When she needed to get in the staff was quick to set us up a appointment.Now that I have started working for TEC everyone has been welcoming and so friendly. They care about their patients and the staff. All of the Dr's are friendly and professional so you can't make a wrong choice when deciding who you want to see for your eye care.

name: Kristie Smith
text: My son was denied medical care due to him having a both a newborn sibling and a toddler sibling in which the office will not allow to come in due to the “coronavirus”.  I explained to them that we don’t not have any family that are able to keep the siblings while we attend the appointment.  I was told my son would not be allowed to come if the siblings came.  If masks work and we all live in the same household then what is the problem?  No child should be denied medical care under any circumstance.

resp.text: Hello, it is always difficult to hear about a bad experience in our office as we are committed to providing our patients with the best possible care. name: Ben Bowden
text: I’ve been going here for years. Glasses, contacts and most recently Lasek surgery. I’ve always had a great experience. Dr. Hubickey is fantastic!

name: Justin Nicholson
text: The Eye Center has amazing doctors and staff. Very thorough exams and everyone I encountered was kind and knowledgeable. Would definitely recommend this office for any of your eye care needs.

name: Thomas Benn
text: I was very pleased with the care that I received from the staff and physicians at They Eye Center. The outcome resulting from the treatment plan has been spectacular! I also appreciate the attention given to safety and prevention during the pandemic.

name: Ashley Michelle
text: I had LASEK back in January and it was the best money I have ever spent. I was "a little difficult" and had only a couple of days to get the procedure done due to work, but Dr. Hubickey and his staff (April to name one) were so awesome and did the surgery a couple days after my evaluation.  When I say it was painless, it was!! I had a good recovery too. I also had to call April late one night for eye drops and she did not seem annoyed about the hour that the phone call came in. I never waited more than 15 minutes in the waiting room so I can not agree with the other comments. If you are thinking about getting Lasik, PRK, LASEK, or any other eye procedure done, I highly recommend them!

name: John Bearden
text:
Regarding Dr Hubicky, scroll down. he is an awesome doctor. We did have a little episode regarding my time sitting too long in the waiting room. .. I left. The next morning, a very sweet lady, Tammy Cantrell called, apologized, and explained that a storm had caused a server to go down resulting in equipment not working. By the way: I am very happy with my vision.
Dr. Hubickey was an instrument in the hand of The Lord that changed my life. 1. I had a reoccurring corneal erosion for 2 years.. that was painful and basically killing me because I couldn't sleep. 2. I was near sighted in both eyes. about -3.0 in contact lenses.
Dr. Hubickey did PRK on both eyes. I no longer have corneal erosion and I see really well.
In addition, April, Katelyn, and others were very professional and helpful. The only regret is that I waited so long to do it.

So proud of my eyes y'all did such a great job so professional ,friendly an loving couldn't ask for a better place to go .5 stars is not enough in my book it's a 10 thanks again for all of yall may God bless this medical team

name: RENIKA MOBLEY
text: This place has the best staff they took great care of my dad when he had his eye surgery and with making sure we knew how to do his aftercare

name: Carita Jones
text: The Eye Center has excellent staff they are polite,  caring,  and knowledgeable. The doctors are experienced in the all aspects of the eyes from diseases that can affect your vision and truly want to help their patients have the best vision possible

name: Steven Shaneyfelt
text: Overall the care is extremely thorough. They have the ability to take care of all of my eye care needs and strive to give the best care possible.

name: April Towry
text: I love this place. It’s completely worth being dilated for! From pediatrics to eye diseases to LASIK, they will go above and beyond to take care of your eyes! Everyone is so friendly, it is a GREAT experience! Can’t wait for my next eye exam🖤

name: Caroline Hoover
text: The Eye Center is absolutely the best place in North Alabama for eye care.  The doctors are ALL wonderful at what they do and they treat every patient with kindness and compassion and give each of them a thorough examination and give them as much time as they need.  The technicians are all so kind and respectful to their patients, as well as proficient and knowledgeable at their jobs.  I recommend The Eye Center to anyone who is having any kind of problem with their eyes or their vision.

name: Karen Duke
text: The welcoming lobby with friendly employees is a good start and gets better. The tech/nurses are very efficient and Dr Stevens is terrific, ready to answer all questions. Excellent experience with only a short wait!

name: Jessica Lastname
text: The staff was friendly and nice. I hardly had to wait for my contact or eye exam. Since I went during Covid, everyone had masks on (staff and patients).

name: Kara Woosley
text: There are not enough wonderful things I could say about Dr.Hubickey and his staff! They were all so educated,  patient, knowledgable and helpful for every question I had and every part of my consultation and also surgery ! I would highly reccomend him to anyone considering Lasik eye surgery with no hesitation!

name: Linda Haybarker
text: The Eye Center is amazing! This great group of doctors and staff really care about their patients and provide excellent care for your eyes. I have had appointments with several of the doctors and each appointment was thorough and all my questions were answered.

name: cassandra broadway
text: All of the doctors here are the best. They treat their patients with the best care and treatment possible. Considering how busy they are, the staff is quick and very efficient. I highly recommend any and all of the doctors here.

name: Tonio Koger
text: The family environment here is beyond amazing...to be employed by those that truly care is such a blessing!!

name: Shaina Deal
text: The Eye Center is a wonderful place for any eye care needs, these doctors have a fantastic reputation throughout North Alabama and it is well deserved. They are compassionate and thoughtful and the staff is all very polite and kind! I wouldn't hesitate to refer anyone to The Eye Center, my whole family goes there!

name: Linsey Woods
text: Alex was wonderful and timely. The exam seems to be extensive which is good. The only downfall for pediatrics is the extensive wait periods and going in and out of the waiting room multiple times, up and downstairs for different testing then being put at the back of the line again once arriving back from testing.  Children do not tolerate excessive wait times very well. Outside of that part seeming very unorganized, it seems to be a thorough exam. Just be prepared to be there for several plus hours would be advice I wished someone had informed me of.

name: Lelah Patterson
text: Such a positive environment from all the staff! The doctors are knowledgeable, thorough and always willing to answer any questions. The Eye Center sets a high standard for patient care!

name: Meagan Brisendine
text: The doctors are nice and personable! The staff through out the entire office are sweet and will help you in any way they can! I recommend The Eye Center to anyone that is having any kind of vision problems!

name: Laurie Guido
text: The Doctors at The Eye Center are the best!  So much experience and expertise in one practice.  I highly recommend The Eye Center physicians, the Optical Shop and Contact Lens Department

name: Bridget Cleghorn
text: Very friendly staff and great doctors. I didn’t feel rushed and all of my concerns were addressed!

name: Amber Jones
text: The Eye Center is an amazing practice.  From the moment you call to make the appointment, thru the entire appointment with the staff and Physicians, and then to check out, It is a wonderful experience. Everyone is nice and very knowledgeable.

name: Abby Cantrell
text: I recently had the most comprehensive eye exam by Dr. Foster! One of the things that impressed me most about the Eye Center was how kind the people were and I feel like I was in really great hands during my entire visit!

name: Genie Padilla
text: The staff is amazing and the doctors are wonderful. Everyone is so friendly, thorough, and they really care about your concerns. I definitely recommend them for all of your eye care needs.

name: Blair Cain
text: Fantastic doctors and staff that provide excellent care. I would recommend The Eye Center to all friends and family for their eye care!

name: Kaitlyn Blansit
text: Highly recommend this office. Everyone is so nice to work with. Love the staff! 💕

name: HZtricks 101
text: I had a great experience at the Eye Center.  The staff is very friendly, efficient and knowledgeable. They doctor was very experienced and I got a very thorough exam.

name: Caytlin Hopf
text: The doctors here are very thorough. I feel very confident in knowing that the health of my eyes are in good hands when I am there for my appointments. The staff is knowledgeable and kind as well. I had LASEK done and had an amazing outcome. Would definitely recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: Haley Thompson
text: I am 100% pleased with my experience with Dr. Hubickey and his staff at The Eye Center! They were all very kind and helpful in educating me throughout the LASIK process. I am so glad I chose this group of people to perform my procedure and I highly recommend them to anyone seeking out this surgery!

name: Ashleigh Hatfield
text: The Eye Center has the best doctors in North Alabama for all your eye care needs. They, as well as their staff,  truly care about each one of their patients!

name: Kate Cagle
text: The doctors at The Eye Center are the best! I had LASEK 7 years ago by Dr. Hubickey. It was a great experience! My vision is still 20/20.

name: Lisa Romano
text: The EYE CENTER has the best Ophthalmologist in North Alabama, we have all specialties under one roof!!!!! Cornea,Glaucoma,Pediatrics and the 4th floor has retinal specialist. Employees are well trained with the knowledge to help you feel comfortable about your exam. All the physicians are great to work with and treat their patients with compassion and kindness and give the best care and treatment possible. I am proud to be a part of such a great group. Dr.Hubickey is a amazing Lasik surgeon!!!

name: Kevin Rebman
text: Helpful staff. Update after several months...... My vision is still perfect thanks to the appreciative doctors and staff.

name: Meagan Rodriguez
text: I got here 10 min early and no here we are 2 hours past my appt time and we still havent been seen. This is very unprofessional and rude. They arent busy we are the only ones here.

resp.text: Meagan- it is always difficult to hear about a bad experience in our office as we are committed to providing our patients with the best possible care. Due to HIPAA regulations, we can’t discuss the specifics about your comments online, but if you call our office at 256-705-3937 we will be happy to address any concerns.

name: Amanda Drewnowski
text: Dr. Hubickey is a wonderful physician!  He did my LASEK surgery and I recommend anyone I know who is interested in the procedure to have it their surgery with him.  He and his staff are great and extremely knowledgeable!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words!

name: Jackie Earhart
text: I love the eye center. The staff are wonderful and the doctors are top notch!

name: Lonzo Robinson
text: I went to the Madison Office yesterday.  The staff was both friendly and professional.  I went early so there was no wait.  And Dr. Frederick was organized, methodical, and efficient.  He explained the issues and made suggestions to solutions.  Highly recommend.

resp.text: Lonzo, thank you for the 5 star review and kind words! We greatly appreciate you taking the time to leave a response.

name: Don Coplen
text:
I've been going to Dr.Stevens for several years for my glaucoma. The doctor is brilliant! Very professional. It's hard to imagine that I could ever find a better person to manage my vision issues. If I ever do have to find a new glaucoma specialist, I pity that person, because he/she will have some difficult shoes to fill.

As to some reviews complaining about waits. The waiting time varies, depending on the time of day and the patient load for the day. I have never felt rushed by Dr.Stevens, and that's more important to me than shorter waits in the reception area if those are my two choices. I try to schedule early as possible, which normally results in the shortest waits. This is often true of ANY doctor appointment.

resp.text: Don, thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review! We appreciate your positive feedback!

name: Lindsay Healy
text: I had LASEK surgery with Dr. Hubickey several years ago and it was the best decision ever. I was very nearsighted and my poor vision is a distant memory! Dr. Hubickey is a very thorough physician and takes his time to make sure all the testing meets his high standards. Staff is great too!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: Audrey Johnston
text: Most thorough eye exam I have ever experienced. Staff was professional, but still compassionate & caring.  I felt as if I could not have been in better hands or have gotten better care. I am an "old" ER RN, I trust Dr. Calderwood & her Staff completely.

resp.text: Hi Audrey - Thank you for your feedback!

name: wes cash
text: Great staff and Dr. Hubickey is a fantastic Dr.  I had LASEK done a couple years ago and it was the best decision I ever made.  I still see great, and am so happy with the procedure.   I recommend Dr. Hubickey and the Eye Center to everyone I know who needs vision correction!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words!

name: Nick Berry
text: Dr. Stephen's and april towry really brightened my day! Wouldn't let anybody else touch my eyes.

name: Donna Patterson
text: The staff is very very unfriendly. No smiles. No hellos. No how is your day after surgery. NOTHING. you're a piece of paper and eyes and that's it.  Been multiple times and never a smile all frowns.😒

resp.text: Hi Donna - We appreciate you coming back and visiting us and are so sorry to hear about your experience. At The Eye Center we want you to feel like family and we apologize for you feeling anything other than that! Thank you for your feedback.

name: Elizabeth Broadway
text: The staff is so friendly and helpful. The doctors are professional and thorough when giving exams and listen to you when you have concerns.

name: Heather Phillips
text: I've been here three times with my young children. There is always a very, very long wait. They schedule multiple appointments per appointment time. Today I waited 40 minutes in the front lobby and walked out because I was tired of waiting. Waiting is hard for little kids and babies and my time is valuable. I will not be back.

resp.text: Hi Heather - I am sorry to hear about your experience with us. We are constantly working on providing the highest quality of service and appreciate your feedback.

name: Dan Chitwood
text:
They may do a good job, but after waiting an hour after my appointment time, I will never know. There was no communication from the front office staff that they were running behind...in fact they left for the day while I was waiting.
If you're running behind schedule, then inform your patients before they arrive. My time is my most valuable resource and The Eye Center wasted it.

resp.text: Hi Dan - I am sorry to hear about the scheduling and communication issues that arose while you were waiting. We do value your time and apologize for any inconveniences we might have caused you. We are constantly working on providing the highest quality of service and appreciate your feedback.

name: Scott Cantrell
text: Great people that really care about helping their patients!

name: Amanda Simpson
text: Great place to work.

name: Chrina Serrant
text: The staff are very nice and great with kids but the wait is awful especially when you show up early for your appointment an still your in the waiting room for an extra 45 mins to an hour. Like if your appointment is 2:00 be prepared to be called back about 30-45 later, which if your an on time person it wouldn't make sense to show up early cause you will not get seen on time. It's not fair when you show up on time an you have to wait, then once you get called back it's another waiting game an you wait forever an forever. If you have an appointment here don't have nothing else to do or have to pick anyone else up from work cause you won't get out on time. Especially with a small child they get very restless an irritated, an when they come in to see about your child your child isn't cooperating cause they have waited so long they are tired. Other than that the staff is friendly.

resp.text:
Hi Chrina,

Thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback. We are always looking to improve our processes and provide the best possible care to our patients. We value all feedback and will take the steps needed to address these concerns.

name: Robert Moore
text: I have heard good things about Dr Diveraux. The staff however was unfriendly & arrogant. They take digital photos of all patients for "their charts". I don't enjoy visiting the DMV & am not about to trust an establishment with the customer no service displayed here.

resp.text: Hi Robert - I am so sorry to hear about your experience with us. At The Eye Center we always strive to provide the best quality customer service, but we aren't always perfect. Thank you for your feedback.

name: Queen B
text: This was by far the worst experience my husband or I have ever had at a clinic. We were forwarded here by our pediatrician and i called a month and a half ahead to make our appointment. Our appointment was scheduled for 3:15pm and I showed up at 2:45pm to complete all of the neccessary paperwork. My husband and two kids, 3years and 10months showed up at 3:15. We waited and waited and waited. We were not seen until 4:30 (now mind you their office closes at 5pm). However I constantly see the doctor and her nurses talking and giggling at a computer in the hallway. So after finally being called in the nurse does some little eye tests and dialates my sons eyes. While waiting i spoke with another mother that said her duaghter was there for her appointment at that was at 4pm. We are then sent out to the waiting room and wait another 20min for them to pull us into the room to see the Doctor. So after being called into the room we again waited and waited and waited. We sait in there for 45MIN!!!! Now it is 5:45pm and my two children are hungry, tired and are frustrated at having to look at walls. So we finally looked out of the room to find out that the ENTIRE Office Staff had left and the doctor was in another room with the little girl whose appointment was at 4pm which was after my son's. When the Doctor FINALLY made her appearance she said my son was fine and we could go!!! 3 HOURS to tell us he was fine! Now mind you on the paper work they sent it said to prepare for a 30min appointment! This was by far the WORST experience we have EVER had and will NEVER return! This Staff does not care for its patients or what they have going on and only want your money and to waste your time! If I could rate them NEGATIVE stars I would!

resp.text: Hi RB - I am sorry to hear about your experience with us. We apologize the the time delay while you were visiting us. Thank you for your feedback.

name: Ellen Cozelos
text:
I expect to have a long wait with a doctors' appointment occasionally, emergencies happen.  But this is an eye doctors' clinic!!  How many life or death situations can happen there?   Our appointment was set for 2:30, finally got out  after 5 p.m.!  Talked with other people waiting, 2 to 3 hours is the norm here....less than 5 minutes with the actual doctor.  Luckily, most doctors' offices no longer practice the the art of over booking like they do here.  Donna Patterson nailed it by stating that to the people of the Eye Center, you are only a piece of paper with eyes (or ears)

Update:  Again they apologize, yet the complaints keep coming in for the same issues.  Me thinks the "apologies sound a bit hollow"

resp.text: Hi Ellen - We apologize for your bad experience with us and for the inconvenience your wait may have caused. At The Eye Center, we strive to give you the best customer service and are always striving to do better. Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.

text: I HATE HERE! They will never tell you how much they will charge you before you pay for it. Staff never knows about your insurance. I visited there just for buying contact lense, I got some tests, and they charged me $150...Also, they put some drugs in my eyes(I don't know what it is) and I cannot see close things for more than 30 min. They will not take care about you and explain any information to you. Never visit here. Terrible!

name: Scott Harden
text: They have a friendly staff and a good selection of frames.

name: Melissa Walker
text:
A close friend took her son to Schaeffer recently. Due to his deadbeat dad not paying child support, the child is on Medicaid, and Schaeffer is supposedly one of only two places in Huntsville that offers eye glasses under Medicaid. The little boy was actually excited about getting glasses - about being able to see the board in his 2nd grade classroom. He was excited by all the cool frames he saw on display. When it was his turn to be seen, he and his mother were ushered to a small table, tucked away from the waiting area, with 3 red boxes sitting on top. In those boxes were dirty frames, with only a few sized for boys and not even a mirror to see one's reflection while trying on. The mother humbly asked a clerk if there were any other options for her son and was told "what you see is what you get" then dismissed as if her presence were a nuisance. The little boy was forced to pick out a pair of glasses that, although he needs, we're relatively certain he won't wear past the 2nd day he owns them due to the harassment he'll receive from bullies in school. So he won't be able to see the board, and his education and self esteem will suffer. His mother was understandably upset, but what can she do? She already works at least 3 jobs to pay for food and bills. Life can be hard. You do the best you can with what you have.

But did this mother and child have to be treated like dirt? No. Absolutely not. The behavior of Schaeffer's employee was abhorrent, at best.

I, personally, have a great job with good insurance and can afford not only new glasses every two years, but new prescription sunglasses as well. Where do I go for my glasses? The WalMart vision center on University Drive. The doctor and staff there treat everyone equally well, no matter how they're dressed, how much they make, or what their insurance status is. I know other high-income families that prefer to go there as well.

I will personally spread this story as far and wide as I can. Shame on you, Schaeffer, for treating ANYone like trash, especially an innocent little boy!

name: Daniel Marchand
text:

I've had issues with canceling/rescheduling appointments, canceled or called to move it when I received the post card, and a few weeks later I get a reminder call again for the appointment that I had changed.

FYI for contact users they charge $75 for a fitting (with insurance), I made the mistake of coming here last year and got sticker shock at the register on the way out - my fault for not asking.  Walmart charges $30, and contacts are contacts are contacts...

text: The staff was friendly and Dr. Elkins was personable and knowledgeable.  However, they added a lot of extra things to the lenses that ran the price way up. I called when I hadn't heard in a couple weeks and they had forgotten to send them off.    When they came in, it was just the lenses and no frames.  They didn't have the frames in stock so they would have to order them.  I live two hours from the office and didn't want to make yet another trip so they said they would mail them to me.  When I got them today, they should have listened to me as the focal point is still too close.  I've had five interactions with them and have been dissatisfied with all five.  They are very nice, but can't seem to get things done right.

name: brian doyle
text: My recent purchase of two reading glasses and one pair of sunglasses was a surprising and most pleasant experience.  Ashley compared the two current promotions to find me the very best price.  Then, several days later, I received a call that my glasses had arrived, but Eyecare Associates had rejected them after inspection and had ordered a new fabrication.  Wow!  Just a few days after that, I went to pick up my new remakes.  I was not satisfied with the field of vision they offered, and Ashley showed me the three types of lenses available.   I selected a set with a broader field of vision and, in spite of the $80 increase each of the three sets would entail, placed my order.  The next day, Ashley called to tell me she had discussed my case with the manager, and they had decided to wave all further fees, so these three new pairs would be free!   Double-wow!   I was impressed and, frankly, touched by the empathy, attention, personal concern, and expert service I received from Eyecare Associates.    EA went out of their way and beyond all my expectations to insure a fair and positive experience for me, and I simply cannot recommend them enough!  Definitely be my go-to eye care specialists from now on.

Called my home eye MD, who is part of the EyeCare network. They suggested I try contacting EyeCare Associates in the area.  This recommendation led me here.

text:
I’ve been to both Prattville and Sturbridge locations for exams with contacts and glasses in the past. I had LASIK April 22 performed by Dr. Swan and the results have been incredible. I could see drastically better leaving the office 10 minutes after. At my post-op appointment the next day I could see almost 20/15 out of one eye. The other eye does have more irritation and dryness and is improving daily.

Dr. McFaden and the rest of the staff have been very helpful and friendly getting my procedure set up and during recovery to help with the irritation and minor swelling.

I look forward to see how my eyes have healed at the 1 week follow-up. I highly recommend LASIK with Montgomery Eye Physicians. It’s been life-changing already.

I told the doctor he's not deaf and I'm translating no need to yell, well he needs to do want I'm asking. 🤨Really a person with down syndrome can't control the fact that he see's something coming at his eye. He was suppose to take a sample of whatever he had in his eye and the risk was if he moves or blink I could cut his eye. I call our mom and told her the risk and how this doctor acted towards my brother she was not happy nor was I we left but not before I told him that we would find someone that can have the patience and find a different way to do this procedure his response was well the other place you will find a specialist is in Bham and if you don't he will lose his eye. I told him don't worry I have driven to Bham before to take him to doctors and I will make sure he doesn't lose his eye unlike you.

text: Most of seemed really nice. But, I came in March 3rd to order a contact lense. Dr. McFaden gave me a contact lense review. One had gotten broken 2 days beforeand. Dr. McFaden said it was ok to go ahead and order my lense now so I can have it on the way soon and if it needed to be changed they will do that on my regular schedule exam on March 13th. I was told by one of the nurses that the order for my contact was put in and there wasn't a payment for today and that they will call me when it came in. Forward to March 13th when it was time to have a regular full exam, I asked about the order, and then that's when I was told I had to make a full payment first before it was ordered. So what they told me the first time was a straight up LIE. My contact could've almost been here by now if they would've just told me that in first place!! Now I have to go with 1 freaking contact in for another 2 weeks because somebody don't know how to properly do their job!! This really pisses me off and Tiffany always have a rude demeanor.  My problem wasn't paying for the contact upfront! I could've done that March 3rd! It's the lie that I was told about the ordering! It's not fun going longer than what I have to with one contact!

name: Karen Harris
text: When I scheduled my new patient appointment almost 2 months ago, I was adamant that I wanted to be seen by an ophthalmologist.  An appointment was made to see Dr. Mitchell and to also see Dr. McFadden for my contact exam.  Fast forward to today, when I arrived for my appointment, I'm informed that it has been cancelled.  No phone call, text, email...NOTHING!  As a matter of fact, I had to call the week before to confirm my appointment  because I had not received any form of confirmation.  Needless to say, I will not return or recommend this practice to anyone.  I did not appreciate having my appointment cancelled without any just reason and then only to arrive and have the lady at the reception desk continuously trying to get me to see another doctor.

resp.text: Karen, we are sorry to hear about your experience today. We are looking into the issue now and will call you shortly to review. Thank you for the feedback.

name: Stephen Pierce
text: This is my second review.  Plan to spend more than one or two hours there.  The last visit took three hours.  The previous visit Dr. Swan was two and a half hours LATE for my apt.  Next time I will allow a thirty minute wait then leave!

name: Keith Smith
text: Dr. Mcfaden is a great doctor! Very thorough. Highly recommend him to anyone. The staff as a whole is awesome as well!
