text: The staff was very accommodating over the course of multiple appointments, answered all of my questions, and went above and beyond to assist with LASIK. Greatly appreciated!

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback, Brandon! We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your experience.

name: Misty Price
text: Friendly staff & short wait time. I had lasik surgery performed here & they did a fantastic job. They were friendly before, during, & after the surgery, which helped tremendously. If you are considering lasik, give them a visit!

name: Cherokee Haynes
text: Service was good but the receptionists were extremely rude and talking about people in front of their faces. Very disrespectful!

resp.text: Cherokee, thank you for sending us your feedback. We are sorry to hear we didn't exceed expectations during your visit. This information has been sent to our administrative team so we can make the proper adjustments. Your feedback is important to our practice, and we appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your experience.

name: Matthew Brown
text:
When I showed up for my new patient appointment I was told the Dr. had left sick. That's understandable, but no one could give me an explanation as to why I wasn't called and told this before my appointment time.  I drove across Montgomery just for this appointment.  I was told they would call me to reschedule in the morning. No one called.
I called them the next day and then I was put on hold and then hung up on.  It's very clear to me they don't need/want new patients. Moving on

name: Dick Martin
text: I had the occasion to have a glaucoma test by Dr Shin which was with a hand held paortable device. It happened to be 10 points higher than a test administered to me days earlier by Dr . Izer.  He wanted to prescribe medication. When I said I just had the test 4 days ago by another doctor, he got very upset and told me there is no reason for me to come back since I saw the other doctor. Apparently he doesn’t like a patient getting a second opinion. He is insecure or threatened by a second opinion, especially when there is such a disparity in the result.

name: Karl Smith
text: I had a difficult time trying to find this office even with the GPS feature on my cellphone

name: Amy Mapp
text: Excellent.    Friendly and caring staff

name: donnie collins
text: Love the atmosphere and employees treat you very well here  , helped me to see clearly and take good care of me , its amazing what corrective lens and contacts do for astigmatism .

name: Gus Thiele
text: Why does the vision center have someone working that cannot even replace nosepads on glasses

name: Carrie Blocker
text:
I was disappointed because we’d used them in the past and been satisfied with service. This transaction was not a good one, and we will not be returning.
Upon entering, we were met with grumpiness as if we were inconveniencing the staff. Coming in simply for a lens update, i anticipated an easy interaction. No one directed us and once we finally spoke with someone, she acted as if we should know the policies. We had to schedule an appointment to come back just to have lenses replaced. So i scheduled for their next open slot (almost a week later).
We were met with the same attitude upon our appointment and went through the whole process of ordering. As i was about to pay, we were informed that the glasses would have to be shipped out and so my daughter would not have glasses for the next 2 weeks. Unacceptable. I canceled the order and we left to seek better options elsewhere… which we found with smiles and a lower price tag.

resp.text: Carrie, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about your experience getting glasses in our office -- that's definitely not what we want for you! I'd like to look into why this happened. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Christina Rose
text: Liz was the most AMAZING,calming, professional person I could've asked for. She did everything possible to make me comfortable and calm my anxiety I having about my eye issues. Dr Jackson did a great job explaining everything In detail and made me feel so much more at ease then when I walked in. Every fear I had about my eyes, he explained in detail why I shouldn't worry about them and that I was going to be ok. I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND. I now have myself and children as patients. ❤️

name: Mamie Douglas
text: Dr. Jackson has serviced my family and me, for more than 15 years. Dr. Jackson’s very patient and explain in detail of your eyes as it relates to your eye medical stance. I definitely recommend anyone who desires to have a great medical eye examine, Eyecare Associates’ best choice.

Dr. Harris examined me, informed me of any current or future problems, and made some slight corrections to my contact lens' prescription.  All in all, a very pleasant, professional visit.

It’s been a year and I went for a regular appointment with De. Harris and loved the visit! Nice atmosphere and they really care about their patients. I would definitely recommend them!

text: They made us wait in the waiting room for an hour before finally bringing us to the room where we then sat for another hour. So by the time we had left we had been there for 2 1/2 hours. And I'm not really sure I trust the opinion of the Dr as some things he said didn't make sense.

text: I have been going to Dr. Harris for so many years.  They are always very clean and so very kind.  They are always ready to assist you in a timely manner.

text: Dr. Jackson and his nurse was Awesome!! The whole place was a pleasure to be in the midst of.

name: Emily S
text: Both my husband and I felt like we were just a commissions check to this office. The initial welcome from the receptionist was cold and annoyed. We spent 3 hours apiece here to get contacts (him) and glasses/contacts (me) and walked out spending far more than usual. Being a new patient from out of town I would have expected more of a consultation from the doctor before just throwing me into contacts. I was only able to wear each contact set for 2-3 hours before having to take them out because they were green. When I called the office to express my concern the only thing they said was to use contact solution not tap water. (Who does that anyways?! Tap water?) I’m sorry I’ve worn contacts before and have never had them turn green. So there’s a contact fitting co-pay wasted and not refunded. It’s been a solid 2 weeks since ordering my glasses (should have been 7-10 business days) I called twice to get an update and get transferred to a voicemail with no response (24-48 hours right?). When I went looking for new frames the person helping me knew my insurance budget and pulled frames almost double my budget rather than asking me what I felt comfortable spending. She also picked frames that were extremely outside of my current shape, style,  and comfort zone. All and all I probably will find a different office for us next year simply because the lack of care, communication, and consultation.

resp.text: Emily, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about your experience in our office. It's so frustrating when you don't feel heard! We strive to provide excellent care for every patient, and we obviously fell short for you and your husband. I've spoken to our management team about your concerns and they would like to reach out to you. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm so sorry to hear about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: tom reinhardt
text: You all were extremely helpful especially the sweet women at the front desk as she could tell I was in pain and cared enough to stop what she was doing and get me some numbing eye drops and put them in for me to help sooth the pain it was such a relief and really a blessing knowing that there is still at least one practice that has caring and loving staff or employees that care about their patients and don't treat them as a number on a clip board! And that can mean a lot to a patient like myself! For me I lost my mother when I was 11 And when I came into EyeCare Associates they made me feel right at home like their on son and made me feel like I had two moms behind the front desk. :) Thank y’all for all of your help, care and concern! And I LOOK forward to seeing you all again soon! :)

name: Cody H
text: Dr Harris was great! He was patient despite it being a very busy day and I really felt appreciated. I will definitely visit again for eye exams and I have already recommended him to my family.

name: Berniece Pierce
text:
I had my appointment on Wednesday, 10 July 2013. I normally see either Dr. Harris or Dr. Jackson. On this visit I was seen by Doctor Fredrick Jackson and it was a truly amazing experience. Everyone was extremely courteous and friendly. I was really impressed with Dr. Jackson on this occasion. He took his time explaining everything he was doing and why he was doing it. His explanations and genuine concern went a long way in putting my fears to rest. He not only took an interest in my eye health, but he was also very forthcoming with sharing some possible solutions to other areas of my overall health that could potentially affect my eye health. He offered some possible solutions to help with bouts of vertigo I have been experiencing for a couple of years now. He suggested some things that I could try to help to minimize the severity of the migraine headaches that I have been suffering for more than thirty years. No one else had ever made the suggestions to me that he did. I can't wait to put them into practice to see if they will help even the tiniest little bit. Thanks, Dr. Jackson, for one of the most enjoyable appointments I have ever had. And trust me, I will make sure that you are highly recommended to everyone that I know who needs a good optometrist. Keep up the good work.

Had my yearly exam on February 4, 2015 and must say that it was a very interesting experience. Even though the wait time was a few minutes past my appointment time, I clearly understand why. The doctors spend as much time as needed with each patient and I realize that I will get the same type of treatment when it is my turn. Also, Dr. Harris' staff are extremely kind, considerate, and compassionate. I just love Dr. Harris to death (no offense Dr. Jackson, I love you, too). Even though he informed me that I have cataracts, he took the time to explain all of my options and shared his experiences with his father's surgery. I left the office feeling very good and felt that Dr. Harris had provided me with all the information that I needed to make a decision. Once I made the decision, he even scheduled an appointment for me--talk about the personal touch approach. I would highly recommend Primary Eyecare Associates to anyone. As a matter of fact, my entire family uses Primary Eyecare Associates. So, if you are looking for a good eye care center and optometrist, give them a call, THEY ARE THE BEST I have ever used. KEEP DOING WHAT YOU ARE DOING.

name: Lenny Samford
text: Have been using them for years. Very professional and courteous staff. Dr. Jackson is always very patient and thorough. He takes time to explain everything to you. I highly recommend them.

text: Dr. Tim Harris is the best! The staff are all friendly and professional! I always leave feeling confident that I received the absolute best in vision care!!

I really liked Dr Harris, too. He was friendly and knowledgeable. He tweaked my contact prescription and I'm seeing much better now!  I will definitely recommend your office.  Kudos to all the friendly staff.

text:
I have been a patient for over 20 years with Primary Eye Care.  Dr. Jackson and Dr. Harris as well as all the doctors are very educated in their field.  For years I suffered with Dry Eye and with the help of Dr. Jackson and the patient care I am given this issue has been greatly resolved. I also had Lasik Surgery around 10 years ago with excellent results.  And today I am still seeing 20/20, I have had no regression in my vision.

Dr. Jackson is a very caring doctor, he not only cares about your vision he cares about your overall health.  Your health and medications are very important part of his exam.

Dr. Harris is very caring as well concerning you overall health.  He has a free spirit and your vision and how well you see is extremely important.

I would not go anywhere else for mine or my family's eye care.
When I leave I know they as well as myself have been give the utmost care as possible. And an exam that surpasses all others.

I thank them greatly for their compassion and care I am given.

I also work for these doctors and I personally know and see first hand the care that our patients are given.  Your optical needs are as important as your eye exam.  If its not right they will do everything possible to make things right and see you are satisfied. Your Vision is their main Focus.

text: I've never had to feel nervous about the meds that dilate your eyes. The tech makes you feel like you are special and he/she displays professionalism. At the check-out desk, you are given the glasses purposed for dilation of the eyes. I really enjoyed my experience at Eye Care Associates.

I'm very glad this was one of my last stops in the city.

name: Angela Jenkins
text: I always have a pleasant experience when I visit Dr. Harris at this office.  The staff is always friendly and Dr. Harris couldn't be any nicer!  I highly recommend this office for your eye care needs.

name: Paquita Hart
text: Had my annual eye exam this week at Primary Eyecare Associates. Dr. Jackson is the best, wouldn't trade him for another one. He is very polite and knowledgeable of his profession.Would HIGHLY recommend this practice to anyone who's looking for an Ophthalmologist or is new to the area.

name: Caro Stanford
text: I have been going here at least 10 years for my eye care needs. The staff is always super sweet and nice. Today is the first time I had a bad experience. The Dr. that I had always seen was gone so I was seen by a Dr. Jackson. For the most part he was professional. Until I inquired about Lasik eye surgery. I'm 24 and was told I was a good candidate for the program but I am under the age requirement. But more importantly I was offended when he said and I'm paraphrasing "People your age usually can't afford it. And if so it's BC their grandparents pay for it". I was offended and felt that comment was unprofessional and uncalled for.

name: Carol Roberts
text: I've been going to Dr. Harris for over 20 years, since their office was on Atlanta Highway. Then they moved to Carmichael, which was fine. Then they moved way out past Thorington Road, which is a pain, but I still go there. I've always been happy with the service in their office. A couple of years ago it seems they were bought out by some company that requires them to over schedule people and causes some very long waits. My last two appointments have run nearly an hour late. But the doctors and staff are still very nice and we get good quality glasses there.

name: Rose Cottrell
text: I have been going to Dr. Jackson and Dr. Harris for years and I've had several surgeries done on my eyes, they are both very professional and very knowledgeable in their field. The staff is great also and yes I will continue to refer them.

name: Donna Michaud
text: Dr. Harris, Amanda and Patricia are The Best. They were extremely busy on my last visit, but they still took time to answer all of my questions and never made me feel rushed.  I saw one ophthalmologist for 25 years before he died a few years ago, and it's taken me 2 years to find another doctor with whom I have the same comfort level and confidence!

name: Paula Bye
text: Always a pleasurable experience.  I’m very happy with the Care I receive.

name: Carrin Weaver
text: Primary Eyecare Associates has a great team of experienced and friendly people who care about your eyes and vision as much as you care about your own eyes. I wouldn't use anyone else. Dr. Harris is a great doctor to have caring for your vision!

name: Shanavya Johnson
text: Thanks for always being friendly and professional. Great staff and doctor!!

name: AU Fan
text: Friendly staff.  Dr. Harris is outstanding.  I have dry eye syndrome and have tried for years to wear contact lenses.  Unfortunately, the Prattville office wasn't able to help me for this, but the Montgomery office fit me with the right lenses the first time.  Thank you again.  Sincerely, grateful and thankful eye patient.

name: Carla Campbell
text: I was shown so much concern and love by all Dr Jackson and the staff did to go over all the bases I needed covered

name: Linda Alexander
text: Excellent experience from front office to doctor to glasses technician. Couldn't be more pleased.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive review about your recent experience with us!

name: Brittany Wiliiams
text: Great experience every year I go will always be my number 1 eye doctors office.

name: Lisa Fancher
text: As always Dr. Jackson and all the staff were professional.  They go above and beyond to make sure that they cover everything about your visit.  They care about YOU and it shows!  Always a pleasure!  Thank you for truely caring!!

name: Heather Vaughn
text: Really family friendly professional environment also accepts Medicaid and you can order glasses on sight

name: scott bullock
text: Absolutely terrible. They did not tell my father his blurry eyesight was caused by bleeding in his eye. After eight months I found a specialist in Birmingham that told us the cause of the blurry vision and that if it had been properly diagnosed when it started it could have been prevented. Dr. Jackson doesn't care about patients just billing your insurance. The girls at the front were making fun of callers in clear hearing range of the customrs in the lobby. We waited an hour for a scheduled appointment.

name: Mary Ogden
text: Primary Eyecare was never missed so much!  I recently had cataract surgery and my insurance sent me to a surgeon.  This office's "care" was lacking - so glad to be back with Dr. Harris and his crew at Primary Eyecare!  The staff are friendly and courteous!  The eyeware staff is knowledgeable and helpful.  Miss you guys!!

name: Rhondrica Houston
text: I give them five stars they were excellent with both of my boys and their glasses were ready in less than a week

name: Kimberly Moore
text: I cannot say enough good things about our experience with Eyecare Associates on Vaughn Rd! They have been absolutely TERRIFIC from the staff working the front desk to Dr. Harris (and everyone in between).

name: Lawrence Daniel
text: Very pleasant staff and doctors.  Extremely through examination to diagnose the exact problem with easy to understand explanation.  I highly recommend Primary Eyecare Associates.

name: Jasmyn Tutt
text: Never again. Dr. Jackson tried to make me feel self-conscious about wearing glasses and tried to get me to convert to contact lenses. He did this numerous times, even though I already stated that I was considering contacts anyway. No one bothered to mention that the TRIAL lenses were almost $100.

name: Ann Gholston
text: Love Dr. Harris!!!!! Been with him for over 20+ years. The staff is very considerate, knowledgeable and courteous!!!!!

name: Cameron Norris
text: Dr. Harris at Primary Eyecare is wonderful. We had to take our two year old to this office for an exam, and the entire staff was kind, patient, and very knowledgable. Would highly recommend them.

name: Doris Schreiber
text: A very positive experience with EyeCare Associates.  Always reconizes me when I come.

name: Roger Douglas
text: I had my lasik eye surgery done by Dr. Harris and he is amazing this was absolutely the best decision I have ever made and his tech Ms. Kelli is great as well they made me feel very comfortable and at ease through the entire process they have a great staff and I definitely would recommend them to anyone considering lasik you won't have any regrets

name: LaneB 880
text: The staff was awesome and funny. I love the staff

name: Vincent Wright
text: Excellent staff and doctors, I'd recommend them to anyone.

name: Cynthia Ferguson
text: Dr. Marshall was very patient with me and very knowledgeable about my eyes and what I need I'll definitely will refer primary eye care associates

name: Alicia Buford-Campbell
text: They are kind and courteous.  They worked my daughter in because her appointment was later.

name: Misael Hacked my account Sage
text: At first I was nervous to come here after reading other reviews but these people are super friendly and professional.

name: Arlene Thompson
text: Excellent customer service and great selection of eye glasses for all ages.

name: Lee Barnes
text: Always very professional and courteous.  Highly recommended.

name: Jocelyn Slaughter-Wright
text: Dr. Harris is great and very thorough!! The staff is also very friendly!

name: Rickey Belcher
text: Don't think I'll be going back

resp.text: I'm so sorry to note you had a bad experience in our office. I'd like to look into it further. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm sorry this happened. -Cassie

name: Christian Jackson
text: I ordered glasses a month and three weeks ago, called to see what happened to them three weeks after I ordered them and was told the day I ordered them the website was down. Ordered them a month after my appointment and I still haven’t received a call saying my glasses are in. Very poor communication skills.

name: Moore HowTo
text: Everyone is so nice and helpful!

name: Diane Geiger
text: Dr.Jackson and Staff are great!

name: Joe Buntyn
text: Great DR.

name: 4Ever1Way 2 Him
text:
(Translated by Google) Best ophthalmology !!!
I went to a few places in Montgomery and finally decided to go here
The friendly staff and, above all, have the time to kindly explain the patient's questions and diagnosis. I'm meeting Fredrick Jackson.

I was impressed by how much more accurate and reliable a test was than the prescription made by an Atlanta optician, and afterwards, the diagnosis and prescription were fully explained. Prosper more and wish you well ...

(Original)
최고의 안과로 강추!!!
몽고메리에서 몇곳을 다녀보고 드뎌 이곳으로 정하게 된 이유는
친절한 스텝진과 무엇보다도 시간적 여유를 가지고 환자의 궁금증과 진단을 친절하게 잘 설명해 주시는 Dr. Fredrick Jackson을 만나서 입니다.

아틀란타 안경점에서 내린 처방보다 조금더 정확하고 신뢰를 주는 검사, 이후에 진단과 처방까지 시간에 쫓기지 않고 충분히 설명 해주시는 모습이 인상적이었습니다.   더 번창하시고  잘 되시기를....

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review -- we're so glad you enjoyed your experience!

name: Scott Harrison
text: This is a great location. My eyes have never been good, but I want to thank Trevor for giving me kind and wholesome advice while pointing me in the right direction to getting my prescription filled in a timely manner. I have never met this person but he treated me like visually-impaired family and is an excellent representative for the location, as well as the Walmart brand in it's entirety.

name: Tonya Myrick
text: Went there yesterday to attempt to place an order for contacts, which I’m new to wearing and the lady there was so rude and ugly. I won’t be taking my business there after all. This is really surprising coming from Walmart... I thought customer service was a priority and that made them stand out. Not so much anymore.

name: april McKinley
text: Call to make appointment and they don't even have a freaking doctor...

name: Sydney Stanley
text: I didn’t get an eye exam here, but I did get my prescription glasses here. The associate, Trevor, is very helpful and professional. It took less than a week for me to receive my glasses. A+ service.

name: Lesley Cooper
text: I was so impressed with the service I received.  The staff is very nice.  I did not even realize that Walmart had an optical waiting room other than where you go look at glasses.  The office is so clean and nice.  The equipment was very up-to-date.  I had gone in because my eyes were doing "weird" things-  Dr. Jagani pointed out a few things I would not have even thought of.  Her professional manner and her absolute care for my "over-all" health was completely appreciated.  She took the time to talk with me about my eye health and things we can do to try to correct my vision.  I was given a trial pair of contacts that day and WOW!!!  I could see again!!!! Dr. Jagani was also very conciencous of the costs seeing as though I don't have vision insurance.  I strongly recommend Dr. Jagani -  I read other reviews that mentioned she was never there... So I just called instead of trying to pop in! I arrived for my appointment and actually was seated early... always a plus!  Thank you Dr. Jagani for your professionalism and caring for me and my health.

name: jonothan english
text: Didn't use them because they were actually too expensive

name: Jennie moody
text: Doctor is never there!  Walmart, you need to fix this....after all, it is the 21st century. I do not want to drive to Huntsville with glasses I can't see with. The glasses I am wearing came from Walmart in Hazel Green.

name: Smokeblkstr
text: Rude staffing, refused to even attempt to look on the system for my information because the doctor wasn't there.

name: Phyllis Jones
text: Poor professionalism! My daughter has rescheduled 3 appts with this Bessemer dental office. On the fourth try, which is today, she failed and No one bothered to reach out and call and/or text yo let her know anything. She missed making money because of bad service. My grandson has two cavities to be extracted. Our patience has been exhausted. We in the process of looking for another dentist office that cares.

resp.text:
Hello Phyllis,

We sincerely apologize for any frustration that may have been caused. Your families dental health is of the most importance to us. A member of our team will be in touch with you shortly to see what we can do to improve for you and others dental experiences at our practice.

Regards,
Sarrell Dental

name: Aakre Mahan
text: My daughter went to get her eyes examined on August 27, 2014.  The optometrist recommended that she needed glasses. So we placed our order.  The receptionist stated that the glasses should be back within two weeks and that they would contact me once they got in. Well................. It is now November 4, 2014 and my daughter has not yet received her eye glasses.  I have called twice to see if they have come into the office and every time I call they tell me that they have not come in yet.  They have not even tried to compensate us at all!!! I would not recommend Sarrel Dental Center to anyone. VERY VERY VERY POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE.  I am taking my child to another eye clinic. Tried to give them a chance with the office being fairly new.  BUT I MADE A HUGE MISTAKE. They are surely getting off to a HORRIBLE start.

name: Vanessa skripko
text: Their database got hacked and ever since they have been just mean. I called in August for a cleaning the first appointment available was Dec. 23 I forgot what time. I keep calling to check the time they won't answer. I asked to be put on a waiting list for the first opening and that obviously didn't happen. Just ugggh get my kids information hacked and now can't treat us professional.

resp.text: Vanessa, this location is permanently closed. Please send an email to feedback@greatdentalplans.com with your contact information and a member of our team will be in touch.  Thank you.

name: Daya Cruz
text: WISH I COULD LEAVE A ZERO, WENT TO GET A CLEANING HERE WHEN I WAS 18 WAS TOLD I HAD 2 CAVITIES THT NEEDED FILLED ASAP, I MADE THE APPT AND DUE TO WORK CONFLICTS I CANCELLED THE APPT. I ENDED UP CHANGING DENTISTS BC OF MY AGE (I DIDNT WANT TO CONTINUE GOING TO A PEDIATRIC DENTIST), WHEN I GOT MY CLEANING DONE I EXPECTED THE DOCTOR TO TELL ME I HAD CAVITIES (SINCE I DID NOT GO BACK TO FILL THEM HERE) HOWEVER THE DOCTOR TOLD ME I HAD NO CAVITIES. I MENTIONED TO THE DOCTOR THAT THIS LOCATION TOLD ME I HAD 2 CAVITIES AND DID NOT GET THEM FILLED. DOCTOR TOLD ME I DID NOT HAVE ANY CAVITIES AND THAT THIS LOCATION (BASED OFF WHAT I TOLD HIM) BASICALLY LIED TO ME TO GET $$ ... AFTER EXPERIENCING THIS I TALKED TO  PEOPLE THAT WENT TO THIS LOCATION BEFORE AND THEY ALSO SAID THEY HAD THE SAME ISSUE, I WOULD DEFINITLY NOT RECCOMMEND THIS DENTIST TO ANYONE. THEY DONT CARE ABOUT YOU THEY CARE ABOUT THE MONEY , ON TOP OF THAT IT IS SO HARD TO CONTACT SOMEONE HERE , TAKES FOREVER TO REACH SOMEONE HAVE TO CALL 5 TIMES BEFORE I CAN GET SOMEONE ON THE PHONE..... DO NOT GO HERE .

resp.text: Daya, If you'd like to talk with a member of our team, please send an email with your contact information to feedback@greatdentalplans.com and we will be in touch. Thank you.

name: Rayuna
text: Great place to get your eyes checked and to get glasses for all ages that are affordable and cute. Great dentists who are nice and helpful, and takes great care if your teeth.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind feedback!

name: Kelly McDaniel
text: My husband had a horrible infection in his eye so he sat in their parking lot and waited until they opened at 8am to be the first there for someone to look at his eye.  He was told they were booked and could not fit him in.  They   referred him to another eye place in Northport.  He said he would never make an appointment with them again.

name: Jamie Turner
text: They are all great with their patients

name: Deb S
text:
I had a great experience with the doctor. She was kind, patient and knowledgeable. She didn't dismiss my concerns about my eyes and offered to set me up with a retina specialist. My wait was not long at all, I was seen within 15 minutes of my appointment time.

The ladies behind the desk need to work on their attitudes...kinda  snotty...the technician who fit my glasses had a cold and shared it with me. She was coughing, sneezing and blowing her nose and did not wash her hands.

I will go back because I like my doctor.

name: LNS
text: Unfortunately had an appointment scheduled, they cancelled it completely last minute. Quickly rescheduled me though, and they were incredibly fast. When they say the appointment is at 10 AM, they mean it. I hardly waited. Doctor was fast to get to me, appointment took twenty minutes.

name: Andrew Leak
text: It took Apollo 8 sixty-one hours to get to moon from the earth in the 60s.... it took eye care associates over TWO weeks to send me a pair of glasses in 2018. You are well better off just walking to China, going to a glass shop, crafting your own lenses yourself, and then walk BACK to America.

name: David Roper
text: This place deserves 0 stars.  Parents beware before sending your students.  My son has very bad eyesight and requires his contacts daily.  After being referred to Dr. Corley, our son made an appointment and received trial contacts.  We ordered his contacts mid January and expected to receive them soon afterward.  This did not happen and no one from this office bothered to call us or check with our son.  He has been wearing trial contacts for four months and this office would have never contacted us.  I called them this morning (5/2/2018) after seeing my son last night.  He asked me when he would be getting his contacts.  I paid for the contacts in full in January.  This has to be the worst customer service I have ever experienced.

name: Kaitlyn Lewis
text: Friendly staff and educated doctors. The wait time was a little longer than I’d have liked but you’re going to wait for a doctor no matter where you go. This is a great, professional  eye doctor and I’ll continue to use Eyecare Associates.

name: Morgan Carter
text: I love this place !  First time ever going was last week, the staff is SUPER friendly. I enjoyed the doctor I saw. I would recommend this place to everyone !!!!

name: Robert Haraway
text: I have been going to Dr. Corley's office for over 5 years and have been very pleased with the professional service I have always received. The staff are friendly and helpful and Dr. Corley has always been very thorough and professional with my exams and has always taken time to answer all of my questions. I had a difficult time adjusting to progressive bifocal glasses at one point and the ladies fitting my glasses ordered new ones for me to try at no additional cost, and the 2nd lens was perfect. I would highly recommend this office to anyone needing a great eye doctor in a caring and friendly office.

name: Melia F.
text: I love Dr Corley but her staff is subpar. They only care about the money, not about Dr Corley's practice. Trying to get an appointment is nearly impossible and eye emergencies do not matter, you're on your own. Don't waste your time.

name: Heather Falls
text: I love Dr. Corley and the staff. I was extremely excited when I found out you guys participated with VSP insurance. I didn't want to have to see anyone else!! Dr. Corley has always been so amazing and has taken care of myself and my family for years. You all do an amazing job. Keep up the good work!! xo- Heather Jones

name: Nikki s
text: Awful. I came back four times and got the wrong prescription each time. I have paid $300 and asked for my money back because I still have not received my prescription. I was told that their services do not include the prescription being correct.

name: Erik Johnson
text: horrible.

name: Michael Seeley
text:
Dr Ready has been treating my retinopathy for about 2 years. I was nearly blind when I started seeing him and I now have 20/20 vision. I noticed improvements almost immediately after seeing him.

Very highly recommended!

name: Tessa J
text: Dr. Reade is there for his paycheck and doesn’t care about patients. He was the rudest doctor I’ve ever came across. Didn’t let me speak or ask questions. Walked out of the room before I could even get a chance to ask anything. Made me make an appointment to follow up a year from now when he said nothing is wrong when something IS wrong. He just wants his books filled. When I was with the nurse I asked to see the doctor for something before she dialated me, she left came back and said he was busy and continued on. Boo on you.

name: Nate Hubbard
text: The staff here is excellent and Dr. Persaud and Dr. Saini are always great to work with. They've always managed to work me in for a same day visit when I've had sudden changes. That's extremely rare to find these days.

name: Mathew Fay
text: Most of the people here are adequately professional, though certain nurses need to be trained in patience and caring. Rushing patients through isn't a good way to key them coming back.

name: Midge W
text: Was sent to see Dr. Ready because I had developed a macular pucker. After examining my eyes he decided not to do anything because I could be corrected to 20/20 despite the fact that my vision has drastically changed the past year. Before I left I paid my copay and they were to file with my insurance company. A few days later I received a bill dated 2 days after my appointment, the day before the insurance received a claim, for the full charge without even a credit for the copay I paid at the appointment for immediate payment. When I called to asked why I was billed before the insurance claim was filed all I was told was my balance was $0 and was NOT given an explanation of why they billed so quickly. I then called the doctor's office and asked why I received the bill. All they could do was refer me to the billing department. It is obvious that this practice cannot control the billing company they have hired. In my opinion if they cannot do that I CANNOT trust the doctor with the health of my eyes. GOODBYE Dr. Ready and Retina Specialists of North Alabama.

name: John Molina
text:
Shoutout to this place (Dr. Persaud and his teammates) for being awesome!
I called them this morning and explained my emergency (I can’t see out of my left eye). They saw me within two hours (as a brand new patient), and out in 20 mins with prescriptions to Walgreens.
Super nice and thanked me for my service.
10/5 would recommend.

name: April Bloodworth
text: Persaud did my husband lens replacement. He was told he wouldn't need glasses after surgery. Surgery was botched looks like he has a cat eye on the right. He went back several times nothing was done to correct it his vision is horrible note so over 3000 dollars spent to be screwed up and never corrected. I personally wouldn't let him do surgery on my dog now. Pitiful to have faith spend your money then have worse vision than before the surgery. I personally wouldn't recommend him for anything. I feel so sorry for my husband to spend all the money for worsevision. Absolutely pitiful.

name: Charlotte M. Ellett (Charlaxy)
text: Refused to accept tests sent from another doctor for comparison to previous results; seems that the reason was that they did not have records of previous visit of less than two years ago because of moving offices? Dr. Persaud offended that I didn't want an office visit to unncessarily redo tests done that day that were just sent to him for comparison. Tried my best to get all records transferred to the new doctor, because his original hope of comparing new and old results wasn't possible. Reason for visiting new doctor initially was that Dr. Persaud was not informative and didn't follow up on treatment.

name: Mattie Williams
text: Everyone is always friendly and welcoming! Dr Green answers your questions and doesn't evade the issue. Yay!!!

name: Eloise Harris
text: I am 78 and have had cataract surgery.  I was given a very thorough examination.  I had confidence in my doctor, and she gave me suggestions to help with dry eye and allergies.

name: Cassidy Ferguson
text: So glad I switched eye doctors . They were very nice and efficient.

name: jimmy walters
text: Very professional, top of the line equipment, very nice and top of the line staff. I will continue to use in the future and I highly recommend!

name: M J
text: Service was awesome from beginning to end. From the ladies in the front, to the techs and then the doctor!! Made me feel good about having to get glasses!

name: Milton Vick
text: Easy to deal wirh.  Nice friendly staff that is very knowledgeable and helpful.  Very caring too.

name: John David Barnes
text: Dr. Green is very knowledgeable, and it is obvious he stays on top of the latest technology and expertise. He recommended treatment which effectively arrested the progression of my son's nearsightedness.

name: Anthony
text: Dr Green is great.  But their glasses are too expensive in my opinion.  About $650 for progressive bifocals.

name: Aj Nixon
text: Very Nice Workers and take time.

name: Clara Criswell
text: Everyone is always so friendly. Great customer service.

name: Tedra Crowell
text: They are very gentle and patient with children.

name: Charles Reynolds
text: I had a very through eye exam by courteous technicians and a good experience. Dr. Green was very helpful with a concern that I had.

name: Russell Gaddy
text: Courteous and efficient staff. Dr. Green is knowledgeable and takes time to explain everything related to your eyesight.

name: stephanie havard
text: Wonderful, courteous people. Would highly recommend anyone to go see them for your eye care needs.

name: Craig Smith
text: Nice knowledgeable people and a great selection of frames...wish I had been going to them for years.

name: M D
text: Very Professional, explains everything in detail! Great service.

name: Brandon Arrigo
text: This place is a top notch & high-tech eye care provider. Dr. Green excels at what he does. The staff are friendly and always take care of me quickly. I haven't been to a eye care center like this since my time in Germany.

name: Lisa Tanner
text: I love Dr Greene he is awesome always make sure I understand what is going on with my son's eye exams

name: Lee Arrington
text: Very friendly and professional.

name: Alejandro Lopez
text: Excellent Service!

name: Amber Baker
text: Great service, highly recommend!

name: jean watson
text: Always fast, courteous service!!

name: Frankie Kennon
text: Great Doctor and staff.

name: Natasha Norwood
text: Awesome!!!!

name: juantery brown
text: love it

name: Frances Shehan
text: My husband and I picked up our new glasses on Saturday, we would never buy glasses from anyone else, we have been doing business with LensCrafters on 280 since it opened and love the service, the people and the glasses!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Sandy Webb
text: I couldn’t ask for better customer service! The place was nice and clean and I was attended to like family. I would highly recommend this place to anyone! My glasses was perfect and came back in a timely manner, thank you so much for all your care! I WILL be back!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: kristin winfrey
text: Amazing customer service! We had a pleasant experience. Mike was amazing!

resp.text: Hi! Thank you so much for your review. We are excited to hear Mike was able to help make your experience in LensCrafters a great one. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Corinne CHATHAM
text: What Great store! Dr Cook is kind and professional. Fantastic doctor. Vicki who waited on me was so patient & helpful in helping me pick out frames. Fantastic experience!

resp.text: Hi! Thank you so much for your review. We are excited to hear that Dr. Cook and Vickie were able to help make your experience in LensCrafters a great one. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Brian Livingston
text:
Probably should be a 4.5 rating but didn't see that option...
A week after placing my order, I was informed the vendor that provides the polarized lenses is in the process of being changed and Lenscrafters is unable at the time to fulfill my order. However, Lenscrafters stepped up and did the right thing, maybe even more. They are providing me with a new set of frames and lenses with everything in the lenses I wanted except for the polarization without cost; and still will fulfill my original order once the new vendor is acquired. Unfortunately, that could take as much as 3 months...hopefully not. Now that's what I call stepping up to the plate!
Special shout out to the staff there...Melissa, Vicky, Mike and even the trainee (sorry, didn't get her name) were fantastic! Melissa did an excellent job explaining the issue and her honesty about it means I can trust in them for all my prescription lenses needs.
Now, let's just hope everything follows through as explained, which is up to Lenscrafters! Thanks for coming through for your customers Lenscrsfters!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. Our team is some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Chase Tillery
text: Absolutely love my glasses. The staff was super helpful in educating me on the different types of progressive lenses. 10/10 recommended

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Stephen Edwards
text: I went to LensCrafters to get my new prescription filled. I received excellent service. The salesperson was courteous, friendly, attentive to my needs, and helpful in making the right choices for my new eyeglasses.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: jared french
text: Awesome service every time I visit Dr. Cook and All sales representative involved. I would recommend this LensCrafters any and every time

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Our associates strive to provide the best possible service. We are happy to hear about your positive experience and look forward to seeing you again!

name: John Walter
text: I went there today and Melissa helped shape my glasses to fit better. She was so kind and professional. Thank you!

resp.text: Hi! Thank you so much for your review. We are excited to hear Melissa was able to help make your experience in LensCrafters a great one. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Lee Tibbetts
text:
Bait and switch. Their system was down and couldn’t discuss price with insurance but they really pushed the polycarbonate lens, because they can make them in-house. Talked about plastic and was told they would have to be ordered. Also discussed the need for blue light filter, at which time there was no mention that the filter wasn’t available for plastic.

Get a call a few days later when system is back up and given a price and told blue light isn’t available in plastic lenses. According to the LensCrafters website and online ordering it IS available in plastic. I’ve always been suspicious of their charges and now I know to stay away.

Instead of showing us prices for what we asked just kept asking what our budget was like a used car salesperson.

Another example is when they put my son in Ray Ban branded lenses (most expensive) when we only asked for regular polycarbonate a few years ago.

If you want transparency and fair pricing just order from the LensCrafters website and take out the dishonest sales people.

resp.text: Hello Lee, thank you so much for sharing your experience. Please go to https://www.luxotticacustomercare.com/lenscrafters to provide your information so we can contact you and work to resolve the issue.

Overall this entire team went above and beyond and I will continue to rave about this LensCrafters. Thank you all for making my experience go from night to day!

Unfortunately, I don't really know whether or not I could give a positive review on being a patient....Called the first time over an hour ago to hopefully make an appointment as a new patient for a simple refraction  for an eyeglass prescription.....was told by the person who answered after pressing "3" on my phone that they would call me back in less than five minutes (they took my name and number)....They also told me they had a 4:00pm appointment for Wednesday/May 26th (I called at 11:52am on Tuesday/today/May 25th)....told them that would be fine, and that I would also gladly take any afternoon appointment for today that might become available later in case of a cancellation by another patient....the person never agreed to that, but again responded that I would receive a return phone call in a few minutes or less....I agreed...Phone call ended.....Fast forward to over an hour later...I call them again because never received a return phone call...(No problem, it can happen.)....However,  after explaining to the person answering that I never received a return phone call, the person answering the phone on this second attempt (sounded like same person, but she said  she was not), started taking my name/number again,, along with other identifiable info only to tell me that the first afternoon appointment now was on June 2nd at 2:10pm....lol.

Thus, after considering her demeanor, as well as the person with whom I talked who never returned my phone call, I just told her I would pass on the appointment and find another provider....

Hey, at least I tried EyeCare Associates: Greystone....The best to all of you.

text: I am unfortunately someone who doesn’t go to the Eye Dr. To be honest I have never been to even see one. So you can imagine my nerves were through the roof with not knowing what to expect. The staff were superb, from first walking in, going to the exam room, to picking out my glasses, to the fitting and then to leaving. The nerves just swept right away thanks to these ladies. And even though I received news I didn’t want (eyeglasses) I was able to walk out of there knowing I had some beautiful glasses coming to me soon. It was actually at random that I came to the Decatur location but I am super glad I did. The best experience I’ve ever received hands down and I would recommend them to anyone who ask. Thank you all so much for making my first experience enjoyable and less nerve racking. You guys keep up the amazing work and I hope Dr Teichmiller knows how blessed he is to have you ladies!!!!!!

name: Taylor Bracken
text: Dr. Teichmiller and his staff are AMAZING! They are super sweet and make you feel so welcomed! They have the best personalities and, you can definitely tell they all love their job! My husband has worn CRT contact lenses since he was in the 8th grade, and he was limited to what eye doctor he could go to because not all of them do CRT's. He just so happened to get a decent scratch on his eye from them one night and, could barely open his eye. So, the next morning I called his eye doctor to get him in ASAP and they said they couldn't seem him for a month! So I told him I would find a place even if we have to drive out of state, but i ended up finding the MyEyeDr office in Decatur, AL and once I gave them a call they had him in the next day!! They were just WONDERFUL! He was very pleased with his service here, and needless to say Dr. Teichmiller and his staff will continue to be his go to for all his eye care needs! He recommended I go their for my exam and, so I did and he was right I WILL NOT be going anywhere else for my eye exams! They are just super helpful, caring, and will really help you stay in your budget! Thank you all for helping me make the right decision for my eye care needs! And thank you all for treating my husband in his emergent situation when noone else would!!! Yall all would be 10's on my star chart, if there were that many to give!! Yall keep up the EXCELLENT customer service, and your kind hearts!!!!!!

text: Great experience.  Doctor & entire team are informative, patient and friendly. Explained in detail the best contacts/glasses for myself and my children - along with what my insurance would cover.  Highly Recommend.

resp.text: Thank you, Amanda, for this wonderful review. We deeply appreciate knowing that our doctor and team took such marvellous care of you while visiting our Decatur location. Your feedback will be shared with them. Also, if anyone in your family is in need of another pair of glasses, we have an exclusive offer that is running until March 15th. You may purchase a Ray-Ban frame and single vision lenses for only $199.00. Please stop by at your convenience for more details. Thanks again!

name: Nick Heflin
text: The lady's upfront treated me so good and made sure I was comfortable and if I needed anything. When I got back to see the Doc he was very nice and made sure I understood everything he was about to do. I had one of the best experiences I have ever had at and eye appointment. Thank you MyEyeDr. You will have my business for now on.

resp.text: Hi Nick, we are honored to have received your 5-star review and that you had the opportunity to experience our friendly team members in Decatur, AL. Our doors are always open to new patients and we are proud to have you as apart of the MyEyeDr family! We look forward to seeing you during your next visit with us. Warm regards.

name: Brandon Stricklin
text: Best staff around.

resp.text: Hi Brandon, Thank you for your kind 5 star review. We are happy to see you have had a positive experience in our office. Our trusted community doctors and associates are committed to prioritizing your care and assisting with all of your vision needs. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Warm Regards, Patient Relations.

name: Matt Rouse
text: Even with restrictions in place during Covid-19, I found the office staff and Dr. Teichmiller to be incredibly helpful and informative. I had a great experience during my eye exam and received a great discount on a combo order of new glasses and contacts.

resp.text: Hi Matt, we are super pleased by your satisfaction with our Decatur, AL staff. We strive to make each visit a pleasant experience, and Dr. Teichmiller and our team are commended for their hard efforts. Thank you for sharing your amazing feedback. Don't forget to check out our upcoming specials during your next visit. Best regards.

name: Soraea Soria
text: Best place for an eye exam. We are a family of 7 and we all come here for our exams. Friendly staff and the doctor is great!

resp.text: Hello Soraea, Wow! Thank you for your all-star rating! Your recommendation means the world to us, and we’re truly honored to have earned your valuable trust.  Here at MyEyeDr, we keep patients' satisfaction front and centered in our platform.  Again, thanks for letting the world know how we are doing!  Warm Regards,

name: Heather Phillips
text: Love MyEyeDr in Decatur!!!!

resp.text:
Hi Heather,
Thank you for the 5-star review.  We are committed to providing our patients with personalized eye care.  Our doctors and teams are friendly, knowledgeable, and passionate about your vision wellness.  We hope to see you again soon.
Kind regards, Patient Relations

text:
(Translated by Google) All the workers are attentive and friendly.
They take care of their eyes seriously. Ask about Mikayla because she is so helpful and knows a lot about the styles of the glasses. And she speaks Spanish !!!

The whole team is great. They really care. Ask for Mikayla because she knows a lot about glasses fashion and she Speaks Spanish !!!

name: Michael Ashworth
text: Waiting room is freezing ! . I never complain or send my food back at a restaurant,  but I did say something about the air. They said" it's not a Heat pump " ...if that's the case then it would work better . DUH ....But the PROBLEM IS  the freaking thermostat is set on "ON"   and has been blowing HARD  for two hours now.....it should be on AUTO . The receptionist area is obviously on another thermostat along with bathrooms. They leave the sliding glass open until they get cold and then close it.  Most in building have 4 or more years of college but no common sense.

name: Amy Brightbill
text: friendly and highly efficient.

name: Rocky Redding
text:
Absolutely awesome doctor. He gave me more information than anyone ever did.
Super intelligent and friendly.

name: Craig Moore
text: Super nice people. One of 3 offices (Tuscumbia, Muscle Shoals, Florence.) Good doctors and friendly technicians. They accept many different insurance plans. They take appointments as well as walk ins. recommended this place to several friends.

name: Troy Martin
text: Great frame selection,Service and Dr Basden was friendly and my glasses turned out GREAT

name: Mysti Summer
text: Best staff and doctor ever

name: Albertina Page
text:
This visit was very good. Front desk staff not the best in personalities. Paperwork ask to consent to information you haven’t received. Like the wagon before the horse. Nothing is explained until after you’ve had your vitals taken.  Then you’re escorted to the Dental exam area.

This Dentist was a Dentist Doctor. Very caring and knows her profession. I really liked her consulting with another Dentist for confirmation on a life living outcome.

Previous visit was terrible. Front desk staff a little bit more informative but not friendly. Fake if you’re having a bad day but greet with courtesy.  Then my iPhone was stolen. They denied seeing me with the phone. But the find my phone app located the phone in their office Sarrell until 9pm that night.

The next day after they opened only one staff (Latino) member took me back and showed she was trying to help.The others shrugged their noses as I know you were here but it is if no relevance to me.

The dentist male had been rude and told me I could go to another Dental Office anytime . As if I didn’t have knowledge of that.  I’m a retired Nurse of 35 years . Not only Med Surg but Surgery also and Medical offices.

Not asking anything but children can be traumatized by Doctors of all specialty. I had 3 children there and when I told them we had to go back it was a nightmare.

Finally I promised if that same Doctor was there we would leave if no one else would see them.
Overall this Dentist was #5 the best.

resp.text: Albertina, Thank you for your feedback. f you'd like to talk more about this, please send an email with your contact information to feedback@greatdentalplans.com.

name: Holly Knighten
text: I absolutely love Sarrell Dental. My daughter has had quite a few teeth pulled, top and bottom spacers put in and eye testing done. Each time we've been they have been very respectful to us. They take the time to make sure my daughter is comfortable and isn't feeling any pain. Wait time in the lobby has never been longer than 10-15 minutes and time in the back has never been longer than about 25-30 minutes. They are very considerate of my daughter when she goes and have always talked her through any process of what they have to do. We will always be a loyal Sarrell customer.

resp.text: Holly, thank you for taking the time to leave us this review! We really appreciate the kind feedback. Its great to hear that you and your daughter continue to enjoy your experience with us!

name: Charena Noland
text: The staff is kind and caring. My child has had several procedures and they made sure he was calm and comfortable they were very patient with him and answered any questions I had.

name: Jahmillia Owens
text: My daughter had a very bad experience with her previous dentist she was terrified to go to a Dentist!! We went here and the staff and the Dentist was so great they made her so comfortable and explained the procedure step by step!! Needless to say she is NO longer afraid of the dentist!! Great Place

name: Stevie Acker
text: This is the best dentist office that you can go to Miss B is just absolutely fantastic the staff is absolutely fantastic my kids will not go to another dentist I am highly recommended this

resp.text: Thanks for sharing, Stevie!

name: Lori Warren
text: I find the staff very patient with my son who is very active and also gets anxious. They are  also fexible with our schedule. We always have a good experience with their friendly and professional staff.

name: Marykatherine Lewis
text: Arry and Dr Barry-Blocker are the best and i will good back

name: Ebony Carter
text: Second time scheduling appointments for my kids, we get there and the door is locked and no answer when I called. Second time having to take off work and check the kids out of school. Neither time did I receive a call or any notification of whatever the situation may be or to reschedule. I am absolutely furious😡

resp.text:
Ebony,
We apologize that you had this experience and we understand your frustration with this situation. We'd like to talk with you more about what happened. Please send and email to feedback@greatdentalplans.com with your contact information and a member of our team will be in touch. Thank you!

name: Sara G
text: This place is terrible! The staff is very rude and they do not help you at all! I get that you have to wait at a dentists office but this place makes you wait 6 hours! I would recommend any other place but this one! Actually I would recommend not getting your teeth fixed at all than going to this place!! Send your kid to a decent dentist office!

name: Sharissa Jefferson
text: The staff was kind and friendly with my children. They made sure to check any concerns I had with my child's teeth.

name: patrice white
text: Everytime I bring my daughter it's always a pleasure, the staff is awesome and very caring,  I've recommended them to many friends and they have changed dentist to come here.

name: Jennifer Nicole Haven-Cammon
text: I love this place 100% they all are very friendly and do a great job with the kids

resp.text: Jennifer, thank you for taking the time to leave us such a kind review!

name: Jorxxdrip
text: I've had 2 bad experiences with sarell dental but this last one was awful. My boys have been going for 6 years too. This dentist was a male and he at first was very friendly and encouraging. He numbed my babies gums and the gave him a shot to numb him. I  knew he would cry bc he did before. But the dentist said to him, why are you still crying, I'm not even touching it anymore. Are you gonna cry or man up. Then the dentist started trying to loosen my babies tooth bc it had to be pulled. This part was ok, he was calm and the assistant was encouraging. Then he changed tools and began to pry and my baby screamed from the top of his lungs because he felt the pain. The dentist fusses at him saying it's numb you don't feel anytginh!!😲 I am 40 and I recently had to have a 2 teeth pulled and I still felt it after my numb shot. I asked my baby afterwards did he feel the pain and be said yes. I feel so bad for not protecting him and telling the dentist to stop. My baby looked at me like he wanted to ask why I didn't help him. The staff is amazing but don't know about dentist.

resp.text: Nikki, we value your loyalty to our clinic and apologize for your recent disappointment. We are looking into this and would be happy to talk with you more. Please reach out to us at patientadvocate@greatdentalplans.com with the best way to contact you so we can be in touch. Thank you for your feedback.

name: Shaq Davis
text: I love the staff here!

name: teresa moore
text: They will not schedule appt on a timely manner they call and want you to come that day or wait another month or two and wait time is long when you can get appt

resp.text: Teresa, we would first like to apologize for this experience. While it is not our choice to make patients wait long periods of time for an appointment, that is often an issue beyond our control. It is our policy to alert patients of any last minute cancelations and/or openings in our schedule in effort to remedy this issue and provide timely appointments. We prioritize patients experiencing pain, and work them in for same day appointments when possible. We are looking into this situation and would like to know more. Please reach out to us by sending an email to patientadvocate@greatdentalplans.com, so we can discuss in more detail. We appreciate your feedback.

name: Fenix Owens
text: We Love Dr. B !! She is amazing !!!

name: Tristian “Willis” Grove
text: Best customer service.

name: Jessica
text: Do y’all check children’s eye my son is 3 and a eye place somewhere in Tuscaloosa wants to send him to Birmingham cause he got one eye that is lazy and the other eye is gonna right and don’t have time to go to Birmingham need a place to take him to in Tuscaloosa instead

resp.text: Jessica, we do provide eye care in Tuscaloosa. Please give us a call and we will be happy to set up an appointment with our optometrist for your son!

name: charlene allen
text: Employees are extremely nice and helpful! Dr. Campbell-awesome, easy to talk to and listened to all my concerns! The young guy that helped me pick out my frames had excellent taste and was fun to shop with! My glasses were ready super fast! Will definately recommend to my friends!

text: I’ve been coming here for years and it’s always been great. Today’s visit though was one of the best I’ve ever experience! The staff was super friendly, and I’ve never had an exam done in such a timely manner before! Keep being amazing!

I just ordered contacts over the phone because I live In a new city, and Ms. Terrish went ABOVE AND BEYOND to help me. She was funny, professional, & kind. I cannot give this employee or this business enough praise! Thank you so much!

name: Brittnee Serda
text: I brought my daughter in this morning for a eye app. It was her 2nd one and Marcus the guy who checked us in and walked us to the room made sure to make my daughter feel comfortable and calm her nerves. I really appreciate the service. Thank you so much for being friendly and sweet. ❤️ Will definitely go back.

name: FUU CHAN
text:
They checked my eyesight very carefully and examined me. Also, when I chose eyeglasses, I had a lot of choices and it was a good opportunity. It is highly recommended to adjust the glasses here.

You need to make a reservation by phone.

name: alfred keely
text: When we made the appointment for the eye exam, we were told that we didn't have to get our glasses from them. I have used the eye doctor there in the past, and was happy with the quality of the exam. I went there today for my appointment,  and the doctor side was excellent. Then I was escorted to the eyeglass side. When I told them I wasn't getting glasses today, and asked for my PD, they refused to give me that information. Then she said something really brilliant. That that measurement is only for their lab, and it varies from one lab to another. REALLY!  The distance from center to center of my pupils is the same wherever it gets measured. My wife is seriously ill, and a  $500.00 pair of glasses isn't possible. She was rude. I'll never go back.

name: Jaelene Rivera
text: Been there for almost 3 or 4 years and still worth to come here. Fantastic customer service and Friendly staff. I love to come here and I love my glasses so much!

name: Linda Martinez
text: Ashley was the most helpful and kind associate ever.  Quick service with a smile!  Highly recommend

name: Carey Frasier
text: Love this place.... so so helpful. lots of style and smile..

name: Stacy Wilborn
text:
I have purchased regular glasses, prescription sunglasses, safety glasses, and my four year old step son's glasses from Marx Optical. Every time I have come to Marx Optical, I have had a perfect experience! They have always been so helpful in answering all of my questions. Kathy has been there on every visit of mine. She is always so good to us, and completely on top of her game. I've noticed her assisting others, multitasking and always prompt, and with a great attitude. I have had Sabrina assist me, she is so helpful and not only brightened my day, but seemed to do the same with everyone else she encountered. And when I brought my step son to get his glasses, I had the assistant of Lindsey and she was so patient and great with him. He has a more complicated prescription and she showed us more options for frames that won't break as easily (considering he's four and full of energy)

I highly recommend Marx Optical! They're quick and will treat you right!

name: Ryan Day
text: I was in Decatur for a weekend in January for a family funeral, coming from out of town, and I stupidly forgot both my glasses and extra daily contacts.  Marx Optical was kind enough to provide me with two days' worth of trial daily contacts at no charge to help me out.  I would highly recommend.  Very nice people.

name: Ulonda Barker
text: My experience with this business have been a terrible one,  after purchasing lens for my glasses on 9/19/2019. On 8/11/2020 used curbside service for glasses last repaired for only tighting frame and prior service for exact same routine service from date of purchase. I returned on 8/21/2020 to curbside service based on one leg cracked, due to frame was tighten to tight to end up with a cracked len. In discussing issue with Service Tech,  I was told to replace len would cost me $125 and their would be nothing else Marx Optical could do. I consider my service that was rendered is a rip off based on less than a year from 9/19/2019 intial purchase and finding  my len cracked in my glass case as I put glasses onto my face for breakfast and service rendered for glasses tighted on 8/11/2020. Personally doing business with inconsiderate respect for it's customers.  Is very disgraceful.

name: Mark Thomason
text: Dr. B does an amazing job of dialing in my prescription. I have tried several other places over the years (we moved) but now I travel back to Decatur to see Dr. B every year. The glasses I got from other places were a waste of money. I ended up coming back to Marx and had them install new lens in my old frames. I will never trust anyone with my eyesight other than Dr. B again.

name: John Kearse
text: I LOVED MY EXPERIENCE WITH THE GREAT WOMEN AT MARX OPTICAL. FROM THE RECEPTIONISTS, TO MY LOVELY DOCTOR, DOWN TO THE ASSISTANTS AND REPRESENTATIVES HANDLING THE FITTINGS. I FELT LIKE FAMILY, NOT ANOTHER CUSTOMER AND WOULD RECOMMEND ANYONE GOING THERE TO GET GREAT STYLISH GLASSES AND TO FEEL LIKE HOME WITH TONS OF SMILES & LOVE AS WELL!!! I ALSO LOVED MY FITTING WITH MS. KRISTINA H. SHE WAS WONDERFUL!!!

text: Recently had an appointment and even though they were in the middle of construction I don't have 1 complaint! It was totally the opposite, they were extremely nice and helpful. The staff went over and beyond for me  I give them 5 full stars. 😊

I’m always appreciative of the service I have got, and this year was no different.

text: Have always gotten courteous , professional service every time I have been here . Even today with the curbside service for just a frame repair , in the rain, everyone was absolutely great !

text: The last three times that I have had to get glasses a wonderful young woman named, Sabrina, has helped me and she is a fantastic person!!!!!  Not only was Sabrina so gosh dang funny she was extremely helpful in helping me choose the right glasses for me.  I vote for Sabrina to get a raise 😁.  Now I am truly promoting Sabrina here but make no mistake.....every person at Marx Optical has been a pleasure to deal with.  I have been going to Marx Optical for the past 7/8 years and I have never had a bad experience. The people are truly great!  Thank you, Pamela W Radford

name: Local 360
text: Wow! Great service! I came in 30 minutes from closing with a broken arm on my VA issued glasses. The staff took them to the back & they were able to repair the glasses and didn't charge me! How great is that for on the spot service! I can see again!

name: Theduis Booth
text:
I had a great experience today in Marx optical, in Decatur. Every one was so nice, and polite.
I must give a special thanks to Ja, she literally took her to help me pick out frames. She never rushed me. Thank you Ja so much for sticking with me.

name: Mackenzie Thrasher
text: This first time glasses wearer is HAPPY! Sabrina and Pam were so helpful and awesome to work with! A love working with a good honest sales team that doesn’t push for the most expensive merchandise! My visit was effortless!

name: Brandon McNutt
text: I visited here for a routine visit. I was helped by one Miss Sabrina who was absolutely fabulous! She took care of me from start to finish and made sure I felt like family the whole time! She was easy to talk to and made me feel comfortable! I would highly recommend this place and I am so thankful for having such a wonderful person like Sabrina that helped me through it all! Not to mention that Dr. Harris was extremely professional and helpful during his evaluation! With the help of Miss Kelly I was able to get an awwsome brand new pair of glasses. I would recommend this place for all your eye Care needs!!

name: Brooke cummings
text: Sabrina was extremely helpful. She was truthful and honest and patient when I tried on every pair and was even nicer when I came to each age because the first pair I bought I didn't love. She's the best! As long as she is there I will always come back.

name: Cyndi Ludwick
text: If you want EXCELLENT customer service, see Sabrina!! She helped me with my glasses today and she is by far the sweetest associate I have EVER met!!! She was honest on what looked good..(and didn’t) on me and was also conscious of my pocketbook!!! I think Marx Optical needs to give her a raise!!!

name: Jo-Amrah Dillingham
text: Lindsey Albright was amazing to work with today. Professional, friendly. No doubt she knew what she was doing. I really appreciated the way she was able to fix my glasses which had been frustrating me for some time. Top quality service. I will return!

name: Faith Rose
text: My experience was amazing. The whole team treated me like family. The really sweet one that helped me her name was Mrs. Sabrina she was so helpful and she really found me a pair of glasses the fit my face very well and that were very nice.😊😊😊😊

name: Rhonda Stoner
text: I cannot say enough fabulous things about this place! The exam staff is efficient and kind. The optical department rocks! All of them! Sabrina helped us today. She is a love! Leidy was in training and she is going to be top-notch as well! It was great to see Miss Linda who has been around for a while and is always a sweetheart. I did not mention everyone by name, but they the staff is wonderful.

name: Ashlea Osborn
text: Kristina H was OUTSTANDING !! She helped us save a whole bunch of money and made our decision better. We was more satisfied with her help then we was when we was looking and we getting help from another lady. She helped us save almost three hundred dollars that we really did not have to spend . We was so stressed about finding some and paying for it but she helped a whole lot. She definitely needs to be recognized !!!!! She explained everything and told us all of our opinions!!

name: Truck Driver
text: 2nd visit in 2 years. I walked in, was given a paper to fill out,.wven though I told them nothing had changed.  Once I finished with completing the paperwork I was taken into a to and again went through the process of putting the info into the computer.  What good is being redundant with this. Also, prior to visit, I was bombarded with text messages on if I planned to make the appointment on time. Place is pathetic!

resp.text:
We are sincerely disappointed your experience with us was not great. Rest assured, your experience and feedback is appreciated in our pursuit of continuously improving the ability to serve.

You are correct, we do currently include up to two reminders prior to visitation, depending on how far in advance you have scheduled. However, this is certainly a feature you can opt-out from as we respect the differing opinions our patients may have with regards to reminders.

Regarding the paperwork and entry into the computer, this is definitely a point at which we are actively looking to streamline, importantly, without sacrificing vital information our Doctors require to provide a high standard of care.

We certainly realize this will not correct your experience, but we genuinely hope you understand our intention is to take your feedback and work harder for all future experiences.

Thank you,
MARX OPTICAL

name: Teiana Walker
text: I had a great experience at Marx Optical from the eye exam to picking out my frames Gail and Joshua were absolutely amazing making sure I looked my best in my glasses. And Kelly was exceptional with the fitting of my glasses. Best place in town to get your eyes checked out. I will also share this on my Facebook because I am a satisfied customer of Marx Optical!!!

name: Vashta Nerada
text: I have never had the pleasure of being helped so efficiently before today’s visit. Terrish was being trained by Sabrina today and they were wonderful, knowledgeable, and so friendly. They made this visit a 5-star event.

name: David Watson
text: Sabrina made my experience at Marx absolutely wonderful.  I was ready to order my glasses on-line because they were much cheaper than the price she originally quoted.  Sabrina told me to hold on a second and let her discuss my reluctance with her superiors.  She came back with a price considerably lower than the online price. I will be requesting Sabrina next year, and hopefully many years to come

name: Ala Bama
text: I visited Marx Optical in Decatur and overheard an employee out front refer to customers as “Love” and she was constantly popping her gum. This drove me crazy listening to it while I waited. I can’t imagine being her coworker and having to listen to the gum popping all day and as a customer, don’t call me “Love.” So unprofessional!!!

name: Tristan Smith
text: Sabrina greeted us with a big ole’ smile right when we walked in. The atmosphere was great and everyone was very welcoming. Got to checkout and it went very smoothly and with Sabrina seeing us off! Great staff!

name: Nathaniel Snow
text: My company sent me to Marx Optical to get my glasses. When I walked I asked the receptionist do my company cover my glasses expense. The other receptionist name Sabrina said what. Like had me in really doubt that my company didn’t do that, but she was only kidding around with me. Then she was sent to help me pick out my glasses. She was really helpful with me to pick out the glasses I would be really satisfied with.  Thanks Sabrina

name: Elfa Arocho
text: We love Sabrina Gibson! She is one of the sweetest most helpful person among your staff! Thanks Marx Optical for a friendly, helpful staff, and competitive prices!

I was shocked as to how well the workers worked together and how much they did to have everything ready for the doctor to do the exam. I went to the other side to get a pair of glasses. I had the pleasure of meeting Sabrina she was super nice and very helpful. Sabrina made the experience fun.

name: Janet Wilkinson
text:
10-30-18-Kristina was a very helpful person & she was very easy to work with in giving her expertise knowledge on getting my lens for my glasses. Love working with people who are knowledgeable & pleasant to work. Linda was able to adjust my glasses so they fit. Her knowledge & willingness to work with my older frames was excellent!
Thank you both.

name: Faye Spivey

I usually deal with Marsha when I visit Marx.
She is always so kind and helpful! Her personality is contagious! She is just super!! She knows what I like when it come to frames for my face shape and always picks the ones she knows I will like.
The staff here does a great job!!

name: April Thompson
text: My Husband is a patient of Marx Optical and I accompanied him at his visit. From the moment I entered the office, I never once felt like just a "Patient" The caring environment and effortlessly prompt service made me feel as if I were being taken care of by FAMILY. And oh my goodness the charismatic and professional 3 ladies by the names of Sabrina, Leidy  and (one other sweet lady who said such uplifting and kind words to me whose name I apologetically forgot 😔❤) are 3 of many reason I'd strongly suggest you go visit the Marx Optical family! I promise.. You won't be disappointed. 😀😀😀

text: Sabrina Gibson was amazing! She asked what kind I liked and ran with it. When I found the glasses I liked she went the extra mile to order them in a different color so they would be perfect!

name: Rebecca Bray
text: Sabrina is your woman y'all. Amazing job with helping me find what suited my face. The doctor was excellent as well!

name: rolando mcclain
text: By far the best experience I’ve ever had getting an eye exam. Sabrina Gibson did an awesome job assisting us today. We were in and out in a very timely manner. We will definitely be back.

text: Had a wonderful experience today!  Sabrina helped me find the perfect pair of glasses and she was amazing.  Very knowledgeable and willing to assist me in finding the glasses that will best suit my unique needs.  Thank you!

name: Hondahaney
text: way way overpriced....

text: Sabrina was so helpful and made the process of getting glasses for my mom with her new prescription a breeze!! She really listened to what we needed and has a great personality, which is a huge plus!! Thanks so much!

text: Sabrina was a WONDERFUL help with my glasses I came in with frames and she helped me find new and better ones. TOTALLY SATISFIED with her customer service! Thank you so much!

name: Dylan Reiser

name: BreAnna Elliott
