I’m an observant person and I notice how everything ran smoothly even with them going through a renovation. I would recommend anyone to visit the Decatur location on Beltline road if they’re in need of an eye exam or simply getting your glasses readjusted. My service was swift and I also received my prescription glasses the same day in less than an hour after my exam which was amazing!  I’m looking forward to my next checkup in a year to see my progress and also to visit the friendly staff.

name: Jonathan D. Wynn
text:
Have been using them for several years now.  Staff and Dr. Harris are always nice and professional.  I don't have vision insurance, but price on visit is always reasonable.  Wait time is a little long but I never make an appointment either.  I'm always a "walk-in".  The eyeware part is a bit higher on retail prices for contacts so I choose to buy my contacts online.  They are always nice and helpful in providing my written Rx to purchase my contacts elsewhere.  Overall, I would recommend Dr. Harris @ Marx Optical to anyone looking for a good optometrist.......

Update : I have officially quit seeing them after  10+ years.  After sitting waiting for almost 3hours with an eye injury,  I felt as though greater concern should have been given to at least administer a triage type exam to assess the situation,  but none was given.  In much pain,  I decided to leave after nearly 3 hours of waiting, since no concern was given.  I don't know if  my doctor knew that an eye injury was waiting,  but if not, his office staff have been poorly trained to deal with medical necessity Vs.  Standard eye exams.  I have seeked out an ophthalmologist and will begin seeing Dr Cain from now on instead of any optometrist office.

text: It was time for an eye exam and I recall using Marx Optical/Decatur Eye Institute a few years back so decided to make an appointment. text: I have made 3 visits to his office and will not return.  Dr. Anz might be wonderful but I have decided that he does not work for me. I am an educated person, but I was treated that way. His only direct comment to me was "move your purse."

resp.text: Ms. Westbrook, thank you for taking time to review our practice. I'm extremely disappointed we failed to continue to meet your expectations and regret hearing your interaction with Dr. Anz during last appointment was not to our standard and caused you to feel this way. We truly care about our patients and want to learn from your experience so we as a TEAM, including Dr. Anz, can make improvements. Would you please send me an email with a good contact number so I can call you to discuss your experience in more detail and offer you a personal apology? If you'd like to talk Dr. Anz as well I know he will be disappointed as well to hear this and want to know how he can improve so we can accomplish a few things. My email is josh@medicalartseye.com or you can message me through our Facebook or Google business page. My direct office number is 334-321-9705 but I'm still deployed to EAMC helping with our Covid-19 response so email will be the quickest way for us to connect. We look forward to talking with you & greatly appreciate you helping us improve our delivery of care! -Josh (Manager)

name: Kenzi G
text:
I was referred to this clinic from an urgent care, and an appointment was made for me. I had a severe viral infection in my eyes, and as you can imagine, I was in pain and eager for relief. When I arrived for my scheduled appointment, I was told by the front desk staff that there was no appointment for me on file. I showed them my referral sheet with the doctor's name and appointment time. They continued to refuse me and tell me I had no appointment. The woman checking patients in was very kind and tried her best to help me in a difficult situation. The rest of their office staff was the epitome of unprofessional. Rude, refusing service to a person with an appointment. Yelling, rolling eyes, and snatching papers. My five year old knows better than to act that way. When I called the urgent care and confirmed that I did have an appointment, the Medical Arts Eye Clinic staff tried to cover their mistake by saying they'd been given the wrong name for the appointment, even though my medical records were sent in my name....
No apology offered. No kindness shown to a patient in severe pain. I will never go to this office again. I will find any other eye care provider in the county before I would let these rude people treat me ever again.

resp.text: Thank you for providing feedback on your experience.  I apologize we did not meet your expectations.  If you would be willing to discuss the details further with me I will give you a call today.  -Josh (Manager)

text: Wonderful experience.  Dr. Anz is a skilled doctor with a compassionate manner.  The team was efficient and professional.  I highly recommend.

name: Justin Reed
text: I have always great service here from the time I walk in to the time I walk out. I was greeted by Kimberly at the front desk with a smile. In less than 1 minute, I was taken in the back room, where Lisa went through my routine eye exam and then, she took me to the back and Dr. Wallace was working on my vision asking questions and answering my questions about concerns.  After the eye exam, I was taken to choose my frames with the help of Jessica. She helped me choose some frames and took me step by step on my lenses. It is always a wonderful experience, when I go in there and I would recommend anyone needing eye care to go to the Family Eye & Laser in Ozark, Alabama.

name: Harold Phillips
text: During my last visit I had the most pleasant experience ever during an eye exam. Everyone was so thorough and precise and professional but yet warm. Thank you Dr Wallace and team!

resp.text: Harold, we were so glad to have you in our office recently! Thanks for the incredibly kind review of our team!

name: Lamoina Brooks
text: Dr. Wallace is exceptional.  She is thorough, patient and  knowledgeable with a personal touch in caring for her patient. I highly recommend her for your eye care needs. Her staff is great.

text: As always I am quite satisfied.

name: Sandy Gainey
text: This office was very flexible with working me in during my lunch hour and pretty much at the last minute and I appreciated that.  Since I felt there was a problem with my prescription they helped me go through the tests again to confirm it’s accuracy.  I believe we found the source of the problem I was having.  The only reason I didn’t give them 5 stars is that out of four different assistants who helped me this day other than the eye doctor only one of them was friendly and cheerful.  The other three just tolerated me.  The doctor’s great.  I recommend using her business, would be better if she updated her staff with people who are happy to help others.

name: Kim Newman
text: Everyone was very kind and  helpful to me and my mother thank you guys for  everything💕

resp.text: We see patients as family and we are so glad to have you and your mother in the office!

text: Family Eye and Laser, in Ozark turned out to be one of the most pleasant medical appointments I've had in quite a while. All of the staff were friendly and helpful. Every process was explained to me and the doctor was thorough in her examination of my eyes, including the complications that diabetes can cause. I'd recommend this facility to anyone in need of a comprehensive eye exam.

resp.text: We are so glad you had a great experience at our office! Thanks for the great review!

name: Terry Creel
text: I had an infection on my eyelid and just moved to yhe area and was in alot of pain.the eye lid it self was inflamed really bad.so i located a eye center only a couple miles from me.one of my sisters had recommend a Dr.Tammy Wallace.so she had made an appt for me ironically the following day.i was somewhat skeptical of seeing someone i had no ideal of what there professionals would be like.i was there maybe 15 mins and a young lady came and greeted me took me to a room and seemed very concerned of the problem.soon after her exam Dr.Wallace came in and time with me checked out the problem and said she thought she could basically resolve my problem.had me to go home and do these few things and to come back in a week and if that wasnt the problem she would seek extra testing.she gave me a prescription of antibioctics.within a couple days the swelling had gone down.on the next visit she was pleased of the progress.that Dr knew exactly what it was before i had lft her office.Dr.Wallace is truly a godsent for me.very knowledgeable and a personality that could light up four city blocks.my thanks to her superior service and bedside manor.only wish there were more Drs like her around.

name: Corinthia Bennett

resp.text: Corinthia, we are so glad you had a pleasant experience and YES, we do check blood pressure which surprises some of our patient but there is a myriad of systemic diseases, like blood pressure, that can cause ocular complications. So your blood pressure is an important piece of information for your medical doctor AND your eye doctor.

resp.text: I am so glad you enjoyed your visit at our office! We have been working hard to resist the transition of the industry into cheaper lower quality products. At this time, we do our best to offer products that we would wear ourselves, that will stand up to the daily rigors our patients put them through, and at the best price possible. We design our glasses to provide the best in vision, comfort, and style. Either way, we hope that your experience won’t keep you from returning to see our doctor in the future.

name: Susan Crawley
text: This concerns my husband, he started going to Dr. John Mason, when he started having problems with his right eye, to find out later when he was sent to Dr. Mason, he had a Retina vein ocullison in his eye, also better know as a stroke in his eye!  They have done several treatments to his eye especially this last September he had to have surgery when his eye started bleeding behind the eye, they repaired it through this surgery, he did lose partial sight in his eye when the stroke occurred but they have helped him so much to have a balance in his eye to and his other eye to secure that his sight will remain good! He goes for regular check ups about every four months! I would highly recommend these doctors to anyone that has eye issues beyond your regular eye doctor that you see yearly! I imagine you probably need a referral since they are specialist! Be sure and check with your insurance provider!

name: Elysia Bailey
text: I have had to bring my mother-in-law to the eye center a fee times. They always make me feel welcome as well. The rooms are very comfortable. Their food is great. I am surprised by the food every time.

name: Rachel Vega
text: ER intake ladys were awesome. They help me get my 7 year old son with cornea abrasion seen asap.

name: Barbara Wilson
text: Dr was great, explained everything. Staff polite.  Time spent in ER, 11 hrs. Needs improving. Only 1 person in waiting room when I arrived.

name: Will Slappey
text: The other day my 16 month old son needed to be seen here. The nurses gave him a stuffed monkey and were so sweet. The doctor that saw William was thorough and communicated well. This was our third experience here in the last three years, and all of our visits have gone well.

name: Mary Ladner
text:
I just left the emergency room and going in I was skeptical, mainly because I had read the other reviews.  I am so glad I didn't feed into the negativity and decided to judge for myself. Dawn was my nurse and so pleasant and patient with me.  I also was seen by Dr Juan? spelling may be incorrect but also very nice. I learned what my mother had already taught me, never assume you know based on the opinions of others, judge for yourself. Great advice momma R.I.P and thank you. I am still listening :)

Also the Dr. can really rock a handlebar mustache!

name: George Guilford
text:
First impressions are everything in repeat business! I am very disappointed in my "very short" visit with Dr. Rosenstiel and staff. (Well I didn't even meet Dr. Rosenstiel???!) Being that I live in Montgomery, I have to request a day off for ALL my eye appointment visits.  I am not new to UAB Callahan Eye Hospital as I've had multiple surgeries within the last three years there. As a matter of fact I just had an appointment there two weeks ago with the incredible Dr. Priscilla Fowler and staff.   I've been diagnosed with Kerataconus and Dr. Priscilla Fowler is my primary eye doctor.  Dr. Fowler and staff are some of the nicest people I've met in the eye care industry. Earlier this year and this past month I received the Cross-Linking  procedure.  I spent over $6000 within the last three years at Callahan eye.  Dr. Fowler and staff treat me with respect on EVERY visit,  yet on December 10 with Dr. Rosenstiel and staff I felt the lesser of.  This visit was scheduled to replace my old sclera lenses with new.  You would think before my arrival they would've did their research on my condition.  Upon my arrival in the room, Dr. Rosenstiel's nurse asked if I ever had sclera lenses?? (I'VE HAD SCLERA CONTACTS FOR THE LAST 6 YEARS??) From there, he goes straight into and I quote, "before we even see you, you have to pay X amount of dollars!?. Furthermore, he adds, "The Lenses will be an additional $XXXX.XX amount of dollars to get them?   Now at this point I was feeling as though they did not want to help me as Dr. Fowler and staff did you for the last couple of years.?  Now do mind you I've already spent thousands of dollars to get my eyes corrected.  The money is not an option, but I felt inferior to his demands.  I also wondered have they even looked in my charts from previous visits.? "Have they even checked my insurance" I thought to myself?  At that point I asked him a series of questions in terms of verifying my insurances and deductibles. To no avail he says nothing will be covered. Now as I mentioned money would not be a concern as I've spent a lot of money to fix my Eye disease. ( As well as the removal of an tumor in my eyelid two years prior ).  More questions came to mind in this parlay with Dr. Rosenstiel's nurse.  At this point I felt that the nurse is trying to rush me so he leaves then comes back with a business card and prices on it. He then states, " if you have any questions please call Melissa" on the business card. I agreed and proceeded to leave. Upon leaving, I felt very embarrassed to even be there. I rushed out and got in my car. I kept thinking to myself "have they even check my insurance". So I called my wife, and she confirmed we do have Eye insurance.  I decided I needed to call them back to confirm and verify with them that I have insurance, the same insurance I've used last three years. Two calls later and one left message, I still have not heard from Melissa, Dr. Rosenstiel , or the male nurse that was talking to me. I never even got to meet Dr. Rosenstiel??? I will still come up to visit Dr. Fowler but I will do my business elsewhere in finding new Sclera lenses!
Very disappointing!!

name: John McDole
text: Whether visiting the Emergency Room or scheduled surgery this is the place to be for anything eye related. Over the years we have never had a problem or bad experience or even an unpleasant encounter. Everyone is very professional. The doctors offices being within the complex make it convenient and the parking deck connects to the complex.

name: April Mejia
text: Staff was extremely nice and professional. Amazing doctors and nurses.

name: Christy Pierce
text: Awesome atmosphere. Friendly and professional staff. Highly recommend.

name: Ethan Vaughn
text:
I took the day off from work to drive 2.5 hours to take my son here. Apparently the optometrist had to take the day off the day before so she was seeing yesterday's patients as well as todays. Which is fine.
What is not fine is the complete lack of foresight or common courtesy to call today's patients to inform them they may have to wait longer we have been waiting for 2 hours and are looking at atleast another hour wait before our son is seen. This office is a perfect storm of incompetence and disregard for their patients.

name: Kevin G
text: Had a major eye injury last week. The nurses and dr quickly relieved my pain and identified the problem quickly. Today I have most of my vision back due to them.

name: Glenda Cook
text: Spent time and alot of money on the doctors and prescriptions and with no answer about my eye pain.The doctors and staff were kind but it still didn't help in the end.

text: Best Doctors! Waiting time is cut in half! Diagnosis and exams are private issues. Insurance coverage is acceptable. Lots of parking space. Friendly employees and emergency care is available.

name: Teresa Hill Berry
text: I hope you have better luck than I did. I prefer the clinic on the first floor the Lyons Clinic with Doctor Reid.

name: Shawna Gomez
text:
Only because I can not put zero as an option! I spoke with a man ,who barely allowed me to even talk, and he kept telling me there's no way my daughter's appointment is there, I still have the letter as proof. My daughter is not even 2 and needs eye surgery badly. Her appointment is scheduled for 4/2/18 but as I said he told me there is no way she has one there.

I have 2 kids they are my world. This issue needs to be resolved. If my daughter doesn't get her surgery because the man I spoke to is incompetent, I'm not going to be a very happy mom and if any of you are parents you'd understand.

name: Chris Mahan
text: It is very concentrated on helping people live better, and the medical staff is excellent.

name: Miss Un-PC
text:
My mom and I were rear ended severely a while back by a young boy more interested in his cell phone than his driving.
At first, I didn't notice anything wrong. Later that night, my right eye had a shadow-like film over it. I didn't think anything about it at first. Later that week, I notice my vision was decreasing. I was half blind in my right eye. I went to my eye doctor. After a check-up, he said my retina was partially detached. And, had I waited a week or so longer, I would've have gone permanently blind in that eye. I got an appointment at the Callahan Eye Foundation.
The doctors, nurses and receptionist were very nice. The surgeon did a fantastic job reattaching my retina. The only thing that was a bit frustrating was that gas bubble. But, it kept pressure on my retina. Now, my vision in the right eye was like it was before the accident.
If you have a problem with your eyes that a regular eye doctor can't treat, then I highly recommend the Callahan Eye Foundation.

name: Jay J
text: I wish I could give a minus star. I stopped by here with a rash on my skin near my eye after hours. I was afraid that it might swell up and cause me further issue. They sent me to the ER. I asked could I see someone not in the ER so I would not have to pay so much, but they said no. So I saw a doc in the ER. He looked at my eye and said it was a common rash and said he would give me some antibiotics. He stepped out with the door open and talked to the nurse. I caught them laughing and looking back at me because I came in for a skin rash near my eye.  I believe I was in there for almost 2 hours and I did not see another patient. The lady at the front desk was rude, the staff was rude and even with insurance I still had to pay over $300 .

name: Josie Williams
text: Very knowledgeable about everything i ask never left me wondering i never had any doubt about what was going to happen. Very professional teams

name: M Kennedy
text: They were very nice and took the time to make sure my family got my phone and valuables before surgery. Very caring people.

name: Andy Pesterfield
text:
Do not take your child here.  You can get the exact same care at children's hospital.  1)they use the same doctors 2) children's hospital has a lot more respect your time.  I've been to both....The eye clinic time was RIDICULOUS,  2) children's accepts more insurance providers like medishare.

I spent a lot more money a LOT more time, and less customer service.

They couldn't even call in our prescription after being there for 5 hours!!!!!!

Waited one hour for the nurse to come back with our prescription.  No call for that.

Very disappointed.

text: My daughter went to the ER there. He eye was red and she couldn't see threw it. The docs there said there was a white spot on her cornea but they didn't know what it was. Instead off calling in an attending doctor they sent her home work gel drops and told her to make appt with cornea doc the next week. She went in on weekend. Turns out she had a bad corneal infection.  For this I have to pay $100 copay didn't even treat her at all

text: Very rude and uninformed staff!!! When I made a appointment, the rep said my insurance was accepted. However, when I got there they said they only accepted VSP. I have the Federal Employees Program Vision insurance. When I showed them the Federal Vision Website listed them as providers, they told me it was wrong and the only insurance they took was VSP. So I went all the way down there and took off work for nothing! How does the biggest eye hospital in Birmingham, not accept federal insurance? Sounds fishy to me! Then they wanted me to pay $15 to park! Absolutely not!

name: Bert Bloomston
text:
I was extremely pleased with the  personal care and attention provided me when I arrived at CEH. I arrived a few minutes prior to the appointed time and waited just a short time prior to be taken to a bed where I was prepped for my cataract surgery. I honestly did not have the feeling that I was in a medical facility, but a facility designed  for the extreme care and concern for a person. All of us, I believe, have anxiety prior to a surgical procedure, however the staff made me feel comfortable and relaxed. I took special note that Mr. Sprayberry was on the floor chatting with the patients and the staff. That is certainly a rarity in today's world of medicine and certainly could not be found in many or any facility today. Also, I learned that there was patient advocate on the floor.
Congratulations to all and to Dr. Sara Mullins for the outstanding treatment and personal attention. Your hospital is way above just first class.
Thank you again and I told many of my friends about your outstanding service and personal care.

text: Great staff.  Very good to work with.   They explained all parts of the process and specifics about the health of my eyes and eyesight.  Very pleased.

text: The VisualEyes family were so professional, polite, and helpful to my daughter and I. Best experience I've had in a while. Very thorough. I would definitely recommend if you are looking for an eye care office, Dr. Green and his staff will take care great care of you.

name: Vikki Chavis
text: Dr. Green is Awesome! So thorough and caring of his patients. He took the time to make sure I understood the options in depth I have with myopia control for my son. I highly recommend! Environment is warm and friendly with GREAT customer service!!

name: James Bates
text: Had a comprehensive eye-exam done at VisualEyes recently. The staff was very helpful with the exam and navigating their extensive glasses selection! They have a huge selection from a lot of designers and brands. Dr. Green was very helpful in the exam and helped me easily understand what he was doing and why he was doing it. It was nice to have a doctor actually explain things to me about my eye health and vision. I will be recommending VisualEyes and Dr. Green from now on. Excited about my new glasses as well!

name: Lisa F Katz
text: They use high technology equipment to evaluate your vision.  I think it makes your exam more efficient and accurate.  The only thing I found that wasn’t so great for me was their prices were high on frames.  They have very friendly and helpful staff there.

name: Vicki Ladnier
text: Everyone at VisualEyes made me feel welcome and well-cared for! Always ready to answer my questions and never too busy to take time for me. I would highly recommend VisualEyes to all my friends.

name: Nicole Clements
text: The staff here is amazing- from check-in to check-out!! I don't remember her name but the lady who helped me pick out my frames was the best- not only did she help me pick out frames that she thought would look good on me, but she was MORE than patient with me while I sat there taking forever to make a decision. I can't say enough good things about this place, highly recommend!!!

name: Robin Little
text: I went to see Dr. Green today at Visual Eyes.  I was met with a smile and friendly service.  The doctor was very  thorough and explained everything to me.   They carry a huge selection of glasses and their office is beautiful.  If you are looking for an eye doctor.  I would definitely recommend Visual Eyes.

name: Elisha-Hope Weaver
text: Everyone is friendly, helpful and professional.  Your entire process is explained and they give you an opportunity to ask as many questions you need for complete understanding.  Only cons are 1) the location may a bit remote for some 2) the cost of buying glasses in-house is rather steep; more affordable options are needed.

name: Marsha Richardson
text: State of the art equipment and procedures available. Very friendly staff. Attentive Doctor.

name: Erik Montz
text: The folks at VisualEyes were great. Everyone that was part of my visit was very nice and helpful. From the front desk to Dr. Green to the ladies that helped me pick out my glasses. I highly recommend them to anyone.

name: Service @ T-Town H-D
text: The stafff really went above and beyond for me. I would recommend them above all others hands down. I have lived all over the country and have been in glasses for 34 years. This is the best eye Doctor I have ever been too!

name: Cady Weldon
text: The office staff are all so incredibly nice and they always remember me by name. Both they and the doctor give so much personalized attention and spend as much time with me as I need. The office is in a great location, extremely clean, and upscale, and all of their equipment is state-of-the-art. They have a great selection of frames already, but I have a huge head and have a hard time finding frames that fit comfortably and look good, so they were more than happy to order a bunch of additional demos for me to try, which was such a great convenience! I have have already referred all of my friends and coworkers because I really do just believe this place is the best!

name: Gina Creech
text:
My husband and I traveled from Charleston, SC to see Dr Green.  We heard of his reputation as a very thorough and knowledgeable doctor. We were not disappointed. We had the most thorough exam we have ever had. After having cancer of my lower eyelid and almost loosing my eye, I take my eye care very seriously. Also, I have experienced flashing lights in my peripheral vision.  Dr Green's office uses cutting edge equipment.  Therefore, he was able to use a CT scan of my eye to show and explain in great detail what happened, when I had these episodes.
The staff at VisualEyes are efficient and friendly. The atmosphere in the office is one of caring. The office is comfortable, clean, and beautiful. The selection of eyeware is the best I have ever seen.  There are so many beautiful frames you will be challenged to just pick one frame.  Great care is given by the staff to assist you in finding the perfect pair of glasses. There knowledge of the perfect shape and color for your individual face is unprecedented.

name: Erika Wells
text: The service was exceptional!!

name: Tasha
text: Not only was the staff courteous and showed great hospitality - you feel at home! I was nervous b/c I was having issues due to my astigmatism but i felt very confident leaving the office. Dr. Green was very thorough about imaging, astigmatism, etc. I would definitely recommend!

name: GG
text:
Friendly atmosphere & thorough examination.  I will definitely recommend to family & friends!!
Thank you for taking care of us!!!

name: Andrew Short
text: I didn't always like going to the eye doctor and going through the exams, but Dr. Green and his staff make the experience so easy!  The equipment they incorporate into the process help streamline everything.  thankful for VisualEyes!

resp.text: Robin, I am very sorry that you are unhappy with the notification system that our office utilizes.  Our office uses this system to remind patients of their appointments, when glasses or contact lenses are ready for pickup, and when it is time for their exam.  I have temporarily stopped all notifications and reminders for you; please contact our office and so that we can update your communication preferences.

text: After a battle with the lawn mower, my glasses needed some serious help! I called late the afternoon of the mishap, was seen the next morning, and had a new pair of glasses by 3:00 PM. name: Julie Miller
text: We were visiting family in the area and our 4- year old fell and needed his glasses adjusted in a bad way! They were able to see him on a Saturday and get him all fixed up. The help was so kind and wonderful with him. I couldn’t be more thankful for them being able to help him be able to wear his glasses for the rest of our trip. I was so concerned he would be without them until we made it back home. This place is fantastic!

name: Ethan Martin
text: I've been to different eye doctors since I was 8yrs old I am 30yrs now an this was the best place I've ever been, by far. Thank you very much guys. Your prices an customer service are amazing.

name: Heather Woodard
text: Started off pretty good. Not many options in glasses for people with bigger faces. But finally found some that looked decent. When I came to pick up my prescription the lenses seemed off. I took them home and tried them for a week. Still had problems. Went back and saw Jamal, he made some adjustments. So now I'm bringing the glasses back and they are going to make new lenses for me. The star rating might improve after the issue is fixed! Also they are a very busy place need to hire more help. Running Billy and Jamal to death.

name: Catayh Luna
text: Dr. Valentini, Jamal, Billy...THANK YOU!!! Our time with you was PERFECT!!! The BEST customer service EVER!!! GREAT eye exams, GREAT selection and prices! Well worth the hour drive we made to get to you. We will never go anywhere else. Everyone there went above and beyond to help us, all the while being so friendly and kind. THANK YOU!!!

text: The people there were super helpful and made the process easy and understandable! The doctors were friendly and the tech assistant was very reliable. They also help clean glasses free of charge!

text: I returned 2 Warby Parker sets of eyeglasses right at 500.00. And 1 set of Wal-Mart Eyewear at over 500.00. I decided to give this organization a try. They spared no details. From frame selection to lens selection and overall fit. Ill be picking up my Eyewear on Wednesday at which time I will order another set of eyeglasses. This place is phenomenal  . I'll keep coming back.

text: This place was customer service at it's finest from the first phone call untill I waked out of the door.  Leonardo Jamal answered my original inquiry, set our appointment and greeted us by name when we walked in. Our experience with Dr. Valentini was extremely pleasing. He was easy going and made us laugh a lot! Even better, his experience is portrayed in his performance and we are so happy we chose this practice to serve our family! Thanks!

text: Professional and courteous staff, very fast service, and excellent prices. Dr. Valentini is straight-forward and thorough. I highly recommend giving this place a try especially if you've been to a chain for eye wear. You won't regret it!

text: I've always hated going to the eye doctor for anything until I came here i loved the staff and doctor changed my thought about eye doctors so with pride I give them a 5❣

text: Great and friendly staff. The eye Doctor was very thorough and the office is very clean and the turn around time for getting my glasses was awesome.

text: The manager was so polite,very sweet and patient with my daughter like he was her own! He made sure the fit her face perfect. Better than anywhere I’ve been!

name: Lacey Payne
text:
This place is truly amazing and the people are phenomenal!
I was with my (pregnant) sister today who was having some severe agitation in her eye, along with multiple ruptured blood vessels. We were both a little nervous and unsure if she should see a doctor about her eye or if it was something to heal on its own. Thanks to some frightening google results, we decided to call a doctor. I remembered my pastor mentioning this optometrist and giving great reviews, so we called ahead and they got her in immediately!
The doctor was so so nice and had a great personality. I could not have asked for better treatment for my sister during such a stressful time!
A huge thank you to the staff for being so gracious and kind!

text: Awesome experience! My eye exam was quick and thorough. I got my glasses the same day and the guys up front are extremely kind.

Not only can I see now lol but I love my frames! The prices are customer service are unheard of. The location is great too! text: I was visiting from out of town on a Saturday and had an eye problem that may have required medical attention. He was professional, friendly and ensured I understood my vision problem and terms. This is a family-owned business and if I resided there, I would switch to this optometry clinic for all my vision needs.

text: The staff at this facility went above & provided top notch care to my mother! She is now seeing without strain & she is thankful for such great care of her fragile eyes. Thank you Billy & Jamal!!! This couldn't have been done without you! Forever grateful ❤.

name: Maurice Valentini
text:
Dear Dylan Hulsey,
I am sorry you feel the way you do regarding Alabama Family Optometry 1 Hour Optical. I am a little perplexed at your negative review, regarding our high prices, rude doctor, and limited selection.
I have searched our data base and don't see you as a previous patient, or someone having ordered product from us in the past.
I have reviewed previous posts from you regarding many other business', and it seems you have a long history of leaving negative reviews.
All I ask from you is you actually come  in to our clinic and experience it in real life for yourself.
We have over 1000 frames on display and many different brands, and our prices are actually lower than competing national chains. At AFO1H we have honest, transparent pricing on 1 and 2 pair eyeglass packages. The pricing is fair and easy to understand. No up-selling or pressure to buy like at the national optical retailers.

As for the doctor being rude, please give me the pleasure of actually meeting you in person, before forming your opinions.

Regards,
Dr. V.
Owner/President AFO1H

name: Amber Fleming
text: I went as a new patient today. This office definitely has it together. The front desk staff were friendly, the office was clean, and the doctor and his assistants were fantastic! I never felt rushed. Highly recommend! Thank you Dr. Griffin & staff for a great 1st visit!

name: Amy B
text: Absolutely LOVED this facility and it's staff. My husband and I took our 4 oldest children in to get eye exams and new glasses. The staff treated us so nicely!  I filled out all the paperwork prior to our appointment and loved having that option when it comes to all of our kiddos being present. My husband went back with all of our children to see Dr Albert while I waited in the lobby with our baby. Upon completion of the exams, they were kind enough to offer recaps on all of my children so that I was up to speed. All four children had to pick out frames and the staff was SO patient and informative with any questions we had. A huge change from the last optometrist office we had in town. Our last office rushed myself and my children and since we have amazing coverage,  pointed us in the direction of frames that were the most expensive instead of helping us look for more kid friendly and durable options. Total game changer with Dothan Optometric Clinic. We were so pleased, my husband and I have already set up our appointments for ourselves and will take all of our children to them from here on out for all their vision needs. I am always nervous trying new doctors and changing locations for care, but this is one that I'm so glad we took that leap. I only wish we had chose these doctors sooner! Thank you Dothan Optometric Clinic for treating our family so kindly! We will definitely be seeing y'all again in our future.

name: Aurienta Douglas
text: I ALWAYS have the best experience here. The staff is AWESOME!!!! I would give this place 10 stars if I could. My son loves coming here. The whole staff always put him at ease. You guys are truly amazing. Thank you for always being more than GREAT!!!!

The have a great customer service system developed that greet you, direct you to the right area and then on your way!!

We will definitely be back as a family to see you guys! -Breanna

text: Dr. Albert and her staff were amazing! My family and I are very pleased with the thorough eye exam we received in such a short time.  We are so glad we chose her as our new doctor.

name: Weston Spivey
text: I highly recommend Dr Griffin to anyone who is wanting a fast eye exam. This Doctor and his staff are incredible!

name: Jim Tadlock
text:
We see Doctor Griffin and feel well cared for by him and his team. We highly recommend them.

They are punctual, we've never had to wait more than five minutes; they don’t push their glasses or contacts, you can take your prescription anywhere you like to get it filled...but I have found their prices are not much different from others, even the online services.

While I like saving money as much as the rest of the country, there is something to be said for patronizing our local service providers so they can stay in business and be there when we need them.

It's not cheap setting up a medical facility and I'm not suggesting we don’t mind our expenses but if we don’t take care of them, they won't be there to take care of us.

With that in mind, we try to support our local providers.

name: Val Morris
text: First visit here, was very pleased with everything, especially Dr. Albert. She was very knowledgeable answered all my questions and took all the time I needed. I highly recommend this office.

name: betz sinep
text: I just went in for my annual eye exam for work, but Dr. Griffin and his excellent team went above and beyond. The technology they have there is amazing. They took photos of inside my eye and ran a scan to compare my optic nerves. Charged me for just the exam, but did so much more. I wish I lived down here just to keep him as my regular optometrist. If you want an affordable visit with new age technology and a Doctor who is very passionate about the health of your eyes, go here.

name: Alexus Rothwell

text: The doctor exam and staff seemed fine at first. I wasn’t sure why I wasn’t given a copy of the prescription at the initial visit. I called to get a copy and it was never sent.. I went back to get my eyes dilated and this is the first time in over 40 years of getting this done was I not offered disposable sunglasses. So I left trying to find my car in the bright sun. Wow what a headache. The thing is the prescription given my vision seeing from  a distance is worse. I called 2 times to see  if I could come back in. No call back, no email nothing. That’s bad customer service all the way around. I still don’t have my glasses prescription.  Not happy..

name: Sergio Luevano
text: Great experience, Dr. Cara was very professional and super nice all the time. Definetely I would recommend her.

name: Jenni Clark-Larsen
text: The Dr was very thorough, was determined to find contacts that worked for my site!  Very much appreciated

name: Joe Moseley
text: Dr Gilliland is awesome…answers every question and is very knowledgeable!! Highly recommended!!

name: Charlotte Grays
text: Very good!!! Very friendly and check’s your eyes very thoroughly!!! Fast and good timing!!! I will definitely visit this eye care facility again!!!

name: Jay Sebastian
text: This was my first eye exam in about a decade. As a former pilot, I was used to having amazing vision, but over the years that's started to change. Dr. Gilliland was great. She walked me through exactly what was going on with my eyes - both the vision issues and the physical discomfort. She was very helpful and had a great positive attitude. She gave me a prescription to help with my vision and some recommendation on over the counter products to help with the physical discomfort. I'm looking forward to getting my new glasses in. Thank you!

name: Kit Mendiola
text: Thorough exam,  great Doctor and friendly staff!

name: Scarlet Pennrose
text: Dr. Gilliland was super helpful and took the time to make sure my new prescription would work for me. She's awesome!

name: Whitney G
text: The doctor was super helpful and explained everything she did in a way that was easy to understand and also was great when listening to my concerns.

name: Emily Coffman
text: My eye exam went quickly and smoothly! Dr Gilliland asked several questions about my eyes and offered solutions to any difficulties I was having, as well as updates I should know about products that I could benefit from.

name: KC Chillcott
text: This was my first time coming to the office. Excellent experience from the staff that greeted me, got me signed in, provided forms and then later on at check out I also wound up ordering glasses excellent experience with all of your support staff. Dr Tipton's exam was superb she explained all of the processes and procedures so they were nice surprises and then afterwards walked through what she saw compared against my previous classes I knew I was going to have to go up another prescription very thorough and professional eye exam very personable doctor.  I'm highly recommending your office to everyone I know

name: Donna Pitts
text: I was greeted immediately by Hope and the check-in process was smooth. Dr. Gilliland was professional, knowledgeable, welcoming.  She took the time to fully answer my questions about eye health and care.  Hope was efficient, friendly, and professional throughout the selection of glasses, lenses, etc. and the checkout process was flawless.  Perfect experience in every way!

name: Sherrie Searcy
text: Was very impressed on time management. I was there on time and the team was ready. No wait time.

name: 30 Gang GG
text: She was very also and made sure she got exactly what I needed. I loved everything about her.

name: Brent Congo
text: Dr. Gilliland and the staff at Target Optical are excellent!  The appointments are very efficient and thorough.  Dr Gilliland explains the examination and results very well.

name: Ronald Kilpatrick
text: Noone told us that masks were required. I don't do masks and wouldn't have wasted the 1 1/2 hour drive had I known.  There is no mask mandates. You lost my wife's and my business today.

name: Claudia McClure
text: It was a nice visit. Dr. Gilliland was professional and courteous.

name: Eric Stephens
text: The visit was very time efficient and Dr. Gilliland is always great at explaining about the exam and results.

name: Elaina Franks
text: Getting back for exam was prompt, I was greeted right away, Dr. Gilliland is very knowledgeable, and her staff got me checked out quickly. The only thing I would have changed is I would have liked to get a breakdown of what my insurance covered on glasses (paper), and had my transition lenses gone over (were they scratch resistant, anti glare, etc) on paper as well, but that’s just me being extremely detailed. Worth the drive to get to this location!

name: Natalie Johnson
text: Everyone was so wonderful! Dr. Gilliland was great! She made sure any issues I had were addressed and answered all my questions. Even during these difficult times the staff was on top of the cleanliness which is greatly appreciated. I will be recommending this location to all.

name: Rick Holland
text: By far best eye exam experience. Everyone was professional and friendly. Thank you guys so much!!!

text: She took time to explain everything. Appreciate that

Thanks!

Chip Lang

text: The whole experience was wonderful. The doctor was quick, efficient, and very systematic which made the appointment go swiftly and smoothly. The lady that helped me order my contacts, Jessica, was very knowledgeable, kind, and extremely helpful with answering all my questions. Great staff.

name: Marion
text: Been going to see Dr. Gilland and Target optical for years now . I love coming to them , always on time and Heather has always assisted with my appointments . I’ve send Heather now for 11 years and is absolutely amazing! I love the Target Optical team and will always be coming back !

name: Jeff Gronberg
text: Dr. Gilliland was a wonderful professional.  She truly cared about the comfort and effectiveness of my new contacts and put a plan in place to optimize my eyecare.  She also stressed healthy practices for wearing contacts.  I highly recommend her to anyone that needs new glasses or contacts.

name: Deb Lipsie
text: Dr Gilliland and her staff are always top notch, caring and listen to what's going on, always put us at ease, exceptionally clean environment assuring everyone's safety and well being.  I would highly recommend this team for all eye are needs.

name: Not RightMeow
text: Very efficient and very professional.  I would definitely recommend this practitioner to friends and family.

name: Gabbie Thornton
text: My appointment was fast and the dr. was very nice.

name: Shan Duncan
text: Dr. Gilliland and her team are such a delight, each visit goes so smooth, and quick. I enjoy being one of her patients.

name: Woodard Family
text: The doctor was great. Very thorough and answered all questions that were asked. She made my son feel comfortable. I kept him engaged during the exam.

name: S. Battle
text: Dr. Gilliland is very friendly, professional, takes time to throughly answer your questions and steps you through options  to maintain healthy eye care. The Target staff is also very friendly and welcoming.

name: Maureen Young
text: Courteous staff, Dr was attentive, answered all my questions and didn't rush me.  Great safety measures in place.

name: Linda Coultas
text: The eye exam went well. Dr. Gilliland is very kind. I got in and out fairly quickly. My concern was I have never had vision problems before and had explained that I had only worn reading glasses. I was told that I would need to wear glasses full time and that my right eye was worse than my left. I was also told I didn't need to drive at night. The I was directed to step out into the lobby to pick out my frames. I asked the lady assisting me what exactly was written on my chart and she tried to explain that I had 20/40 vision and what other issues were going on. I wish the doctor had taken the time to explain exactly what my vision problems were. I should have asked questions, but I guess I thought I would see the doctor again after I picked out my frames, but it didn't work out that way.

name: Jennifer Johnson
text: I liked Dr. Gulliland. She was friendly and personable.  The only feedback that I would have is that she didn't explain everything thoroughly.  For example, she gave me drops to dilate my eyes, which I had never had before, and I was freaked out when I couldn't really see after. Other than that, I would say that I had a positive experience.

name: Sandy K Patel
text: I was able to easily make an appointment and the Dr. Gilliland was there to see me on time - no wait. She was very knowledgeable and professional. Friendly staff and took care of everything related to my insurance with out any problems.  I told her that I was going to the beach that week and needed new contacts and she gave me an extra pair of sample lenses for free while I waited for my order to come in.  I would recommend.

name: Jon McDonald
text: Courteous, efficient, thorough.  Never pushy.  Always as pleasurable as an eye exam can be.

name: Natalie Hasley
text: Dr. Cara Gilliland is the best!  Professional, patient (especially with my kids) and kind.  Appointments start promptly on time and I am given proper care while getting in and out efficiently.  The office is clean and staff is friendly.  My contacts/glasses always ship quickly and straight to my house so that I do not have to make an extra trip to pick them up.

name: Nathan Othling
text: Very polite and very knowledgeable of what the patient might need for a pair of glasses or contacts in order to see better

name: Free Enterprise Morris
text: Great customer service from the doctor and the coworker.

text: Dr Gilliland is very nice and personable every time I've seen her so far.

text:
The doctor was patient with my questions, addressed all my concerns, and helped me consider future decisions and ramifications regarding my eyes' health.

I will recommend this doctor and site to my friends and family.

name: gregary turner
text: Was brought in on time, Dr was very pleasant, the folks out front were very polite and gracious.

name: Stafford Booth
text: Dr. Cara Gilliland is someone I highly recommend to all of my friends and family. From the first time you meet her she’s there for you and your best interest. I’ve never felt such at ease and more confident with a doctor, than I have with Dr. Gilliland.

name: Matt Pierce
text: The office was pleasant and the Dr kinda and professional.  I would appreciate it if the office staff wore masks.

name: Joseph Chandler
text: I thought she was very friendly and informative. She made me feel at ease and offered suggestions that would help me with my vision.

name: Kiwi
text:
The staff and doctor were nice, helpful, professional and knowledgeable. Dr. Gillliland and her staff are following #COVID19 safety protocol i.e. wearing masks, gloves and available hand sanitizer. I too wore my N95 mask and gloves. Each piece of optometry equipment is thoroughly cleaned and disinfected after each customer. It was a great reassurance for those of us who value science, our health and the health of other members of society.

My only qualm is that the Target corporation doesn't require masks for customers in a small space as their optical store. This is of no fault of the doctor or her staff. It was disconcerting to see two elderly customers not wearing masks or respecting social distancing.

name: E4 hall
text: Fast friendly service. Office was quiet and clean.

name: Paula Dickinson
text: She is always very informative and professional, and never in a hurry to rush through the appointment.  She takes time to answer your questions in detail, and I appreciate that.

text: Gave me the totally wrong prescription, went to a real doctor this morning because my eye strain was so bad it caused almost total vision loss, none of the numbers on my real corrective prescription were even CLOSE

text: Excellent service!!!

name: Drew Cottrell
text: Devon is one of the most knowledgeable optical managers I've dealt with at Target, she's great at saving me the embarrassment of picking the wrong frames and takes just enough time to make sure I'm walking out the door happy. As long as you have Devon, I will be a loyal customer!

resp.text: We love to hear about experiences like yours, Drew! You can always depend on us for excellent service. We appreciate your feedback and shout out to Devon. See you next time!

name: Marcy Gerhart
text: Several bad aspects of visit   1-When I arrived I was immediately told that I did not bring anyone with me  to drive so I could not have my eyes dilated. I was NOT told to bring anyone when making the appointment. Also in all my years I have had my eyes dilated and given sunglasses to wear WHILE DRIVING! I heard another woman being told the same thing. Why don't they want to dialate eyes???? Secondly, my distance vision is no better than before my visit. Finally, Target Optical is a franchise, not part of the Target entity, so getting satisfaction is not possible through Target.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience, Marcy. We're disappointed to hear we did not meet your expectations. We'd like to help you find the right frames. Please reach out to us at bit.ly/TO_Support. We hope you give us another chance in the future.

name: Eric Belcher
text: Thy are WONDERFUL! Due to insurance change, I couldn't use my regular eye dr so I gave them a shot. Dr Powell was awesome and Devin is hands down the best "front of office" person I  have had the pleasure of dealing with. She helped me choose the right frames for me and was patient while I was indecisive.

resp.text: We love to hear about experiences like yours, Eric! We're glad to hear Dr. Powell and Devin took care of you. If you need any more help, you know where to find us.

name: Katie Jean Wagner
text: They are so awesome! Super clean and efficient.. They have the best selection of frames!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Katie! We strive to provide our guests with excellent service and the best selection of glasses. We're glad to hear you had a great experience! See you next time.

name: Janice Riviere
text: I had a great experience with Target Optical at the Grove (exit 10). Loved Dr. Powell and the ladies helping me choose glasses. They took my VSP insurance and I got a great deal!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Janice! Our entire team is dedicated to providing the best customer service. We love to hear about the great connections they make with our guests.

name: Patrick Galloway
text: Totally unplanned visit to check out their selection of sunglasses that can have a prescription and found a pair of ray bans that fit perfect.  Price was great.  Service from shop staff was very kind and friendly at the time of sale and in a week when the glasses came in from Ray Ban.  Much faster than anticipated on delivery time.   Already had prescription from a recent eye doctor visit that I have used for years.   Will certainly look to order frames and lenses from target optical again!

name: Kristen Ray
text: Devin was absolutely AMAZING! I did not have an appointment & I brought my 1y/o with me. She was extremely patient with us & super friendly. I went through about 15 frames(she never complained & explained safety COVID steps to take when trying on). I was slowly getting frustrated & my baby was getting restless. I explained what I wanted & she sat me down & popped up with 2 frames. I FELL IN LOVE INSTANTLY!!!!!! When I went to pick them up she was more than willingly to work with my glasses until they fit me perfectly. She made suggestions on alternate cleaning cloths...I just— I loved the experience. Keep it up Devin! We need bomb people like you 💖💖

name: declan d
text: Service is fine only if you go in person. There is no way of contacting them by phone as THEY WILL NOT ANSWER. This is a problem if you have a job and can't wait around all day for them to return your call. This also makes it impossible for you to make an appointment. Very frustrating.

name: Laura Watson
text: Fast, fun, and friendly service!

name: Jillian Chappell
text: I got my glasses today, and WOW! My prescription is spot on! I hadn't realized it had changed. The staff and the doctor are friendly, and she is very thorough. My appointment was a breeze, and they were great at working me in when I was in a pinch. I am just so impressed! My glasses are crystal clear!!! Thank you!!!

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review Jillian! We work hard to meet expectations like yours and we’re happy to hear we hit the mark for you. Come back and see us soon!

name: Nancy Steadmon
text: Great place to have your eyes check. Dr Whitaker is great, sees my whole family. Always takes time with you and checks for so many things. Staff is nice.  My go to eye doctor.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us! We count ourselves lucky for customers like you. We look forward to working with you again in the future!

name: Susan Lavender
text: Second year to see Dr. Whitaker.  She is very detailed...friendly and takes time to answer questions.  Her staff is wonderful...from the front desk to the final step of picking out eye glasses!  Great bunch of women!  Your new building is gorgeous!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review! I’m glad you were able to see us in our brand new building on the East side of Athens. Dr. Whitaker and our staff are always happy to provide exceptional eye care, vision care, and customer service to our wonderful patients. We look forward to seeing you, your family, and your friends soon!

name: Olivia Norwood
text: My experience here was very welcoming and comfortable with Dr. Whitaker and her employees. She has a great selection of glasses and contact options.

resp.text: We are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave us a 5-Star review.

name: Sierra Crane
text: Always love coming to see Dr. Whitaker and her staff! Great service and they always take great care of me.

name: Earl Simmons
text: A little rocky at first until we figured out the insurance issue, the staff there was very helpful and professional. Highly recommended !

resp.text: We are grateful that you took the time out to leave us a review. Your feedback helps us to improve service for everyone

name: Timothy Scott
text: Top-notch, excellent service! Dr. Whittaker is knowledgeable, thorough, and diligent in her examinations. I've always received terrific care from her! She is supported by a responsive team of professionals, too. For example, I called the office with a question about how my vision was responding to a new medication. Although the doctor was not in the office that day, the receptionist called me back within an hour with a recommendation from Doctor Whittaker...you won't receive this kind of patient care anywhere else!

name: Luther Juckett
text: Courteous, professional, very knowledgeable staff. Dr Whitaker is thorough and will take the time to answer any questions or concerns you may have.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this 5-star review. We really appreciate you being a customer and helping to share the word about us. We’re here for you anytime.

name: Pam Stauch
text: OMG!  I’ve been a patient for longer than I care to admit.  Dr Whitaker and her staff never cease to amaze me, whether it’s a routine check up or an emergency, they come through with caring professionalism.  This staff is professional, personable and caring.

resp.text: Thank you for the fabulous review! Dr. Whitaker and her staff always look forward to seeing you for your eye care and vision care needs. People like you make our work satisfying and enjoyable.  Dr. Whitaker and her staff have loved caring for you over the years and we look forward to many more!

text: Love my eye care place! Friendly, helpful staff that go the extra mile to meet all your eye care needs.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this 5-star review. We really appreciate you being a customer and helping to share the word about us. We’re here for you anytime.

name: tammy tucker
text: My husband and I love coming to see Dr. Whitaker, and her amazing staff. A few months back I had a terrible eye issue over the weekend so I called the office. The answering service got in touch with Dr. Whitaker and she came in on her off day to take care of me and my needs. I will recommend Dr. Whitaker to anyone, any day!

name: Lori Romine
text: Dr. Whitaker is fantastic! She is very caring, takes her time to ensure I am getting a thorough eye exam, and always answers any questions I may have. I highly recommend going to see Dr. Whitaker and her staff.

text: Great optometrist and staff, friendly, kind, caring and professional. I would recommend this doctor to everyone. She always does a thorough exam and takes time to answer my questions. I love the selection of eyeglass frames and the professional service I received.

text:
I highly recommends Athens Eye Care Center. My whole family gets seen by Dr. Whitaker, because she is so thorough, thoughtful, and truly does care that her patients leave being able to see 20/20 or better. The optical section has an amazing selection of Brand name frames, and the opticians make sure to help you find something you feel and look fantastic in!!

We love AECC!!

name: Jeffrey Romine
text: Dr. Whitaker and her staff are a pleasure to be around.  They are extremely knowledgeable in what they do and always take the time to answer my questions.  I recommend them to anyone looking for a family eye doctor!

text: Everything was timely, professional and pleasant.

name: Joshua
text: I feel like every few years I have to change eye doctors due to my insurance, but Dr. Tyner and his team is by far my favorite that I have had! His team was very friendly and extremely helpful even after there was a bit of a hang up with my insurance as my insurance card somehow didn't match the account number that the insurance had on file. But the lady at the front desk was able to figure it out and even printed me a new sheet with my correct information for my insurance!! Dr. Tyner was very patient and answered all of my questions and curiosities. I hope to be able to stay with them for as long as possible!

text: My eye exam visit went fine, pretty routine, no issues.  However, one of the reasons why I go to Dr. Cox is the convenience of Lens Crafters being right there and that I get my glasses in an hour.  This last time I was informed that Lens Crafters no longer provides that service and I have to wait 2 weeks for my lenses to come in.  I wish I would've known that beforehand.

My eyes were dilated for apparently no reason. The Optometrist never looked at my eyes after the drops were put in. I was asked to pay and I departed. This was an unprofessional visit in almost all aspects. Needless to say I didn't get new glasses.

Convenient location and times (Sat hours) but can be difficult to get on the phone sometimes.

All in all definitely enjoy the doctors, location, and staff. Always very helpful and willing to discuss any questions or concerns.

text: People are very courteous. Tests were explained very satisfactory. Dr was pleasant and explained and showed films of eyes. I would recommend this eye care center to everyone looking for pleasant atmosphere and friendly people.

text: Everyone was so polite and helpful! The new patient process was easy. Dr. Warner is amazing at what she does! This is my new eye care home from now on.

name: GREG RISNER
text:
Fantastic, knowledgeable doctor. Dr. Moore gave me a high-tech, thorough exam. Simply the best in Florence! I have had Keratoconis, a rare cornea disease since 1992 and have used Dr. Moore since. He is a lifesaver for me-- much more than an optometrist.

Wonderful, courteous, and patient staff, as well.

Gregory Paul Risner

name: Rickie Cole
text:
My visit to Renaissance Eye Care was initiated through the new VA referral system that the VA now has.
Renaissance was very professional from the moment I checked in and throughout my referral appointment.
Dr. Moore added to the professionalism when he completed my eye examination through explanation of photos taken of the back of my eye. He also gave me the feeling of complete confidence in his ability to professionally serve others as I was served on my eye examination visit.
Thanks to the Veterans Administration for selecting  Renaissance Eye Care as a referral outlet to better serve Veterans throughout the area.
You all are certainly a keeper...

name: Jennifer
text: Dr. Moore is awesome! I’m always full of questions and he’s more than happy to answer them! The staff is helpful and the business is very clean! 10/10!

name: Megan Ergle
text: I really liked going here! The doctor was very thorough in the examination and involved me in the process of getting my new prescription. (They also don’t do the thing that blows air into your eye which is really nice.) The only complaint that I have is that there didn’t seem to be much selection at all for frames under $150, or at least the nurse didn’t show me them besides the selection on the table. It made me feel confined to just one space or I had to pick frames that were way out of my price range. Besides that, I had a great experience!

name: Isabella
text: Great staff, optometrists, and selection of glasses. Very patient and will work with you to find the glasses that fit your face the best. The front staff also did a good job at navigating the messy waters of my weird insurance company. I am so pleased with this place and tell all my friends and family to go here! You won’t be disappointed.

name: Norma Thompson
text: I would recommend Renaissance Eye Care. Dr. Moore is very thorough and answer any questions you might have. All the staff are very friendly and helpful. A great place to go.

name: Dale Cohen
text: Renaissance Eye Care is a professional, yet friendly environment for eye care.  The staff is knowledgeable and able to explain technical concepts in a way the average person can understand.  Dr. Moore does a great job of moving the examination along efficiently while taking the time to add a personal touch to his care.  I highly recommend Renaissance for their amazing staff, but their selection of eye wear is also a plus.

name: Patricia Thomas
text: My 1st time visiting Renaissance Eye Care but I was very pleased with the service I received. I also like that I was able to look at and try on frames BEFORE the exam. I could actually see how they looked since my eyes had not yet been dilated.

name: Kat Watson
text: The most professional eye care place I've ever been to. The staff are very good and Dr. Moore does an awesome job with my eyecare. Highly recommend.

name: Dana Greene-Davis
text: I love Renaissance Eye Center. I have been in glasses and contacts for 30 years. This eye care center is amazing, caring, friendly, and they truly care about their patients. I highly recommend everyone try them out! Phenomenal staff, doctors, and services!

name: Terry Owens
text: WOW! I was extremely pleased with my experience at Renaissance Eye Care, not only was the staff friendly, they were very professional. If you want to experience exceptional eye care, try Renaissance Eye Care, located in the East Village Plaza, Florence, AL

name: Lily Jones
text: This was the only place that could fit me in last minute after my dogs chewed up my glasses. And right before I had to give birth. They were fast and friendly and accommodating and helped get me in a pair the same day!

name: Melody Pearson
text: This was my first visit to Renaissance Eye Care. I wanted to try contacts for the first time. They were really great about walking me through the process and teaching how to use the contacts. They sent me home with a trial pair to see if that was going to work for me. I have been putting it off for quite some time but I am glad I chose them.

name: Drake Peoples
text: Dr. Mormon and staff were extremely helpful and professional. Clean and safe environment and careful diagnosis. Sharpest vision I’ve had in years!

name: Angie Andrews
text: I loved the whole experience everyone was friendly I will recommend them to anyone who needs an eye exam.

name: Wanda Bogus
text:
My Take
I think Dr. Cathy is the best. She cares that is 100% of the battle for this  patient.
Choosing Renaissance was the right thing..

text: Dr. Warner and staff were very courteous, friendly and accommodating. Not like all the other eye doctors offices where you spend most of your time in a waiting room.

name: Taylor Childers
text: You guys where wonderful from start to finish I am definitely going to recommend my entire family and friends to come to you all from now on.

name: Shamea C
text: They were very nice and attentive to my needs. Very good customer service, I will be recommending my family/friends.

text: Everyone was very friendly and professional. Both Doctors are very attentive and knowledgeable. And Jason is awesome at helping with glasses......he definitely knows his business!

text: Wonderful experience! Fast service, knowledgeable doctor, friendly staff with great patience. I highly recommend!

name: Kayla Woodruff
text: The doctors are always very friendly and extremely thorough.

name: Colby Colburn
text: Dr. Moore is fantastic. He is very kind and detailed with his examination. I’ve never had any problems with scheduling or customer service. The receptionists are always very nice and helpful. Very good pricing on frames and lenses. I would definitely recommend this practice for all your eye needs.

name: Carl White
text: From the eye exam to picking out frames. I totally recommend them.

name: LaTasha Nichols
text: Love Renaissance! Me and my 3 children use them and they have always treated us well! I finally got a detailed explanation of what is "wrong" with my eyes why i cant see very well at all. Not just a "oh ur eyes are bad heres some glasses see you next time attitude" he actually took the time to explain why it was like this and why it was important for me to wear my glasses as much as possible!

name: Dan
text: My Wife and I have been customers of of Dr Warner and Renaissance for approximately 15 year and have alway has very good care and service. I work out of town and they have always on top of our needs. The 3 stars are for this last visit and is many because of the front staff does not seam to know what’s going on. I had new lenses ordered and never received a call, my wife calls and is told they have the lenses and to come on it and they will install them, I go down and I’m told the person is on break...ok I’ll come back as I have another thing to do. I get a call telling me they can’t put my new lenses in my frames because that person is not working today..... I’m leave town Saturday for work. What the heck, I will only be home once a month and it will be a weekend so there is no way Renaissance will be able to install my new lenses . Major fail on communication, why was I told to come in, why was I not called/text and told my lenses were ready as you have always done. Very disappointed and probably we won’t be coming back after all these years. I can’t have failures like this with me working out of town.

name: Richard Richey
text: Everyone was very friendly and professional. DR.Moore, is great at explaining everything to you. They were very helpful in selecting new glasses.

name: Beverly Peters
text: Dr. Moore and his staff are the best. Very caring and professional.

name: Lise Griffin
text: These are the BEST folks at Renaissance Eye Care! Very courteous and professional!

name: Amber Robinson
text: Very clean facility with kind employees. Listened to my concerns and took their time explaining everything to me. My DR was amazing and through with my entire exam.

name: Kim Loucks
text: It only pays for one eye exam a year and only so much on certain glasses and a lot of people places don't accept this insurance ...it's virtually not even worth the money!

text: I always receive wonderful, professional care at Renaissance Eye Care. Thorough exam and everything is always explained clearly.

I am very impressed with this doctor's attitude because his great patience and very clear handwriting on the notes for me to read especially with his excellent manners. I think this place is the best I ever went compared to the others. I really like him. Highly recommend for anyone to go there!

text: Nothing like coming in on my day off for appointment and they tell me that they scheduled it for the next day...cool

text: Excellent service and care .

name: Andrew Lewis
text: I enjoyed my first visit here, immensely.  I was greeted, checked in, and waited for only a few minutes to get started with an exam.  The amount of time spent with the doctor was appropriate and thorough.  I felt like I was in good hands, and understood my options.  Their selection of glasses is high-quality and varied, and I plan on going back soon to fill my order.

name: Susan Breer
text: My dad is an optometrist and retired earlier this year.  Dr. Moore is the first optometrist I’ve seen besides my dad and he is great!  You pay a little more than the big box vision centers but the personal attention and professionalism is worth it.  I am proud to promote and support this local small business.

name: Virginia Bost
text: The people here are amazingly kind, informative and not pushy at all. They are helpful and put my anxieties at ease. I feel like I was in good hands. Highly recommend this place!

name: Janvier Snow
text: Friendly staff but the lab printed my lenses wrong 4x Oct to Feb ..no glasses ! ..REFUNDED ! .....in the meantime WENT TO AMERICAS BEST took 5 days  & had perfect glasses in 6 days at half the price . They use their  own lab. YIPEE !!
