text: Great customer service with people that genuinely care about people.  I personally don't wear glasses but had an eye emergency on a weekend and with little notice they went out of their way to help me out. Thank you so much.

resp.text: Hi Nathan! Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same! We look forward to serving you again!

name: Zoe Hooker
text: My husband and I live near Nashville and I was in an emergency situation at 5pm on a Saturday when I found myself without any glasses - we called every glasses store in the Nashville/Middle Tennessee area and no one could help us until the following Monday or Tuesday. We called this LensCrafters and Caleb was amazing with us. He said to drive on down (the hour and a half away) and he would make sure we were taken care of. Him and Karen were absolutely amazing and the perfect example of customer service and care. They even stayed after hours to make the lenses and make sure we were taken care of. Thank you so much for all your amazing service!

resp.text: Hi Zoe, thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Jonathan M
text: I was traveling and needed to get a replacement pair of glasses.  They refused to honor a prescription from another office and required me to get a new prescription from them in order to buy glasses.  I’ve never had this issue at any other LensCrafters location.

resp.text: Hi Jonathan, thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear about your experience and would like to learn more. Please go to bit.ly/LC-LUX so we can follow up with you directly.

name: Nichole Jarvis
text: Jason is just the best! Zach isnt too bad either. Karen is very cool. The whole staff is comprised of ROCKSTARS.

name: Angel Shorty
text: I needed an appointment as soon as possible due to my dog chewing up my glasses. I was very pleased with them getting me in as fast as they did and they worked with me when I was late because of traffic. They exam went very well, the doctor was very friendly. However, when they exam was over and I went to pick out the lenses to go in the frames I had picked out, the lady did not give me the options of lenses I could receive same day. Here I am thinking that I am going to get them same day, but don't find out that it could be a week before I actually get my glasses until after I make the payment. I should have been given the same day options first knowing that I have no glasses until those come in. I am now going on a week without glasses.

name: Thatmanstu MotoConcepts
text: Everyone was courteous, helpful and professional.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our associates are some of the best around and we are always happy to hear our customers feel the same!

name: Linda McClendon
text: Excellent customer service and frame selection. We were in and out in 45 minutes (We provided the RX). Text message received within 30 minutes that single vision eyeglasses were ready. A little pricey so removed one star.

name: Nathan Owens
text: This location has the absolute worst customer service I have ever experienced for any medical exam.  My schedule appointment was at 10 am and they did not get me back until past 11:30!  The front desk lady was completely rude and had no patience when it came to any questions.  I had to return a second time to follow up for my contacts.  The same front desk lady ignored us for 30 minutes when we tried to sign in.  She flirted with some young adult men for another 30 minutes after she acknowledge we were there - I guess chatting with a friend is more important than a customer.

name: andrea sharp
text: Was not impressed.  I felt like the optometrist rushed me through as fast as she could.  The only good thing there was a very nice worker helped me find the right frames for my face.  Will not be back to the optometrist.

name: Ryan Coons
text: I ordered lenses for my existing frames at the LensCrafters at the Parkway Place Mall in Huntsville, AL. However, I cannot get them installed into my frames because one of the lenses is the wrong size. Despite the time and expense of grinding a bifocal lens, it never occurred to anyone involved to question lens sizes. Due to my on-call status and vacation plans, I can't receive my correct lenses for at least three weeks. I had to use up leave from work to arrive before the lab closed; I will never get those hours of leave back. I have to spend even more leave time to return, since LensCrafters can't do a job right the first time. I should not have trusted LensCrafters with this important job.

name: Nikki Nicole
text: I went to this location for the first time because I was already at the mall. Usually I go to the one on university drive per closer to my home. However, I was pleased with the customer service that I received, the beautiful lady went above and beyond to help me find glasses that compliment my face.

name: Anthony C. Wilkerson
text: I have been going here for the past 3 years and all of that is mute because of the horrible experience I had over the phone. I felt like the rep did not show any empathy for me being a dissatisfied customer and made no effort to try and make me a happy customer.

name: Edward Brewer
text: Get a good novel to read you'll be here several hours. Had a 4:30 appointment and it's now 6:30 and I still haven't seen the optometrist.

name: Victoria True
text: Wish I could give zero stars. Really rude people. Especially over the phone.

resp.text: Hi Victoria, thank you for your review. We apologize for your experience as we aim to consistently meet and surpass customers' expectations. Please go to bit.ly/LC-Support so we can follow up with you directly.

name: Pamela Hideko
text: One semi rude staff member & one that was very pleasant

name: Harrison Gough
text: Justin at lensecrafters in the mall did an awesome job changing out the lenses in my persols, even as they had a crack in them. Also, he straightened them out and conformed them to my face. They feel better than ever now. Thanks Justin!

name: Dana Buchanan
text: The wait wasn't long n I was a walk in. Staff was extremely friendly.

name: Amy Hammett
text: After reading a few of the reviews, I was hesitant because I was a walk-in, but I also didn't have a lot of time to wait around.  I was afraid that I would have a long wait, but I didn't. They had me out of there in an hour. Dr Burk was extremely helpful & professional, & the other ladies were also very nice & helped me decide which glasses looked best on me.

name: Kirk Rose
text: They are required to take all walk ins. That means even if you have an appointment, you will be waiting hours! Then even if you pay for everything at the time of service/purchase, they still might send you a bill 3 months later blaming it on a slow insurance process. Do yourself a favor and go to America's Best Eyecare at the Oxford Exchange.

name: jayla reese
text: Best vision center I’ve EVER been too and I’ve been doing this since 4th grade. Highly recommend they’re so professional

name: Secret “Yo mamma” Shopper
text: The manager is rude and  short with ppl

name: Celia Highland
text: Appointments mean nothing here! First visit-waited over an hour. Second visit- waited over two hours. Third visit- scheduled during my lunch hour, explained that I had an hour to get back to work and see my patients at their scheduled appointments, I was told six people ahead of me and that's impossible. Rescheduled again.......was told I'll tell the doctor you didn't want to wait. Again, explained that I had patients to see today, has nothing to do with want. After nearly $200 and wasted time, rescheduled for tomorrow. I CAN'T get my rx that I've paid for without the last visit.  The staff is extremely rude, unpleasant and lack empathy and or understanding. The eye doctor herself,  is very knowledgeable and friendly,  but you cannot speak to her without wasting your time and discarding your own responsibilities.

name: Big Joe
text: Have patience if you go here, youre gonna have to schedule follow ups just to finish the prescription and the doctor isnt in but 3 short days during the work week so its going to end up costing you on your paycheck. Between the doctors needs to rebuttal and defend herself, a long terminalogy for attitude, and the tardiness--- youre not going to leave terribly satisfied. Tammy the associate there was very helpful and nice however, im glad she left notes to the doctor about my dissapointment. Hey, its Oxford AL.

name: Steven Lee
text: I.Love this eyes and pharmaceutical medical and medicine needs.

name: Caitlyn Harris
text: I've had problems with my vision for 13 years or so, and I had the BEST experience with the vision center; not only is the doctor amazing, the entire support staff she has is just as kind. Those that work at the counter near the glasses are very helpful and knowledgeable as well! I'll give a special shout-out to Melinda because she was truly one of the most pleasant people I've ever spoken to; she's been in the eyeglasses business for some time now, so she has great tips and tricks for us glasses wearers! Thank you, Melinda!

name: Craig Winn
text: Location has changed recently. It is now up by the cash registers. Always busy...too busy. Hard to get help. They make great glasses though. Pricing is also excellent on their glasses and they take most insurance. They have an eye doctor on site.

name: Miss Ro
text: So after reading these reviews, I was very skeptical about trying this place.😕 Upon arrival to my appointment, I instantly regretted the decision. 😒 I was told that my appointment was the day before. 😦However, this is not what I was told when I made the appointment and put the date in my calendar. 🧐 The staff was very accommodating though and offered me another appointment for later that day. 🙃 Then I was sent a text stating that I had missed the other appointment 🤨. Surprisingly, the doctor’s visit was amazing. 😋 She was friendly, easy to talk to, extremely knowledgeable and very professional. Dr. Compton ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: Jenna Reardanz
text: Dr. Emily Compton was great! Answered any questions I had in a very knowledgeable way. The whole office was very friendly and efficient. Also great COVID precaution!

name: Lucas “Doc” Dockendorff
text: We drive all the way from Shreveport, LA to see Dr. Rubino. I don't think there is much else I could tell you that tops a 7 hour drive with an infant for an eye exam. They should have a secret 6th star.

name: Jan Gautro
text: Have bought at least 4 or of glasses and received nothing but excellent service from the vision dept!  They are as conscientious as they can be with as busy as they are!  Never dealt with the Dr there but the rest of the staff is knowledgeable & helpful!  Can’t say enough good things about them and the prices can’t be beat!!!

name: Lee Franklin
text: Ignore the matched "Harris" 1 star reviews (So blatantly from same people), no sympathy for someone who shows up so late for an appointment.  I have been using Dr Rubino for years and she continues to amaze me, and the quality, knowledge and cost of glasses in the vision center is amazing.  One of the best places you can go.  Don't show up at 4:50 for a 4:30 appointment, though.  =)

name: Jim McDade
text: I have purchased three pair of eyeglasses at Costco for personal use. The first pair was fine. The last two pairs both fell apart in less than two years. Very disappointing and all the employees said was that they were sorry about it, but couldn't do anything. The metal nose pad post fell off of my second pair and I didn't notice it until a small abrasion caused by the rough spot where the post was anchored started to bleed after a few hours of wear. The second pair that failed (Perry Ellis) brand worked well for about a year before mysterious striations began to appear in the lenses. These were not scratches. I took the glasses to Costco and all the tech did was scratch her head and ask me what I had done to them. I am 60 and have been wearing eyeglasses since I was 13, so I know how to take care of my glasses. A close inspection revealed that the Perry Ellis frames were shrinking over time, placing constant stress on the lens material. I will never buy eyeglasses from Costco again. It looks like normal UV exposure from sunlight (I go to ball games a lot), caused the organic bonds in the frame material to slowly break down, resulting in the shrinkage. They were just low-quality frames with a fancy designer name on them.

name: John Allen
text: I had my eye exam and bought a pair of glasses at 12:30 on a Saturday. Costco members will know that 12:30 on Saturday is about the craziest time there is at Costco. Dr. Rubino was courteous, efficient, and most importantly, thorough. The staff at the frame and lens sales counter were just as courteous and efficient. I genuinely felt that they met my needs for a prescription and glasses, and there is no doubt that I got a great value out of my glasses and lenses. If you don't have any pressing ophthalmic issues, you are cheating yourself by not using Dr. Rubino and Costco

name: Shawn Shallow
text: Made an appointment.  Waited 30 minutes and got bumped for somebody that skipped their earlier appointment.  Decided not to wait 60 minutes and left.  All I can say is don’t bother.  Service is terrible.

name: Kacey Harris
text: My daughter (5yrs old) had an appointment with Dr. Rubino today at 4:30. I called at 4:30 and spoke with her letting her know we were close by but we’re going to be a bit late due to traffic from a wreck. She said okay and then called me back at 4:50 (we were in the parking lot at the time) to tell me that she could not see my daughter that they close at 5:00 and she would not have time to see her we would need to reschedule. This was not just a routine eye exam...I had called and made the appointment on Thursday because my daughter has been seeing floaters, which I have learned are not common in children and should be checked out soon. Dr. Rubino was aware of the reason of the appointment and still chose to not see her. I consider this to be very poor bedside manner and extremely unprofessional. I do not recommended going to her.

name: A.B. H***
text: Dr Rubino is friendly and a professional. I was referred to her by a friend and I have referred many to her. The review of two parents who were over 20 minutes late is unfair. How do the reviewers know whether the Dr had her own commitment to keep?  If the issue was that big of a concern they could have gone to Childrens Hospital or the UAB Callahan 24.7 eye emergency room. Dr.  Rubio has spent extra time with me due to changing vision issues and due to some recent health related causes. I have used other optometrists including those at Schaeffer and in other states. She has been the best by far. Highly recommend and I was skeptical due to her office being in Costco.

name: Nathan Harris
text: Very bad customer service by Dr. Jane Rubino. Appointment for a child cancelled after we called. Go somewhere else.

name: Angela Patel
text: great service

name: Lance G
text: Very impressed with my visit. Doctor and staff were very knowledgeable and professional. Will be back!

name: Anna Moses
text: Very happy and impressed with my doctor and the staff.

name: Treva Rhys
text: I have been a patient since Myeyedr was Schaeffer Eye Center, and I would not go anywhere else.  They have a great variety of frames, and they always have great promotions.  I have ordered I don't know how many pairs of glasses and have never had an issue.  I purchased the warranty on my Ray-bans and when my dog took them to the yard to "play" with them, let's just say they didn't look the same when I brought them (what was left of them) back in to use my warranty.  For $25 dollars I was able to get an entire new pair.  I love the people there and you can tell that the staff really cares about each other and us as the customer.

resp.text:
Hi Treva,
Thank you for being a longstanding patient with our team!  We're sorry to hear that your dog had the impression your glasses were a chew toy but are thrilled to know the warranty was able to remedy the situation!  Our team looks forward to assisting your vision needs again soon.
Warm Regards, Patient Relations

name: Amber Dupree
text: It's been a while since I've been to an eye doctor so it was a huge relief when Jennifer and Dr. Cecil took the time to walk me through the process and not make me feel rushed. The front office staff were very friendly and helpful especially while I tried to find the perfect frames. I would highly recommend them.

resp.text:
Hi Amber,
We appreciate you! You are the reason that we are here. Dr. Cecil, Jennifer and team have made a commitment to the community to provide the very best Eye Health and Wellness Services with 100% Patient Satisfaction. It means a great deal to have received your positive feedback and 5-STAR Review. We look forward to your next visit.
Warm Regards, Patient Relations

name: Jennifer Wooten
text: Best place around to have your eye exam. The doctor and staff are all wonderful!

name: Courtney Draughn
text: From the moment I made my appointment until the end the staff was absolutely amazing. The front office staff was friendly and super welcoming.  Jennifer and Dr Cecil both had by far the best bedside manner of any office I’ve been too and super helpful with all my questions. I will definitely recommend them to anyone!

Hello Courtney,

We're glad to hear we delivered such an amazing experience. Our team strives to provide the patient care you deserve. Your feedback is very important in our strive to provide a 100% patient experience and satisfaction. We will forward this to our staff and they will be so excited to hear. We look forward to seeing you again.

name: Hannah Norman
text: I love coming into this MyEyeDr. You can definitely tell that they care about their patients. The continued professionalism as far as the masks go, is the way everyone should be doing it!  They definitely got that right! You can tell that they are keeping the patients safety as the forefront. It’s always refreshing going in to their store I always feel at home!

Hi Hannah,
Thank you so much for your five star review! At MyEyeDr, we aim to be your trusted eyecare provider and assist you with all of your vision needs. We are beyond delighted to hear that you had a great experience with us, and that the team were able to help you see and feel your best. Thank you for being our valued patient, and we look forward to helping you again soon!  Warm Regards, Patient Relations

name: Spooky 'Verb
text: Top notch, highly recommended. Doctor Cecil was fantastic and the staff was the coolest to work with. Best experience I've ever had at the optometrist's office from the examination to the staff helping me choose the best frames. Thank you. 👍

resp.text: Hello, we're ecstatic to learn about your satisfaction with your recent experience! Thank you for allowing us to care for your vision needs, we look forward to serving you again in the future. Best regards.

name: cassandra sam
text: The people that work here are really nice. They all worked very well with each other and the Doctor. They were very professional and worked in a timely manner. Very clean place and lots of options for glasses of all styles and brands. highly recommend this place for an optometrist!

resp.text:
Hello Cassandra Sam,

Thank you for the positive review! Glad you had a positive experience. At MyEyeDr We are committed to prioritizing your care and assisting you with all your vision needs with our neighborhood doctors. We look forward to serving you again.

Kind regards

Patient Relations.

Warm regard,
Patient Relations

Patient Relations

text: Best experience ever.  Everyone was great, I had great service.  I will always use this location for my eye needs.  Thank you MyEyeDr.

Sincerely,
Patient Relations

name: Tessa Stinson
text: The staff and doctor residing are well knowledgeable in all things eye care associated and always greet us with a smile an wonderful service!

resp.text: Hello Tessa, thank you for allowing us to serve you for your vision needs. We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Have a fantastic day.

name: Aleda Richards
text: Wow!!! The things I didn’t know with insurance!!! Thank goodness Courtney was there to patiently explain to me what I didn’t understand. My husband’s glasses look amazing too!!! Thank you💕💕💕

resp.text:
Hi Aleda,
Thank you for your 5-star review.  We're thrilled to hear our insurance expert, Courtney, was able to assist and make the entire process easy!  We know your husband will love his glasses! We look forward to seeing you both again soon.
Kind Regards, Patient Relations

name: Katie Burns
text: What a pleasant experience my husband and I had this week at My Eye Dr.- Madison location. Stephanie was so professional and has amazing customer service. She was able to work us in during the crazy covid-19 madness and she did a fantastic job answering our questions and following all of the new procedures that are a must these days. Tina, the manager, gave me a call today to let me know that she found a discount that could be applied to make our total cheaper. Tina was also amazing and spent time working through which pair of glasses would work best. We will definitely go to this location from now on. Great job team!

resp.text: Katie, We take the safety of our Patients and Staff very seriously! It means a great deal to have received your positive feedback and 5-STAR Review. We have taken the liberty of sharing your feedback with the office as they would really love to hear about how well they service our Patients. We look forward to seeing you again soon! Take Care and Be Safe.

name: Erica Ham
text: This is a great optometry office. It is close to work for a quick visit on lunch. Everyone is very open and honest with you, and provide A+ care. I also enjoyed Jennifer showing me how to put in my contacts! She was very patient and kind. Defiantly will be coming back here. Thank you!

resp.text: Good Afternoon Erica, MyEyeDr is happy to hear that Jennifer did a great job in assisting you with your contacts. Thank you for the 5 star rating. We look forward to seeing you again.

name: Billy Williams
text: The whole team was helpful and pleasant to talk to

resp.text:
Hi Billy,
We appreciate your feedback! At MyEyeDr our community doctors are committed to prioritizing your care and assisting you with all your vision needs. We look forward to serving you again.
Kind regards, Patient Relations.

name: Nikki Elio
text: The Dr. was great and very thorough. The front office/General Manger was positive and helped with insurance coverage. All were Friendly and professional. I really recommend!

resp.text:
Hey Nikki,
We are proud to have provided you with 5-star service! Here at MyEyeDr, your satisfaction is our top priority and we can't wait to share your response with our Madison, AL team. Thank you for choosing MyEyeDr to guide your journey toward healthy vision. We look forward to your next visit with us.
Best regards.

name: Jessica Wright
text: Best eye doctor I’ve ever been to! The tech Jennifer is so nice and will really make you feel at home. Definitely recommend to anyone. 😊

resp.text: Good Afternoon Jessica, Thank you for the 5 star review. MyEyeDr is happy to hear that you had such an amazing experience. We look forward to seeing you at you next exam.

name: Luke Bryan
text: Each time I've been or called, the reception staff was relatively uninterested or rude. The doc I got assigned to had the worst bedside manner I've seen from a doctor, not even caring to answer questions I tried asking. Walmart had a better doctor honestly. After all of that my prescription still ended up being wrong. I don't understand what the issue is, but I don't intend to go back. Three stars because there were two or three nice enough people and I hate leaving bad reviews.

name: Jacqueline Allen
text: I’ve always had great experience with this location. Even with the stress of everything going on right now, the whole staff has been AMAZING, and extremely helpful. I will definitely continue to come back!

resp.text: Hello Jacqueline, we appreciate your feedback. Thank you for your 5 star rating. We are happy to hear our staff is doing a great job. MyEyeDr can't wait to see you for your next exam.

name: Jordan James
text: I came to the Madison location and didn't have an appointment, but I needed a glasses repair.  I called the number on the door and a very nice lady with blonde hair greeted me, and took my glasses inside and repaired them, with no charge, and she saved the day, as I was headed out of town!  I recommend going there for any needs! So friendly!!!

resp.text:
Hi Jordan,
Thank you for sharing your experience.  We are beyond delighted to hear we were able to quickly remedy your issue and get you back to your day!  Our goal is to assist your vision needs no matter what they may be and it sound like we were able to do just that.  We look forward to seeing you again!
Warm regards, Patient Relations

name: Ashley Swanner
text: Hands down the best place to go to get glasses. Tina and her team helped my son get the right size glasses. I will continue to go back here. Everyone here is very polite and helpful with anything from answering questions to picking out your frames.

resp.text: Good Afternoon Ashley, Thank you for being a part of the MyEyeDr family! Thank you for the 5 star rating. We are glad our team was able to help your son get the glasses he needed. We look forward to seeing him again.

name: Thomas Gore
text: Great service, friendly staff.

resp.text:
Hello Thomas,

We could not be more pleased with the service you received here at MyEyeDr. Thank you so much for your 5-Star review. Our mission is to provide you with the quality service you deserve. Your feedback is very valuable to us, so we can continue to strive to provide our patients with the best experiences. See you soon. Warm Regards

name: Stephanie DeMonia
text: I just had my first exam here and was very pleased.  I was taken back before my appointment time.  The tech was very friendly, efficient, and knowledgeable, and their equipment is topnotch.  Dr. Tucker was extremely nice and informative. He suggested a new brand of contacts to me, but wanted to be sure that I tried them for as long as I wanted before placing my order.  The best part of the experience was probably selecting new glasses with Kimberly.  She was very patient, kind, honest, and wanted to help me select the best items and upgrades for my specific needs.  The rewards program they have is great.  If you buy a year's worth of contacts, you get a discount on a pair of glasses, as well as a free pair of sunglasses from a pretty wide selection, or $30 off any other pair of sunglasses.  They will also replace any lost or torn contacts, or swap any unopened boxes for a new prescription, should your prescription change. I would highly recommend this location.

name: barry dooley
text: Went in for a new prescription for reading glasses. Could not see better at work so went back for another prescription 2.5 months later and was given a revised prescription. Spoke to office manager and would not reimburse additional cost for second pair of lenses. I will use another optometrist next time. Do not recommend.

name: Jennifer Selock
text: I needed a backup pair of progressive glasses before my insurance ended. I had a current eyeglass prescription and was able to make an appointment quickly that accommodated my narrow timeline.  Courtney was a Sweetheart and extremely polite getting me scheduled. Tina D. was wonderful and extremely knowledgeable when I came in to select all the correct options for my progressive lenses to maximize the vision benefits I had. I could not be happier with my experience and reccomend MyEyeDr Madison for all your eyecare and eyewear needs! ☆☆☆☆☆

resp.text: Good Afternoon Jennifer, Thank you for the 5 STAR RATING!  We look forward to seeing your again soon.

name: Hannah Norman
text: I took my daughter for her first eye exam and had excellent service. She was VERY scared about the dilation drops so the office manager came in and held her hand. I was very pleased with the whole entire staff. We most definitely will be back!

resp.text: Hello Hannah, Your recommendation means so much to us and we're so happy to have earned it.Thank you again for taking the time to let the world know about your positive experience. Have a great day!

name: Mikey
text: love the people here! tessa was a great contacts coach for my contacts and the workers are always very nice. i wouldn't call them JUST MyEyeDr, but i would call them MyEyeFamily

resp.text: Hi Mikey, wow, 5-stars! Tessa and our Madison, AL team will be thrilled to learn of your satisfaction. It is always our pleasure to assist our valued patient on your journey to healthy vision. Contact Lenses can be tricky at times but we are glad that Tessa was able to provide quality assistance to you. We appreciate your time in sharing with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon! Best regards.

name: Lindsay Page
text: I live about an hour away from this location but I’ve always loved the variety of glasses they offer. I use a different eye doctor so I brought my prescription and my insurance cards in about 10 days ago and everyone was so helpful! The lady at the desk looked up my insurance and told me what my insurance would cover and what I would have to pay out of pocket. She told me someone would come out to help me shortly so I started looking around and I found one pair I liked. Then Darren came and looked around with me. I told him I wanted something unique and he asked me some questions. He found these awesome Oliver Peoples glasses that I probably never would have tried on, but I did and I loved the way the looked on me! Darren really went above and beyond helping me find the perfect glasses and even educated me about my vision and taught me some techniques on how to preserve my vision. So I had two pairs I really liked and a couple different employees came and looked and gave me their opinions. I decided on the Oliver Peoples frames kind of unsure about my decision but everyone told me they looked great. He told me they would take 7-10 business days so I wasn’t expecting them to be ready until midweek next week. But I got a call yesterday and Darren told me my glasses were ready and he remembered me saying I live in Cullman and he told me he spoke with the manager who said she would be in Cullman on Thursday and offered to bring them with her to deliver them to me or they could ship them to my house. I couldn’t wait to get them so I got them yesterday and they are perfect! I love the way they fit me and I have already received so many compliments! Darren really went above and beyond helping me and I can’t recommend this place or him enough!!

resp.text: Hey Lindsay, we appreciate your time in sharing your experience with us. We are beyond thrilled that you received the quality care that we, at MyEyeDr, strive to provide. We value each and every patient, that is why it is so important to us that you leave the office 100% satisfied. Darren has immaculately displayed the friendly, professional service that we require of our associates. Thank you for allowing us to guide your journey to healthy vision. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future. Warm regards.

name: brittany childress
text: Love this place!

resp.text: Hi Brittany, we're so pleased to have been able to meet your satisfaction. We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Best regards.

name: Meg Taylor
text: I recently bought glasses from MyEyeDr and had a wonderful experience. They have one of the largest selection of glasses I have ever seen. They young lady, Courtney, went above and beyond her duties helping me pick out the perfect pair that suited me best. I would highly recommend MyEyeDr. Ask for Courtney!

resp.text: Hello Meg, Wow! Your recommendation means so much to us and we're honored to have earned it. Our optometrists and the Madison AL team pride themselves in making sure our patients are ensured with excellent vision care. We truly understand how important it is in choosing that perfect frame, and we’re so pleased to have shared that experience with you. You’re our valued patient and your vision concerns are front and centered in our platform. Warm Regards!

name: Nic Jolley
text: Excellent customer service and staff. The optometrist and his staff are very friendly and knowledgeable. If you have VSP vision you must try them out!

resp.text: Thanks, Nic, for your kind words and five-star review for our Madison location.  We appreciate you taking the time to let us know how we did. Take Care!

name: bailey pickett
text: Wonderful doctor & a great staff. Everybody is so nice & professional. We will be back for sure!

resp.text: Hello Bailey, we're thrilled to hear that your experience at our Madison office was so wonderful. The staff at MyEyeDr. love providing our patients with exquisite eye care in a warm and welcoming atmosphere. We appreciate your kind words and love seeing this amazing review. Please do not hesitate to reach out if you need anything else, it has been a pleasure to serve you.

name: Kaitlin Mayes
text: Super convenient location and fantastic hours. Staff was helpful and got me in and out quick. I was able to get a contact and glasses appointment done at the same time! It was nice to be able to renew both prescriptions in one visit. Dr. Tucker was great and so was Ro!

name: Joann Loy
text: I’m not sure why several people had such issues. I called yesterday to make an appointment. Tina was extremely nice and helpful. I wanted an appointment soon and ended up with one two weeks out which was ok. Later that day I got a call that they had a cancellation and I could come the NEXT day! They were all very helpful with insurance, frames, payment etc. The tech was very nice and the doctor was thorough and nice. I can highly recommend them.

name: Eugene and Dianne Richards
text: We were very pleased with the new staff and their help during my husband's visit.  Tina worked diligently to find just the right glasses he needed and still keep our cost low.  Thank you and we will be back...

name: Marie Richards
text: I walked into Schaeffer not really wanting to buy, just to look, but the staff was so friendly, and helpful.  I purchased a year supply of contacts, with my insurance.  They gave me a free pair of sunglasses, and 50% off of a pair of glasses as well.  The management had changed for the better and I will defiantly give them a 5 star!! RECOMMENDED!

name: Jasmine Crutcher
text: Doctor and tech are great. Did have to wait 30 minutes after my scheduled appointment time to see the doctor. Front desk staff are not friendly and they are incompetent. They scheduled me an appointment with a specialist for 9 am of next week. Did not write down or give me any information about the appointment (location, doctor...etc). I came back up there to pick up my contacts. When i asked for the information she had none because she didn't make a note of it in my record. She just looked confused. When I asked if she remembered this literally from two days before she said "I make appointments for a lot of people" obviously not well enough. Since she had no clue who my appointment was with or what time, she rescheduled me for a random time that I did not approve of and that I can't go to. I made a yelp account just so I can say don't go here. Go to the one in Providence!

name: Tina DeMaioribus
text: I shopped around to many locations before I choose Schaeffer for my sunglasses.  My son and daughter both purchased their sunglasses from here.  From the second I entered, I was welcomed with a smile and an urgency.  I have been to other eye places and I understand that the LAB has the control of the orders most of the time.  Although, mine were not delayed and on time, I understand that sometimes it is out of the employees control. I would highly recommend.

name: Lacy Hollaway
text: I just left from getting an exam for contacts and I had a really good experience. Everyone was friendly, I was in and out in a timely manner and I got what I went for. Simple.

name: April Harbison
text: Awesome

resp.text: Hello April, thank you for your five-star review. We can't wait to see you again in the future. Have a fantastic day!

name: Alison Farrow
text: Poor service. Had a bad experience last year with them messing up my insurance. And this year with an appointment. It takes me over an half and hour to get to this office. Traffic was bad so I called them to let them know I was on my way. They say my appointment was must have been canceled and asked if I spoke with a “real” person when I confirmed. They say the doctor isn’t seeing any additional people today. While I’m on the phone with the  Providence office they leave a message saying they “found” my appointment and it’s for next week. Even through all my records show (and their phone call  previously). Someone in that office messed up. Not going to them anymore

name: Sabrina Faer
text: What a bust! They had no problem selling me a pair of glasses with all the trimmings ($1200) but when it came to needing a repair on the frames they told me there was nothing they could do. Since when do you sell a product and then not support it with repairs?! I spent so much money on these glasses and have worn glasses my entire life (50+ yrs). I have never had anyone ever tell me...there is nothing we can do.  I have no faith in this company and will go out of my way to make sure others are aware to BEWARE!

name: teresa wilbourn
text:
Definitely will be recommending to others!
Great place , doctor and staff were great !

name: Laura Goode
text: I took my Grandson who happens to have medcaid for his eye exam. The doctor was great but office staff were rude and lacked knowledge of the process. Once I said we were using medicaid they couldn't be bothered to show us frames . Literally pointed at area where the frames were and sat down . I was very offended at the difference in how we were treated.

name: Savannah Hamilton
text: I went to schaeffer this past week with my family and I felt so welcomed . The have amazing staff .. I have never seen anyone of the before there, but they did amazing!! Would recommend to anyone!!! I can tell they have been doing something different. Love them !!!!!

name: Meagen Rice
text: We have had nothing but great experiences at this office. My husband, son along with myself switched to Schaffers Eye Center over a year ago and every time we all go in it has been nothing but a positive experience. The front desk is friendly, the Dr. is friendly and professional and every phone conversations I have had with them has been great. We very much recommend this office.

name: Dairian Steinke
text: I absolutely love Schaefer in Madison. The staff is very friendly and very well educated in the products. I love my glasses! Will recommend to all my friends and family!

name: Melessa Shaver
text: I ordered my glasses on March 29, 2018, I still don't have them ad was informed that I might get them by May 25, 2018. The Doctors are great but the lab that's another story. You just take a chance with them. My husband got his glasses there also with no issues. So I guess you can say you have a 50-50 chance of having problems. Maybe concern purchasing your glasses somewhere else after your appointment with the optometrist.

name: Shannon R. Casey
text: It was our first time here and it was a great experience for my son.   The staff was very friendly from the time we came in until the time we left.  We will definitely recommend you and be back!

name: Dominique Taggert
text: Everyone was friendly and very helpful. Setting up my appointments are a breeze and the staff was very professional.

name: Jessica Riley
text: Dr. Tucker was friendly and professional. He answered my questions with ease and made sure I was comfortable. The front desk staff and tech were friendly and helpful, as well. I enjoyed my experience.

name: Seth Miller
text:
Poor experience. Unknowledgable staff. I wasn’t greeted or asked if I needed any assistance. So I greeted myself and I requested to be directed to the men’s salt brand glasses (which they advertise as having.)
The response was
“the men’s and women’s are mixed and the brands are sort of mixed as well. Someone came in yesterday and moved things around. I know we have lots of those here”
After 15 min of walking around and leaving to answer phone calls. I gave up.
Unorganized & unhelpful. Wouldn’t recommend.

name: Ahsanul Majid
text: Dr Tucker!!!! It's hard to believe that he is a doctor or a money sucker? I had a terrible experience there and that was my first and last visit there. I could very well understand they doing all those tests just to make money. In my case the nurse said everything is good but the doctor said it's not and requires different tests. Before having the report he was telling about it. I wanted to see the report and he replied it's not with him! I don't  recommend anyone to go to him in future.

name: Natalie Hall
text: I love going there and getting my glasses !!! The doctor is great also. I love going to see the staff !! They are starting to be like family to me ! Its one thing just to hand me my glasses,  but it means alot when they ask how i am or how my family is !! LOVE THIS PLACE !!!!!!

name: Lajuanna Bowles
text: I was turned around for my appointment after being 15 minutes late, due to traffic. The doctor refused to see me according to the front office staff. The staff, a dark complexion male,  was not helpful at all insisted that I reschedule. He seemed be bothered by me even being in the office. Complete waste of time.

name: Karalyn Webber
text: Why pay $600 to $1200 for a pair of glasses.  Discover Costco vision department.  I bought new designer frames with progressive lens for about $200.  And I love them.  And, I get free service, such as adjustments, replacement parts...whatever....anytime I need them.  You are not getting better glasses just because you pay an outrageous price!  You are getting regular run-of-the-mill glasses at an enormous price.

name: Michelle Hastings
text: The front staff was not friendly at all. After my eye's was dilated I was told here are the glasses and the employee walked off. I couldn't see to pick out any glasses. No help or customer service at all. There is not a free one year warranty on the frames like other places either. I have never got glasses anywhere that didn't have a free one year warranty on the frames.There glasses are overpriced as it is.I will never do business there ever again.

name: CHRISTINE NAYIGA
text: I am giving this place one star because I can't give them a zero. The doctor is great but the other staff are very unhelpful and rude. I ordered my glasses 3 weeks ago and still haven't received them. But I have received 3 messages reminding me that my glasses were ready for pick up but unfortunately everytime I have gone to pick them up, they weren't there or even ready. Lost my whole family as customers. Please stay away from this place

name: Phillip McMurran
text: I was a customer for 5 years but not anymore. My and I wife had eye examination 12/28/17 at 1:45 and 2:00pm. We had gotten a reminder card in the mail a month ago and called and confirmed the appointment. Yesterday 12-27-17 they called to confirm the appointment. We walked into the eye care center and they said there was no appointment scheduled. We were the only people there at that time. The young man at the counter was nice about the problem but did not offer any solutions.

name: Rae M
text: Prescription was late getting to my husband who was being deployed. They said glasses would be there on time. Came day after he left. I picked them up, shipped them quickly to Hawaii before he left on a boat. They gave him wrong prescription and ordered wrong color lenses for his sunglasses. Terrible experience. DO NOT GO HERE!!!

name: Shavonne Lang
text: My experience today was very unpleasant. I came at 11:00 for an 11:30 appointment. There were issues with my insurance coverage and at that time all else was pushed to the side. They never asked for another payment option. Basically there's nothing else we care to help you with today so goodbye. I had two pair of my son eyeglasses with me that needed repair and they wouldn't even look at them. 15 minutes after leaving I stopped at another eye exam location and they helped me and fix those eyeglasses immediately free of charge.

name: Pablo Torres
text: GREAT PLACE TO GO. DR TUCKER IS A GREAT DOCTOR AND VERY PROFESSIONAL.I HIGHLY RECOMEND HIM.

name: Ginger Potter
text: I loved this please very nice people and the dr was nice . I give them AAA+

name: Matt Smith
text: Great variety of frames but they'll try taking you for every penny you're worth

name: Aiden Ponder
text: It a good eye doctor place for you to go

name: AD Williams
text: Dr Kennedy, Leslie and Holly were a fantastic team.  They quickly and efficiently took care of my needs (exam, new perscription, frame selection, lense selection).  Then they patiently took care of my 6 year old daughter's needs (exam, new perscription, frame selection)  We will definitely return!

name: Adam DeMaioribus
text: Incredible staff and a great selection!

name: Samantha Smith
text: Not a great experience. The doctor was fine, but office staff was unhelpful and not very kind.

name: Andrea Layden
text:
April 28th I went to the dr at Schaeffer Eye Center in Madison. I was dissatisfied with the service, wrote my $10 copay check and got the hell out of there without filling my glasses prescription.

I felt like a mark insread of a patient because they kept pushing upsell products. Progressive lenses this, no glare coating that even in the exam room! I went to discuss costs while my eyes were dilating. The cost of the coating alone is astronomical. I asked if I really needed it and her answer was "I wouldn't wear glasses without it." That's great. But not at all what I asked. As I said, I left without glasses after paying my copay. (I did drive myself home with dilated eyes. I was not offered any tinted protection when I left nor was I informed how long it could last)

Just YESTERDAY (6/1) the $10 copay check hit my bank account causing an overdraft. I called to see what the hell happened. The lady told me their system had been down and they couldn't process payments for "a while now." THEIR SYSTEM HAD BEEN DOWN. As in an internal computer program that does ACH couldn't process payments and they just sat.

Let me rephrase: for over one month they did not process any payments because it was easier to not get paid than take checks to a physical bank. Thus screwing up my and potentially hundreds of other's banking.*

WHAT????!!!!

WHO RUNS A BUSINESS LIKE THIS??!!!

I was already not coming back. They didn't need to make the decision any easier.

*I understand it is my responsibility to maintain my bank account and ensure checks are processed. This was still a shock to me as I'm sure it was to many others.

name: Italian Guy
text: Horrible Experience, I lost my Job with the Government and temporarily was on Medicaid which they take. They treated me like a second class citizen, rude, obnoxious, unprofessional. I couldn't believe how unpleasant and unprofessional and don't even get me started on their outrageous pricing. Not only will I never return I'll make sure to spread the word of this horrible joke of a Business.

name: Daniel Marchand
text:
After combining my EyeMed discount and FEP Blue Vision plan for 3 years I've been told you can't do that and you must pick one. Upon further research and a call to BCBS, I've determined this to be true, and the fact that they did honor both was a mistake in my favor for the past 3 years.  I'm still a little annoyed at the way it was handled as the manager looked at us like crazy people when we said we have been doing this all along (since I changed insurance plans) and this is the first we've been told it cannot be combined.

Overall I like the Madison location better, a bit less selection on glasses, but not as busy. Started in the University Drive location since they do Saturday appointments (Madison doesn't).

FYI: for contact wearers this place charges a $75 fitting fee (with insurance), Walmart is only $30... contacts are contacts are contacts... I did a contact exam last year and got sticker shock at the register, but my fault for not asking first.

name: Vicky Goodwin
text: I bought $900 glasses from them in July, and the nose piece fell off a few weeks later. They repaired it but said the place where it screwed in was stripped so it might not hold. Sure enough, a week later they both fell off. I took them back in and they repaired them again, but admitted they were defective. I asked to have them replaced and they refused! They said they would sell me new frames for 20% off. The same ones with the same problem and no warranty!

name: Tracy Anderson
text: Pharmacy sent over multiple insurance authorizations to the office for the prescription Dr. Tucker prescribed and each and every one of them went unanswered/unreturned. I have spent three weeks trying to case paperwork, when all that is needed is a signature. This is unprofessional, causing needless stress and suffering. The office is careless with paperwork and doesn't care about the level of patient care

name: Ben Henrie
text: Worst customer service. Never go back. The office staff just gave us attitude about everything. Went to pick up the glasses and  they couldn't  find them the next day they called to say they had found the glasses. We went to them because they are in our insurance network.

name: Imani Williams
text: Best place ever!!!!!!!

name: Katie Murphree
text: Phenomenal place !!!!!!

name: Angela Dennis
text: Doctor was ok but staff was horrible

name: Samuel Cordner
text: Took $500 from us even though our insurance said that the glasses where to be free. They were supposed to be a preferred provider. Don't go here.

name: North Alabama Arrowhead P
text: What a joke

name: Eli Wooten
text: Front counter person working there was completely rude and acted like every question we had was something a first grader should know

name: Cashidah Hunt
text: I went for my initial comprehensive exam and was glad I did. The office was clean, the staff were all pleasant, and Dr. Samford was very informative during my exam. The only downside was the lack of frames to choose from. I ended up not purchasing any, but I was provided my prescription which I can use to order frames elsewhere.

name: Karen Davidson
text: Dr. Samford is very patient and thorough.  It is a pleasant experience to visit for exams! Highly recommended!

name: AR AR
text:
Do not visit this shop. I waited over 1.5 hours to see the doctor, no apologies, no reason why it took so long. Doctor came in, didn’t even introduce herself, gave me my rx and was out in 5 minutes.

I ordered glasses and they took over 3 weeks. I do not even have high prescriptions.

I will never go back. And never recommend this place to anyone else

name: Shamar English Smiley
text: Short wait time; good customer service; appt. reminders sent up until the day of the appointment; thorough exam and information given during and afterwards; friendly staff.

name: Priyanka Patel
text: Wonderful staff who is prompt in getting you the attention you need! I’d definitely recommend them to others.

name: Deb Henley
text: Dr. Samford is wonderful. Attentive, knowledgeable and kind. She has always been able to set my eyeglass and contact prescription perfectly. I am very comfortable visiting her office for my yearly eye exam.

name: Bryant Thurman
text: Great place! Even with the covid restrictions. Staff were extremely helpful and performed their jobs extremely well. I will definitely make this location my regular eye clinic.

name: Tania Begum
text: Amanda the receptionist is amazing! My work schedule makes it difficult to make appointments and I let her know which days I would be available and she was able to get me an appointment the very next week! It was my first experience for an eye exam and Dr. Samford was amazing! She took the time to explain everything she was doing before hand and answered all of my questions! Would definitely recommend Hoover vision center!

name: Grant Hollingsworth
text: I cannot recommend Dr. Samford enough. I have worn glasses and/or contacts for 21 years, have seen upwards of 10 optometrists, and have never had a doctor spend as much time dialing in my prescription. It is greatly appreciated and gives you a lot of confidence that you are in the right lenses. Not to mention her expert handling of an infection that could have led to permanent damage in my right eye. I moved out of Hoover last year but I still gladly make the trip back once a year to see her.

name: Gigi Gasc
text: A great group of professional people that they take care of you on time and with a great patient care it has been my Vision Center for a few years thank you 😊

name: Kelly Reaves
text: We’ve been going for years.  Love Dr. Samford!

name: taylor lane
text: Always a wonderful experience! The staff and Dr. Samford are helpful, kind, and thorough. We were referred to this clinic from another happy patient and I will pass the referral on!

name: James Manning
text: Best and most accurate exam! Friendly and helpful team!

name: Susan Cook
text: Always a pleasant experience and high quality care.

name: Mark “Xlorntabis” E.
text: So glad to have found Hoover Vision! Dr. Samford is wonderful, and everyone there is compassionate and take pride in what they do.

name: Paula Adcock
text: Best eye exam by Dr. Marbourg I’ve had in a long time.   I could not have asked for nicer office staff, all went above and beyond.  Made you feel comfortable and not rushed. Highly recommend!!

name: Ann S.
text: I took my mother for an eye exam at Hoover Vision Center and she was very pleased. Everyone there is knowledgeable, friendly and accommodating. The office spaces are clean and staff were actively disinfecting shared areas. I'd highly recommend!

name: Kelly Guthrie
text: Hoover Vision Center is AWESOME! From the minute that I walked in, Dr Samford, Amanda, and Amy made me feel so welcome. They were so knowledgeable and skilled at helping me select a new pair of glasses. I ABSOLUTELY LOVE WEARING MY NEW GLASSES! I GIVE THEM 5++++++ STARS!

name: Gary Peterson
text: Dr. Samford was very friendly, thorough, and answered all of my questions. I highly recommend her!

name: Heidi Saul
text:
Amazingly great customer service with safe COVID-19 precautions.  I felt very comfortable and safe throughout my entire visit.

Selection and recommendations on glasses were right on target and looking forward to sporting my new glasses from Hoover Vision Center

name: Kayla Hoover
text: The office is very clean and welcoming. Every staff member we came in contact with was very friendly. I have a five-year-old and eight-year-old and the doctor was so patient while dealing with my five-year-old who is very antsy. I would definitely recommend this office to other people.

name: Donna Dahl
text: Very courteous and competent staff! I feel heard and asked for any needs that I might have.

name: Leigh Reed
text: Everyone was super nice and helpful!!

name: Sharon Hollingsworth
text: I ALWAYS HAVE A GREAT EXPERIENCE. EVERY GOOD DOCTOR AND CARING STAFF.

name: Scott
text: First of all, the ladies in the front are friendly, experienced, and knowledgeable about how to provide you the best service.  They will fight for you to get the best out of your insurance.  I witnessed it for another patient.   This was my first visit, and Dr. Samford was excellent.  She listened to me about my needs and frustration with another office and doctor and found a solution that worked for me.  The office seems well appointed, clean, and has plenty of options.  Don’t be fooled by the location in a strip mall.  It’s a gem, and why would you want to pay for the overhead?  I highly recommend this practice.

name: Dynasty Thom
text: They are very professional and caring i would recommend them with no hesitation

name: Robin Moore
text: I feel like they valued my time which is very important to me.  I was taken to a room in a timely manner.  Dr. Samford was thorough and explained everything to me. The ladies did a great job assisting me with my frame choice.  Best experience at a vision center!

name: Karen Kato
text: Excellent care, quick, informative and no pressure.   In fact it was nice that the receptionist let me know I could download and fill out all paperwork before I got there, speeding up the time not spent filling out paperwork and delaying my appointment!   Dr was awesome with answering all my questions!

name: Carlton Riley Smith
text: Our family has been going to Hoover Vision for years. We would not trust anyone else with our eye care. Dr Samford is not only knowledgeable, but listens, explains, and helps solve your problems. After years of having trouble with red eyes, she finally helped me to solve the problem by referring me to specialists. For her, everything is about the patient.

name: Arreis “NaturalDiva” Black
text: Staff was welcoming and it didn’t take long to be seen. Doctor was thorough with the process. I would recommend this office if you are close to Hoover area. Will continue to go here for my annual eye exam.

name: Dona Land
text: I'm very happy with Hoover Vision.  Dr Marbourg is extremely thorough and seems like she really cares. The staff are all super helpful and friendly.

name: Elaine Burke
text: The staff is amazing. They made me feel welcome. They were able to see me same day, no hassle, everything was explained to me in full detail. This is an amazing group and I look forward to seeing them for future eye visits! I highly HIGHLY recommend! (Elaine Dykes)

name: DreamingLikeWindFish
text: What an amazing eye doctor! I first went here when I woke up one morning with some eye pain and just searched for the nearest eye doctor near me and, wow, did I luck out. Every time I’ve gone to see Dr Samford, I am always in and out with very little to no wait time. She is very friendly and takes time to explain anything that comes up during the exam. The entire staff here is the friendliest and most helpful that I have ever encountered at any doctor’s office and I’m so glad that I found them.

name: Crystal Kulow
text: I started going to Hoover Vision Center last year when I moved to Hoover. The staff is friendly and the doctors are very thorough. They truly listen and make sure they have all the health information and facts they need to provide the best eye care. I'm so glad I chose them!

name: Rose Brown
text: We were greeted the moment we walked  through the door. Everyone were professionally, friendly, & courteous. They made me feel like I am important & they care about me. I'm willing to travel 4.5 hours  for an appointment.

name: Nijah Corbitt
text: They were very friendly and pointed me in the right direction my vision. They didn't try to make me get glasses but set me up with a cornea specialist!

name: Kellie Williams
text: The staff is SO friendly and helpful! The last time I was in for my appointment they were running a tad behind. They apologized & once made aware that I was on my lunch break, the Dr made sure to be considerate of the time. I was able to make it back to work on time. The waiting area is small but open & everyone was very friendly & upbeat. I even cut up with other customers waiting & trying on glasses. It has a very “ at home “ feel to it & the Dr is precious! She’s knowledgeable and kind. I felt cared about & listened to. The staff has always been more than willing to help me in any way possible. I highly recommend them!

name: Marty Harbert
text: I’ve been to many different doctors over the years and you always feel like just another customer.  Hoover Vision really cares about getting your prescription correct the first time.  First Rate doctor!!!!

name: Erika R. Harvell
text: I have been going here for a couple of years for my eye checkups. I usually see Dr. Samford, but both doctors are really great! They are friendly, don’t rush, ask lots of questions and take thorough notes, and make sure you understand everything they’re doing. I feel like they care about their patients and that’s why I highly recommend both of them! Their office staff is great, too. They return messages promptly and are very friendly and helpful!

name: Michelle Welsch
text: I was seen by Dr. Samford today, and she was absolutely wonderful in every way. The staff at Hoover Vision Center were so nice and helpful today. They are all a great team together. Teamwork makes the dream work!

name: Amy Wharton
text: Super friendly staff. They were able to fit me in very quickly when I had vision problems. The Dr. was very nice. Highly recommend.

name: Ponya Parks
text: Excellent service! Dr. Samford, Amy and Amanda are all wonderful. I highly recommend Hoover Vision Center. Thanks for taking care of me!

name: Matthew Whitaker
text: Awesome place!   We love Dr. Samford!!!   She’s so helpful and knowledgeable.  She sees BOTH our children and they love her too.  I highly suggest checking them out.  You won’t be disappointed.

name: dearley4
text: First time here and I thought every one there was friendly and helpful and very knowledgeable as to what they do.  I highly recommend them to any one look for eye care

name: Diana Knight
text: Very comprehensive exam ! Staff members very professional and friendly.  I truly felt cared for.

name: Dan LaFave
text: Doctor and staff go above and beyond to accommodate thier patients. Care and quality are top notch.

name: Virginia Blake
text: The doctors and their Assistant Amanda were all great. I would refer them to everyone else.

name: Pam Thompson
text: Prompt, pleasant service.  They take great care of their clients!

name: Jason Milligan
text: Dr Samford and her staff were friendly, professional, and very knowledgeable. If you are looking for an eye care provider I highly recommend.

name: Mary Davis
text: They are Awesome me and my kids have being coming for two years! Great customer service and very professional!!!

name: Firas Nasr
text: It was my first visit today with my wife and everyone was friendly and professional and with variety of frames to choose from. Will always come here for my eyes exams. I wish the paperworks to register the patients are much less it was alot to fill.

name: Kristy Louden
text: Staff is super friendly and doc put me at ease unlike any eye doc I've ever been to before.

name: Hannah Turner
text: I love Dr. Samford and the ladies that work in the office. They are always polite and helpful. I enjoy seeing them once a year and if I ever have an issue they work with my schedule to get me seen as soon as possible.

name: Anthony Scillia
text: It is always a pleasant experience at Hoover eye. Staff and Dr. are just awesome! You won’t go wrong.

name: Amber Childers
text: I was afraid because an eye injury caused by clumsy gardening was not healing. I expressed my concerns over the phone. Even though they were booked for the next day, they still made arrangements for me to be seen first thing in the morning.  The office is welcoming. The glasses on display are stylish and beautifully displayed. I wish I had a longer wait time so I could browse more. The doctor was friendly and explained everything. I will definitely come here again.

name: Anonymous
text: Loved!! They’re all super friendly and sweet. Best eye exam I’ve had in my life !

name: Jeff Taylor
text: Dr. Marbourg and her staff are fantastic! Convenient location with an exceptional selection of frames.

name: Sonya Calhoun
text: This was the most thorough and complete eye exam I've ever had. I could tell every single person in the office is knowledgeable and passionate about what they do. Hands down the best experience I've ever had getting an eye exam. They have multiple styles and prices of eyewear to choose from. The environment in the office is warm and welcoming. The entire staff is professional and friendly and Dr Marbourg is wonderful.

name: James Shaw
text: Always first class service by Dr. Marbourg and her team.

name: Tracey Hollie
text:
Hoover Vision Center has great office staff. It was a pleasant experience from start to finish. The best part was the discounts I received on my glasses. That means they are also very affordable. I
Will definetly be back for my next pair of glasses.

name: Chiquetta Simon
text: This office has a very friendly and professional staff.

name: Michael Price
text: Very friendly staff with a nice and quiet office. They'll get you in and out quickly as well.

name: Deborah Wilson
text: I have been a patient of Dr Robin Marbourg's for years . I have always received great treatment from her and great service from the staff. I highly recommend Hoover Vision Center for all eye  care services .

name: Allison Brymer
text: Dr. Samford is quick and aggressive, and very nice! I enjoy my visits with her and the staff that work there.

name: Charity Pinkney
text: My son and I are just in love with this place! Everyone is nice here!!! I recommend this vision center to anyone who is looking for a new eye doctor and they are very friendly with the children!!!

name: Lisa Withington
text: Dr Samford is GREAT! She and her staff are very professional, courteous, friendly and helpful. I highly recommend Hoover Vision Center!

name: Tere Gilbert
text: Friendly staff. I was able to get an appointment quickly. Great prices! Convenient location!

name: Eryn McKinney
text: All staff is very friendly,professional, and knowledgeable!

name: Christine Ray
text: I have visited Dr. Samford for several years.  She is thorough and takes time to educate me about my vision changes and care of my eyes.  She was great with my elementary age daughter as well.  The entire staff is friendly and efficient.  Eyeglass selection is top notch. So glad to have Hoover Vision Center as a health partner!

name: Jeff Taylor
text: Dr. Marbourg and her staff are great people and fun to be with.  They are courteous and respectful to everyone and you will be glad that you trusted them with your eye health.

name: Brenda Little
text: Very friendly, knowledgeable. Drs. Always very nice. Has always been very knowledgeable of my history. Would recommend to my friends and family.

name: Chenghui Song
text: Very patient and knowledgeable team. A great experience. Thanks!

name: Amanda Denney
text: Horrible experience.  Do not go here! They rushed my daughter so much that they did not even try her glasses on her when she received them. They are too tight on her & Amy is telling me to take the glasses some place else to get them loosened.  My daughter picked out one pair and they ordered her something totally different.  They are in too much of a hurry trying to get you out of there.

resp.text: We apologize that we failed to meet your expectations.  We strive for excellent service and appreciate your feedback so we can learn and improve.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you in the future.

name: Dodie Dunson
text: Hoover Vision Center has a tremendous staff and they truly care about the costumers!! The team is very professional and they make sure your services are met. I would highly recommend choosing to use their services!!

name: Seth Bennett
text: Friendly and helpful staff. Dr Samford is extremely professional and quite knowledgeable. Would recommend her to friends and family!

name: Dani C
text: Excellent service!

name: Sherri Cook
text: Found my new eye doctor!!!! Nice office, awesome staff, the doctor is great! So glad I found it!!!

name: debbie spinner
text: Wow! Loved this office and the caring support from everyone. Dr. Samford recommended progressive lenses which have eliminated my afternoon headaches. More importantly - how patient she was in offering feedback with each pair of frames I tried on!! There were so many to choose from. My husband is her next patient!

name: Stephanie Whitaker
text: We experienced excellent service at Hoover Vision Center.  Dr. Samford was extremely patient with my son who was having an eye exam for the first time.  He was nervous and anxious about everything and she was able to calm him down and make him feel comfortable.  I would highly recommend Hoover Vision Center.

name: Carolyn Nelson
text: A wonderful office where I have received quality care!  Dr. Samford is very professional, listens to my concerns, and gives sound advice.  I've been going to this practice for many years and have the utmost trust and confidence in her and the treatment I've received.  Their staff is very accommodating, the office is beautiful and they have a wide selection of the latest styles of eyewear and sunglasses.  Conveniently located in Hoover near the Galleria.  I highly recommend this practice!

name: Lauren Kozar
text: Great care from an amazing staff! They go above and beyond!! Would highly recommend this facility to anyone

name: Kyra Moseley
text: Dr. Samford was wonderful! I didn’t wait long at all. She was very thorough and very kind. I will be back!

name: Jerry Mcdonald
text: A wonderful job, as usual. Thank you for taking care of me.

name: Mike Litz
text: Hoover Vision Center has the best Eye Doctors!  They spend a lot of time with the patient to make sure that your  glasses, or contacts are the best fit for you!
