text: The customer service there is the best! They actually care about you.

name: Ralph Procter
text: On time. efficient and very friendly and kind. Definitely recommend

name: Kari Bartlett
text: The staff is friendly and Dr. Samford is professional, knowledgeable, and friendly.  I highly recommend using them for your vision care!

name: Megan Pierson
text: Called for my niece, got us in same day, very great place and nice staff!!

name: Joel Garcia
text: Great service, very professional!!  Highly recommend!!  Thanks

name: Katherine Smith
text: I have been going to Hoover Vision Center for years and it is always a great experience.  Staff is courteous, appointments are done in a timely manner and Dr. Samford is always informative.  I highly suggest you try them out if you haven't before.

name: Merry Michael Smith
text: Hoover Vision Center offers everything that you need in terms of great eye care. Friendly staff, fast service, stylish (and current) selection of glasses and extremely knowledgeable physicians. Dr. Samford is great and I would highly recommend Hoover Vision Center to anyone!

name: Janis E.
text: A friend told me about Hoover Vision Center and highly recommended Dr. Samford. I was able to make an appointment that week and was thoroughly impressed with the entire experience from start to finish. Everyone was kind and helpful and Dr. Samford was fantastic. I definitely recommend Hoover Vision to anyone for basic needs as well as for issues like infections, etc.

name: Steve Brannum
text: I have been a patient for years of Dr. Marbourg!!! She is awesome. My vision has never been better since using her practice.

name: Champagne South
text: I have been going here for over 10 years, I love Dr.Samford and her collection of glasses. It’s like we are friends, she knows all about me and is always concerned!

name: Chad Eads
text: Dr. Samford is great and always takes enough time to do a thorough exam and catch up from the last visit.

name: Wes Cline
text: Dr Marbourg was very thorough and delightful. Best exam experience ever.

name: Keith Ellard
text: Very friendly office, knowledgeable and helpful...runs on time, as well.  Conveniently located.Definitely recommend!

name: Kevin Finnen
text: My first visit, along with my 5 year old, and they did a great job.  They assisted us with selections in glasses and contacts.

name: Matt Brewer
text: Dr. Samford and the entire crew are excellent.  I'm confident that I received the best exams and treatments possible.  I've been a patient for many years and plan to continue!  Thanks Dr. Samford.

name: William Wallace
text: Hoover Vision Center was able to see me on the same day! Friendly staff!

name: Jamie Estes
text: On time service very helpful and courteous. They came highly recommended and deserved it.

name: Ray Poffenbarger
text: Great experience and everyone was very friendly and helpful

name: Mindy Tully
text: Great staff! Would recommend to anyone

name: The Pink Sheep
text: The staff were wonderful, helpful and everything I could have asked for in a vision center! They helped me to get the best prices and helped me to understand how my insurance worked to save me the most money! Thanks for a great experience Dr. Samford and her staff, I look forward to continuing to see them for my vision needs!

name: Michelle Grant
text: Very helpful and easy to get an appointment .  Staff was very friendly.

name: Brad Gannon
text: The staff and doctors at HVC are always top notch, we never have to wait more than a few minutes, and they have great prices on our contacts and eyeglasses.  A+ experience every time!

name: Kustom Jeff Dailey
text: I have been treated by both Drs here and i recommend them highly. They care about their patients.

name: Donna English
text:
Always listens, my vision has been corrected to the highest level possible.
Staff and Dr are always amazing!

name: Melinda Cash
text: The staff here are really nice. I would recommend them to everyone I know and more.

name: Mark Crain, CPA
text: Dr. Samford and her staff do a great job. I have continued to get my annual exam there for 8-9 years and will continue to do so.

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that you were upset with the wait time at our office. Having been a long time patient, we hope that you have come to know that this is not the norm in our office. Typically, we ask that our patients allow at least one hour for their complete eye examination, that being said, sometimes exam/wait times may be a little shorter or longer on any given day. As a small practice, we pride ourselves on spending extra time with each patient to give a thorough eye examination, go over diagnoses and answer any questions.  Looking back on the schedule on the particular day that you were here, we did have a staff member out sick and that is likely why we were running a little behind that day.  Again, we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you.  Please feel free to call us if you need anything!

name: Terri Nava
text: Great staff, great Dr's and great service!

name: Cary Hardy
text: Great experience. Small wait of 30 minutes, but worth it.

name: Ethan Crowe
text: Excellent.  Dr. Samford is very thorough.

name: Brooke M
text: The best!!! Sweetest people!!

name: Cobbie Llewellyn
text: Hoover vision is always on time, kind, and professional especially dealing with my three kids!

name: marianela rincon
text: Great service, great collection !

name: Jada Baker
text: She’s a great doctor!

name: Jefferson Hart
text: Wonderful staff and doctors.

name: Jeannie Morton
text: Super kind and thorough doctor!!

name: Charity Sandretto
text: Wonderful service!

name: Rodney Yawn
text: Great Eye Care.

name: Andrea Horton
text: Very friendly staff!

name: John Simmons
text: Excellent examination

name: sandy subramaniam
text: No wait just in and out

name: Chris Hatch
text: Working with Dr. Kye Mansfield and her staff is always a delight! She and her staff are quick to put you at ease, and eye exams are very thorough and comprehensive.  I felt both a part of the family and that my individual vision needs were the main focus with Dr. Kye and her team.  And when it comes to frames,  Connie will go the extra steps to ensure your complete satisfaction!  Please give these folks a try before the stuffy big box stores, you won't regret it!

name: Donna Walters
text: It was really good when Dr, Meyers was there’s. I have special problems with my eyes. Then I go for my visit and I have 2 assistant do my eye exam and tell me I’m fine!  That was my last visit, they haven’t called to see why I haven’t been back. REALLY!!!

name: Joe L Gerald
text: Excellent friendly service.  My visits have never disappointed me.

name: Patricia Byrd
text: Very helpful staff. I needed a new pair of glasses. They helped me pick out frames that were exactly what I was looking for and very reasonable priced.

name: john owens
text: I have been seeing Dr Mansfield for 10+ years. Best accurate eye exams. Very kind , patient and actually listens to you. That’s a lot considering I’m a very difficult patient. I trust her to treat my daughter and highly recommend her to my friends.

name: Meredith Williams
text: I used Dr Kia Mansfield for years. She has a great personality and wonderful with patients.

name: Gene Garza
text: I just had my first visit to this office, though I followed Dr Mansfield from a previous practice. Everything here was great. The staff is all professional and friendly. Dr. Mansfield treats me like an old friend though I've only seen her a few times. Everyone there was wonderful. Nice office. Short wait. Highly recommended!

name: Conny Pasquini
text: Dr. Mansfield is excellent both professional and personable.  I've been going to this office for years.   She is a wonderful addition!

name: Martha Chastain-Womble
text: My 10 year old daughter has been a patient of Dr. Rena Lewis at Dr. Mansfield's for almost six years now and we love them!  Dr. Mansfield and all the staff are so welcoming and helpful.  Dr. Lewis is a pro at working with children, she has actually helped my daughter's vision improve.  She has a very strong prescription, but now has 20/20 vision with glasses on.  We are so happy with Dr. Mansfield & her team.  Definitely recommend them!  And on a side note, I also feel very comfortable visiting their offices because of all the precautions they are taking to prevent any COVID-19 infections.

name: Steve Smith
text: Dr. Meyer and her staff are absolutely wonderful to work with. They are so thoughtful and caring and make you feel so special. Never rushed and always trying to answer all your questions.  Such a blessing

name: Staci Hayes Machado
text: Fantastic staff. Friendly service. And, Dr. Mansfield is the BEST!! She truly listens and understands to patients! I would follow her anywhere!

name: Scott Lamoreaux
text: My wife and 4 kids (1 with severe optical issues) have been treated here for the last 12 year's. I recently broke down and got an exam at 48 and just selected some cool new glasses for distance vision issue. Great team, fast and friendly service amd no pressure atmosphere.

name: Buffie Holt
text:
I have seen Dr. Meyer since she opened. My daughter just saw Dr. Mansfield and we both loved her! She’s great, she explained everything perfectly and also made my daughter comfortable since it was her first eye exam.
We got glasses and staff was very knowledgeable & friendly, it was a great experience all around.

name: Jen Riha
text: Dr. Key Mansfield was delightful and the entire staff a breath of fresh air. My exam was easy and with their help, ordered my new glasses!!

name: Josh Cain
text: Dr. Rena Lewis is extremely nice and very kid friendly! She puts you at ease and answers all your concerns before you even ask a question. We drive about an hour to see her because her and her staff have definitely earned our loyalty and business!

name: Matthew Collier
text: Dr. Meyer and her staff have always been a pleasure to deal with. Some time ago, I sustained an eye injury and was referred to Dr. Meyer's practice. They are very knowledgeable, kind and professional. They were there during my recovery and have gained a patient for life. I cannot say enough good things about these folks. They add a personal touch to their services and I would recommend them to anyone. Thanks for all you and your staff do. Keep up the great work!!

name: Veronique Zimmerman-Brown
text: Wonderful experience from beginning to end!!!  Dr. Meyer and her staff take great care with their patients.  I have been with her for years and am not going anywhere.  I highly recommend her.

name: Christi Hamlin
text: We followed Dr. Mansfield from Alabaster to her new practice in Pelham. She's a fantastic Dr. for the whole family. I'm super happy she moved locally and I didn't have to follow her to 280!

name: Steve Nieves
text: Very pleased.Everyone was extremely polite and professional.Was great seeing Dr Meyer again and looking forward to seeing Dr Mansfield

name: Kathy Kurtts
text: They are always very attentive to patient needs. Great attitudes from everyone from front desk to doctor. I wouldn’t go anywhere else for my eyes. They have consistently corrected my vision better than anyone to date.

name: Larry Belcher
text: This was my first visit to see Dr. Meyer, and I was very glad my wife talked me into going.  The staff is very friendly and helpful and Dr. Meyer was great.   She took a lot of time to examine my eyes and was very nice and caring.  I am very happy to have her as my new eye doctor if she will see me again.      Thanks Dr. Meyer and staff

name: Stephanie Mitchell
text: Dr. Mansfield was very personable and professional. My family will come back and I will highly recommend her business.

name: Chris Coats
text: Have been going here for last 4-5 years after readers were not getting the job done. Always a good experience with quality and attentive staff. Saw Dr Mansfield for the first time this week and she is a very qualified and caring doctor.

name: Blackwell Malone
text: My experience with Dr. Meyer and her entire staff has been excellent. Minimal wait time at all stages of the visit. Staff is courteous, knowledgeable, and focused. Dr. Meyer has a great "bedside manner listens very carefully to the patients input about the issue at hand, takes time to explain her diagnosis in words that we all can understand, but does not waste time. My family is blessed to have her take care of our sight issues.

name: Felix Hester
text: Great staff and doctors. They do a great job and have a pleasant office.  have been Dr. Meyers' patient for years and have zero complaints. Great place and very convenient location!

name: Randall Martin, Jr.
text:
I may have left a previous review about how great Dr. Meyer is, because she is great.
However, over the past few weeks, the receptionist has become very rude, and bothered by calling.

Normally, I’m not one to leave a bad review, but when I’m calling to try and make a purchase, a return call would be nice. 24-48 hours I understand, but 7 days and the response is, “I am sorry sir, let me get your information and they’ll call you back. They’re very busy” is unacceptable. Too busy for existing customers, I’ll go to Pelham Eye Care or someone else close by.

name: Valerie Crowe
text: This office is wonderful! They make sure to take care of their patients in a timely manner. I have been going here for over 5 years and have always had such a wonderful experience. Will always continue to come here!

name: Dennis Blankenship
text:
Dr. Myers and staff were wonderful.  Very professional and caring.
Would love to see more options price wise in getting new frames.

name: Melissa Bell
text: We have been using Dr Meyer’s office for over twenty years and wouldn’t think of going elsewhere even though we have now moved over an hour away. Everyone there is super friendly, we are always able to get an appointment in a timely manner, and they are even open on Saturday mornings.

name: John Conrady
text: We followed Kye Mansfield here from Vision First where she was our Dr. for many years. Excellent doctor.  So glad we didn't lose her.

name: Nicole Stephens
text: I took my daughter there recently to have her vision checked and I was very impressed with the staff.  All of them were super nice and very kid friendly.  Dr. Lewis did an amazing job examining my daughter.  I would highly recommend this place.

name: Robin
text:
I thoroughly enjoy my 1st experience at Dr. Jill K. Meyers office. The staff was friendly and very helpful from the time I walked in, until I departed. Everyone there spoke & smiled at me; even when they did not assist me.  That's Awesome and rare in companies this day and time. I will continue to support Dr. Meyers and her staff for all my eyecare needs. Keep up the good work!!!

Robin

name: Jennifer Pickering
text: I am a long time patient and have referred many people here. Everyone here is always so friendly and knowledgeable. They take great care of me and my eyes!

name: Bradley Jones
text: I've been going here for a few years and no matter which doctor you see they are always pleasant and easy to work with!

name: Carolyn Jones
text: The entire staff is AMAZING. Their attention and care provided to every patient is extraordinary and you truly feel like a family member after the first visit. I would highly recommend Dr. Jill Meyer!

name: Dalton Gillilan
text: I love that it is a kid friendly facility. The whole process was smooth and ordering my contacts afterward was very easy. The staff was very helpful as well.

name: Rosalyn Posley
text: Wonderful experience I came on my lunch break and she got me in and out and resolved my issue!!

name: Jeff Thrower
text: The individual who answered the phone was not very helpful. I’ve been going here for over 16 years.  Doctor Meyer has always been helpful and her assistants as well.

name: Paul O'Dell
text: This day and time, it is hard to find a organization that understand the premise that people buy from people. Jill Meyer OD PC gets it and obviously hires staff and trains them to this end. EVERYONE there makes you feel important, appreciated and they respect your needs. I have been a customer for two years and I highly recommend their services. Great people to know and have care for your vision.

name: Rhonda Masters
text: Dr. Jill Meyer is awesome, very thorough and personable.   She took the time to listen to all my vision concerns and was will to keep trying different contact solutions until we found the one that was most comfortable for me to wear.  I will definitely return for my next exam.

name: Ritcha Garrett, HHC
text: Great staff, very thorough and Dr Mansfield is sweet and very attentive. Great all around atmosphere!

name: Christi Hester
text: My daughter and I both had our eyes checked.  The staff is always friendly and helpful.  Dr. Setzer and his assistants were very thorough in their examinations and they are always friendly.

name: Jack Thomas
text:
Dr. Lewis has been my Optometrist for over 10 years now, and despite the fact that she has been predominantly pediatric, they still make me feel welcome. This was my first visit to her new office, and I absolutely loved my experience. Everyone was friendly, and very helpful. I have never had an optician help me out as much as the man that helped me did, I apologize for not remembering his name.
Susan was the woman who dialiated my eyes, and she was beyond friendly, and even went the extra mile while I was there to teach me many things about which medications they use for what, and many other things that I had no clue about.

And last but not least, Dr. R. Lewis herself, was amazing. She really does care about every single one of her patients. She is also very knowledgeable about everything and anything involved in her field. I have yet to this day asked a question that she could not answer right then and there.
As long as they are willing to take this mid 20's patient at their pediatric office, I will continue to use Dr. Lewis as my Optometrist.

name: Darin Findling
text: Dr. Meyer and her staff were outstanding with my 8 and 5 year olds. They were very patient and made sure they did thorough examinations.  I highly recommend Dr. Meyer and her outstanding staff. I plan to move my entire family over to her clinic. Thank you!

name: Sheronda Perry
text: Thank you all for ALWAYS providing the BEST service each time I come in. You all are awesome, which starts at the front door, and ending with shopping for eye care at the office ! Thanks again Dr Kye Mansfield and TEAM for meeting all my needs in a professional,loving and caring atmosphere!

name: Brittany Sullivan
text: I've been going to this optometry group for almost 10 years and have never had a bad experience. Most recently, I saw Dr. Setzer who is highly knowledgeable and personable. The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful. I've never felt pressured or manipulated to buy new frames or contacts and they're always happy to give me samples. Highly recommended!

name: Jennifer Baker
text: Dr. Lewis and all the staff were wonderful with my son. Thank you for the care and comfort you provided.

name: Laura Dyson
text:
Dr. Lewis is AWESOME and we have been seeing her for years! Ever since my daughter was 6 months old, Dr. Lewis has given her the best care possible and is always kind and patient!

However, we were not pleased with Connie (the Optician). She was rude and did not seem to want to take the time to discuss new glasses for my daughter just because I am an Optician myself. She made me feel very uncomfortable.

name: libby zanthos
text: Went in for annual review and were most helpful. Had a few issues with upcoming treatment and they went above all to help resolve it.

name: Susan Collins
text:
I've been going to Dr. Meyer for about 25 yrs. and first had contacts.  I found that she could fit my contacts better than anyone else I had been to in B'ham.  I have developed a few problems with my eyes over the years and she takes plenty of time with me and explains what is happening and what I need to do.  The staff is friendly and has always taken care of the insurance for me and told me what I would have to pay after all the insurance money comes in.
I would recommend her to anyone.

name: Bob Wesson
text: I was very pleased with my experience. The staff was very helpful and friendly. Dr Meyer took her time and gave me literature on my eye problem. I would recommend Dr. Meyer to my friends.

name: Andy Pohl
text: The doctors and staff here are always so friendly, professional, and thorough. I never feel like I am being rushed through an appointment. This year they were especially helpful when my daughter fell and broke her glasses.

name: Caroline Dempsey
text: We saw Dr Lewis. My 8 year-old gets very anxious at doctor's offices. She screamed when dilation drops were put in. However, Dr Lewis put her right at ease. It's obvious Dr Lewis treats kids; she knows how to work with  even the toughest little patient. Office was clean, well organized. We were in & out fairly quickly.

name: Alexander Burrus
text: My wife Nonna and I visited on December 9. She worked with Ty whose customer service is outstanding. Blaine is very thorough and patient. We are looking forward to getting our new glasses!

name: Stacy Godfrey
text: I am fortunate to be a patient of the practice for about 20yrs.  Dr Meyer is knowledgeable, professional and genuinely cares about her patients. When I was diagnosed with MS  Dr Meyer was extremely knowledgeable of the effects it can have on my vision and was there for me during my bouts with optic neuritis. Dr  Meyer explains things in layman’s terms and makes sure to answer your questions thoroughly. All of the staff at Dr Meyer’s practice is friendly, knowledgeable and extremely helpful. At the age of 3 my daughter was diagnosed with Amplyopia and was fitted for glasses. Dr Meyer and staff made the experience a positive. My daughter still has her little glasses and cas.  My daughter is now 22 and only needs glasses for reading. We look forward to being patients for many years.

name: James Sapp
text: Great place to visit. Staff is very helpful and knowledgeable They get you in and out.🙂

name: Rish Wood
text:
Dr Meyer & Team were great as always! I have been a patient for over 6 years and each visit reminds me why I chose her practice for my eyecare.
My wife and I highly recommend Dr Meyer!

name: John Jones
text: The staff at Dr Meyer’s office is courteous and professional. Our family is very happy that our eyes are well taken care of.

name: Julius Willard
text: I am writing this review because of the treatment that I received by "Connie" the Optometrist assistant who took  me for granted that I could not discern the problem that I had with my glasses which were "Lindberg" at a cost of a 1000 a pair, instead we got into a shouting match over the sight and design. I was then transferred over to "TY" whom immediately stepped in answer my concerns and addressed my objections. In my opinion which matters because of the amount on monies I spent at a total cost of 2000, with exception to Dr. "Mansfield and her Assistant  whereby they corrected my vision and put me on the road of recovery. In the end it took almost 8 weeks for my glasses to get, and on the day of picking them up Dr. Meyer could not have been more ingratiating than by acknowledging me as if I was some pauper on the street. As a minority and a man, I would never do any more business with this organization when my commitment is finalize.

name: Jackie Menjivar
text: My whole family comes here, the staff are always  friendly and polite from the receptionist to the doctors , Doctor Lewis is always very patient with my daughter ! Place is clean ! The wait time is always reasonable . I would definitely recommend them , especially if you are looking for a pediatric ophthalmology.

name: Tony Blaylock
text: They worked me in for an emergency having never been there. Excellent care given, Very friendly staff and amazing Dr!

name: Veronica Cottingham
text: Here at Dr.Meyer office they are very friendly and a blessing to have to take care of your eyes. And Tye that fit your glasses she wonderful.

name: Mitchel Gibbs
text: Been going for years.  Have been well taken care of by everyone.

name: Peggy Hazelrig
text: Always Love coming to the office. The staff is friendly and very helpful. I saw Dr. Setzer this time and he was very friendly and thorough with exam.

name: Aileen Cain
text: We’ve been patients of Dr. Mansfield for years, followed her to the new practice. Love the office staff already - so helpful!

name: Cindy Jones
text: Wonderful, friendly, helpful, and attentive staff, and of course Dr. Meyer is extremely knowledgeable and gives a thorough exam. I will definitely be using Dr. Meyer for my eye care needs in the future.

name: Margaret Pickett
text: As a patient with many eye issues, I need to be able to speak with a person and get an appointment quickly. My last eye doctor's office could never seem to return my calls, and I always felt rushed.  With Dr. Setzer and his staff at Jill K. Meyer's office, I was able to get in quickly, and I was given a thorough exam.  Everyone was knowledgeable, professional, and helpful. I am very pleased with the visit, and I appreciate everything the staff and Dr. Setzer did to help me feel at ease.

name: Elmer Brant
text:
Very professional & courteous experience.
They make you feel like a part of the family; such a rare occasion these days.

name: Pam McDonald
text: I’ve been going to Dr. Myers’s practice for several years and am very happy with the service I receive.

name: Ben Smallwood
text: Had a potential situation worked me in within right a way , very professional,  I recommend them and I will use them from now on.

name: CE Outdoors LLC
text: Dr. Lewis made my child feel very comfortable for his first visit. She was so kind and explained things very well.

name: Gabi Erickson
text: I can absolutely NOT recommend Dr.Meyer,but her Staff is very professional and super nice!

name: Anissa Copes
text: Staff is very thorough, knowledgeable and fun loving!

name: Dena
text: Awesome with my 5 year old and was great when she was 2 ..She has so much patience and knows ways to make the kids feel comfortable !! Highly recommend!

name: Mary Ngigi
text: Dr. Lewis is awesome ! my 5 year old daughter loves her. She can't wait for her next appointment.

name: bill christenberry
text:
It was quite pleasant as always.  Girls up front always call me by name and are  very accommodating.  I always feel pampered and special when I am there.  Amy Katherine is my bud.  Caroline is a good new addition. Litasha is always sweet. Dr. Meyer is very thorough. Lou was not there but made my appointment and is sweet and helpful.  Connie makes me feel like royalty.
My only suggestion I can blame on me as much as ya'll but I waited an extra 40 minutes to get my glasses adjusted and I wish I would have(or ya'll could ask at check in)asked to get my glasses adjusted during my appointment and then they would have been ready when my appointment was finished.  Keep up the good work.

name: Corie Clark
text: She was great with my 5 y/o son.

name: Chris and Laura Ducote
text: Everyone was very friendly and helpful! I'm seeing better than before!

name: Paul Shipley
text: Pleasant people to work with and will spend time explaining your condition and treatment.

name: nancy foreman
text: I love Dr Jill and all of her staff. Very thorough and professional.

name: Linda Hines
text:
Minimal wait time, process was efficient and Dr Meyer was very nice and
thorough.

name: W Price
text: Great service, always professional, never have waited too long for an appointment, friendly staff.

name: Scott Mitchell
text: Great eye care and wonderful customer service!

name: Alan Cannon
text: Everyone is very friendly and helpful, while still being professional.

name: Shaye Billingsley
text: We love Dr. Mansfield

name: Keturah Swindle
text: Very nice staff and Dr. Rena Lewis is excellent!!

name: Jessi Bell
text: My four year old was disgnosed with amblyopia and was prescribed glasses for the nect six months to help correct the problem. we loved the staff they were great with my son who was a little apprehensive about the visit. he was fitted with glasses and when we picked them up noticed that they seemed a little too tight in spots and i expressed my concern., the gentleman helping us seemed rushed and maybe inexperienced with children's eyewear. Two weeks went by and my son would complain that they hurt his nose and ears so I stopped in to walmart eyecare center one day when we were shopping and come to find out they had measured him wrong at Meyer, he was fitted for too small of a frame.  I returned to Dr. Meyer's office and they confirmed that he was indeed in too narrow of a frame and reordered him some new glasses and once they came in he was fitted as well as possible.  the technician suggested picking a different frame all together because that frame did not support his facial structure as he has a very flat bridge of his nose. My children are on medicaid and although i understand that only a certain amount of frames are offered to medicaid patients, I would have been more than willing to make a payment plan for the difference if it meant he would be more comfortable in his glasses as these are crucial to his correction of amblyopia if it is going to get better, he HAS got to be comfortable in his glasses so that he will want to wear them. the tech who fitted the new glasses (same frame) noticed that they dont fit his nose well and that they push out on his ears(which would be who he was complaining of sore ears.  It has been over a month and he wears them more regulary but its a struggle everyday putting them on because he simply does not like them. In my opinion as his mother I believe he would be much more comfortable with a frame that truly fits his face that he actually likes and thinks they are cool. I would love to be able to have him re-measured and re-fitted for some more appropriate corrective eyewear.  he is, after all, four years old and that in itself is a challenge with glasses.  we were never offered a band to go arounf the bacl of his head to potentially help hold them in place beter.  I freel like this office is not extremely equipped with frames for little ones and are geared more to high end adult frames.  I've had two different opinions from optometrists that suggested a differnt frame all together, maysome something not metal and instead colored resin so that he would be more excited about them looking "cool" instead of just a plain metal frame. both times weve been into the office he is drawn towards the colorful frames and not the metal frames, and I have noticed that these seem quite flimsy and I worry that due to the nose piece and ears not fitting right they may fall off and break while he's participating in everyday four year old activities such as bike riding, skooter riding, and the occsional basketball with his older brother.  If someone could read my feedback and help rectify this problem i would greatly appreciate it, i feel as though the amblyopia is not having a chance to heal in that eye due to the fact they slide down his nose and hes able to see over them, and does NOT like them at all. Thank you for all you do, the staff was spectacular with children I must say, however, maybe the technicians fitting children with the frames need to have a little more continuing education on adolescent frames, proper fits, and have a more enthusiatic approach when helping a child decide which frames are right for him/her. the technician we worked with fitting him picked the frames for him although they were no where remotely close to the ones he loved. thank you for your time, and again I cannot say enough about the technician who assisted with his exam she was nothing short of amazing and the front desk staff is always so courteous and friendly.  thank you again.

name: Painy (Painy)
text: I was provided great professional services.

name: sabbott406
text: Had eye exam yesterday. Great staff, great doc, great selection of frames.

name: Lena Walker
text: Everyone was so nice and helpful. I've found my Optometrist!

name: Stephanie Henley
text: Great for pediatric care

name: Mary Jo Barbin
text: Courteous, professional and no waiting.

name: T. Paster
text: Dr. Lewis was awesome!

name: nikoal clark
text: Staff is extremely rude. Billing dept is very unhelpful. During our conversation was hung up on. Then was refused to be helped. Will NOT be returning to this clinic for service!

name: The Ray
text: Not good! Rude staff and prescription was not correct per a second opinion.

name: annie lynch
text: Wonderful!!! We love Dr. Lewis!!!

name: Llew T
text: Professional, friendly and competent!

name: Tom Ventress
text: Dr Meyer and staff were very professional and friendly.  They were very patient with me trying to put in contacts!

name: Katie Grizzard
text: I would so give 5 stars Dr. Nisslon( probably spelled wrong) is amazing. However the lady at the front who does insurance and works the front desk at times is extremely rude. She asked for my copay and I said the amount wasn't correct could she please recheck it she slammed the door to the insurance office and got very rude because I asked her to do that. Come to find out I was correct about my copay and she made a snide remark about it being a one in a million chance. Then when I came back the next week she did the same thing with my son who has the same insurance as I do once again I was correct after being rude and told I was way too early for my appoint which was at 9:45 and I arrived at 9:36. If it wasn't for the dr I would definitely leave because the front needs some major customer service work.

name: Wendy Hall
text: Loved coming here for my first ever exam. Very informative, made me feel at ease, and they were supportive of me bringing in my little heathens.

name: Shannon Turner
text: I called this place and the female that answered hung up on me.  You can bet if they are too busy that I’ll spend my money elsewhere. 👎

name: Nina Webb
text: Called to attempt and schedule two patient appointments was advised they had never heard only the Ins and I needed to call the Insurance. I was cut off every time I tried to speak and was info by MIKE they wouldn’t be calling right now once I asked as a provider if they would call and speak to INS since as a patient I had already done so and was advised we could choose anywhere.

name: Yaya Mccann
text: While the selection does sometimes leave a little something to be desired, the operations are on point. This group of individuals have worked together and so close knit, that they are a well oiled machine. And mr man who does the initial part of the exam is a breath of fresh air. If he has ever had a bad day, he certainly doesnt show it at work. My kids love him.

name: Brianna Yates
text: Enjoyed my experience here. They took very good care of me when I needed glasses.

name: Moe Rau
text: I've had a great experience with this business. They got me in and out pretty quickly, and had my glasses ready within a short period. Great atmosphere, and staff. Also, very helpful and knowledgeable about their craft  I can't thank them enough.

name: Megan Ashcraft
text: The people at The Optical Shop are very friendly and very helpful! They even dug through many boxes to help me find the right pair of glasses even though I didn't pick any of the one we looked at! All around great place!

name: dave marshall
text: I popped into this place for the very first time after I broke my frames. I was greeted just like I was family right when I walked in the door and the whole  staff was very friendly and talkative. Sterling found a pair of frames that matched my lenses and got me back up and running quickly.

name: Mike From The Zone
text: In my experience of the optical shop they were really nice and helped me as much as they could and I never had any problems

name: Jerry Whitaker II
text: When i came in for my appointment The Optical Shop was very respectful and greeted me like I was family. There services for all you EYE exam, frames, covers, lens, needs is astounding and should be everyones One Stop No Hassle Free. Thanks The Optical Shop ' you are the BEST!!!

name: Ashaley Harps
text: amazing staff more like family ! Takes good care of you. Wont regret any visits !

name: Tracy Henderson
text: This was the first eye exam my daughter has gone to alone as she is attending college. The person that I spoke to when booking the appointment needed much better phone skills and ultimately took down inaccurate information. The optimologist was rude and short with her at the visit and did nothing to explain her vision problems and how he was treating her. She left with a perscription weaker than her current one with information that conflicted what he told her during the exam. We are now paying out of pocket for her to see another Dr.

name: Pamila Rodriguez
text: When I made my appointment they told us they were going to be taking people on a first come first serve basis, that they would start seeing patients at 6:30 in the evening now. So I got here at 6 o'clock to be kind early because I didn't have a lot of time to waste.  When I saw how they were doing it I went to the reception desk and told them that I did not have two hours to be here. They assured me it would be about 20 minutes because there was only four people ahead of us. It is now been more than two hours and I'm still waiting. People that came in and filled out paperwork after us have already done been seen and left.  I've been coming here six years  such a horrible experience. If they don't get this fixed I won't be coming back

name: Kabrina Nickell
text: Horrible customer service. The lady who works the front desk is very unpleasant, and not a friendly person. It took 2 hours to be seen she stated that everyone came the day she made my appointment on. When I picked up my children's glasses very rude again and did not even fit the children's glasses and when I asked for a case she said you do not get a case. Who gives a 9 year old autistic child glasses without a case. Never will I do business there again.

name: William Creech
text: I bought a new set of eyeglasses, frames and lenses.  The lenses kept falling out and they kept "fixing" them.  But they continued to fall out.   Finally the last time I returned them they said they would get send them back to where they were made so they could remake them properly.  After a month and not receiving a call from them, I went to their store.  They couldn't tell me anything but that they would call me with the status.  After a week of not receiving a call from them, I called their store.  The only thing they would tell me was they would call me when the come in.  I have been wearing glasses for 54 years and I have never had such poor service and strongly recommend you do not use the Optical Shop.  They have terrible service and just don't give a damn.

name: jeillanpa
text: Best people ever 🙌🏼 Wouldn't go anywhere else!!!!

name: Sherry Stender
text:
I took my son into the Optical shop at 2011 US Hwy 280, Phenix city AL 36867 on 8/1/2016 for a scheduled eye exam. I was using Medicaid to cover the cost of the exam. They checked his eyes and told me that he needs glasses full-time. He was very upset with the news, but we picked out some frames anyway. The selection of Medicaid covered glasses was terrible and cheap looking, so I paid out of pocket for the frames we picked in the amount of $211.00.
I received a call that his glasses were ready for pickup on 8/5/2016. I took him in to get them fitted to his face and out of curiosity and clarity I asked Dr. Michael Redus, that performed the eye exam, again if they were for full-time wear. He responded yes.
A day or two went by, my child wore glasses to the first day of school and I started to question if he could see better with the glasses. He said that he could tell no difference. I put the glasses to my eyes and could tell no difference from the way I normally see. I decided to go for a second opinion.
I took him to Walmart Vision Center on US Hwy 280 and paid for another $70 eye exam out of pocket. That doctor told me that my child did not only have no use for the glasses, but he had 20/20 vision. I have documentation of both visits. One from The Optical shop stating he was prescribed glasses and that it was .075 in each eye. The Walmart one states 20/20 vision with no prescription needed.
I went back to Optical Shop after my visit with the Dr. at Walmart and brought it to his attention. I was told that they were only for reading when before the Dr. said full-time wear. I told them how awful of them it was to prescribe glasses to a 7 year old child that they don’t even need. They refunded my money, but its sad to see a business lie just to make a buck.

name: Evelyn Dunn
text: Very pleasant

name: Warren Crow
text: It had been some time between visits to an optometrist and my more regular ophthalmologists. I found the three assistants and one optometrist to be empathetic to my situation which I think is rare. I was treated well and taken care of by all. I think the eye exam series was the most comprehensive I have ever had. Being in my 60s I had conversations which included discussions of multifocal contact lenses and cataracts plus premium IOL choices. I loved the visit and will continue with this group. I am lined up for a multifocal contact lens fitting (why can't I be without glasses) and know I need an eyeglass pair with new prescription to back up contact lens use.

name: ST FU
text: My (now former) eye doctor requested unnecessary tests. It took months and several unreturned messages to get someone to answer my questions. The office staff and manager were not helpful and lacked urgency in returning my calls. When my call was finally returned the manager was not helpful nor cheerful. They did not care to listen to me as a patient and because of all these issues I do not recommend.

resp.text: Hello, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about these tests and the difficulty you had reaching us, as well as the treatment by our staff -- this is definitely not the experience we want for our patients! I'd like to learn more about what happened. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: lexi ivan
text: I was sent back within 10 minutes of my appointment time. The assistant was very efficient with the preliminary testing. Dr. Hines was very kind and informative. When I told her I wanted monthly contacts instead of dailies, she understood and didn't try to force dailies on me like many doctors. The rep in the frames room went above and beyond to help me pick out frames I was happy with. My first pair came two days after my appointment, and my second pair will be in within 2 weeks. I was very happy with my visit!

name: Erika McDonald
text: Everyone who works here is wonderful but Dr. Schwertz is really above and beyond fabulous! She listens and takes her time to address all concerns you may have and she truly advocates for her patients and what is in their best interest. She provides wonderful care and I highly recommend her.

name: Cindy Bynum
text: I highly recommend these guys! They are so great, efficient, and friendly. I see Dr. White, and she's phenomenal. She ensures to carefully explain everything and address any and every issue I have. You can tell they take great pride in their work and are very thorough. 5+ stars for these guys.

name: Jody Wilson
text: I experienced a long wait time when I went in last week. The Doctor is great. I think if your appointment is at 9:20, you should be seen within 20 minutes. I will admit the I am impatient. All of my other appointments at other establishments see me within 5 minutes.  What’s the point in having a appointment, if you can’t be seen around that time.

name: Jameisha Large
text: Excellent staff and service. I loved the atmosphere it was pleasant and welcoming. I really liked Dr. White he made me feel valued and my exam was informative and comfortable. I did not meet one rude person and neither was I left unattended when I was shopping for eyewear. So heck yeah I will be referring people to this location. Five Stars is what you deserve!

name: Lem Motlow
text: Will be changing offices due to the very poor time management and lack of respect for patients time. Every year i have been going for the past four i have had to wait for at least an hour for Dr. Hines. she is very good and pleasant , however either her or the office scheduling is not good. this is not a COVID issue. this has been each year. I work less than 1/4 mile from this location and with at least 4 other office co workers who use her and  like her but not her time management and lack of respect for patients time as many of us come on our lunch break. i understand emergency come up and may have to wait longer than usual due to unseen circumstances once in awhile but when its every year and joked about at office with co workers who use location office and Dr. then it is not us its YOU

resp.text: Lem, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about the delays you've experienced visiting our office. I'd like to look into why this is happening -- could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Larry Futrell
text: Staff very friendly and professional. Dr. Hang is friendly, professional and very thorough with her exams. I always look forward to my appointments because the atmosphere there is delightful and very amiable!

name: Forrest Plummer
text: My first visit to the Hoover location. I was more than impressed with the professionalism by each associate from the front counter all the way around. Kara took care of all the preliminary tests and was beneficial in making me comfortable as I felt I was bombing several eye tests. Dr. Amos was very helpful explaining everything as she went along. I am looking forward to many years to come.

name: April Taylor
text: The entire staff was amazing when we had our first visit there a couple of weeks ago. My daughter and I were made very comfortable and the exam was very thorough. Dr. Hang is wonderful and easy to talk to. We will be coming back here and also bringing the hubby and my other daughter!

name: Fredia Dillard
text: Great place! Love Dr. Amos. I've been with her for 10 years now. She understands my issues and truly listens. She does not rush through an exam and will offer options.

name: Dawn Kirkland
text: Rob Pate and his staff are wonderful.  I always feel like they are so glad to see me and I have a deep level of confidence in the care I am receiving.  I have recommended Dr. Pate to everyone I have talked to who needs a great eye doctor--in fact, my husband is there this morning!

name: Teala McDowell
text: I had a wonderful experience at EyeCare Associates in Hoover! Dr. Amos definitely ranks at the top of the list not only for her physician skills, but also for her amazing care and concern for her patients, personally. I have been recommending her to all of my Alabama friends! If you are reading this review as you look for someone to take wonderful care of your eye needs, look no more...you found her!

name: Michelle Riley
text: From the time you enter the front door until you leave, you will experience excellent customer service. I recently move to Northern Alabama and I have no plans whatsoever to change eye doctors. I will gladly do the long drive.  They have modern equipment, clean and attractive office space and knowledgeable team members.  I'm sure all the doctors are great but I'm on Team Amos!

name: Derrick Mendez
text: As a patient of Dr. Hammond's for over 10 years, I continue recommend her to anyone I encounter who's in search of an eye care professional.  She is always willing to take the extra step to make sure her patients (which include several members of my family) are taken care of.

name: Marilyn Martin
text: I've been with Dr. Amos for about 38 years and always want her to check out my eyes.  She is very professional but also very friendly.  I recommend her to anyone who needs a wonderful eye doctor.

name: Suzanne Eberhardt
text: My children and I are all patients of Dr. Pate's. It has been a positive experience every time we have been to the office, even when we have walked in without an appointment to get my son's glasses fixed. I have also recommended him to several people and would not hesitate to do it again.

name: Latisha A
text: Today was my first visit and I was very impressed with the entire staff especially Dr. Pate.

name: S B
text: Apparently they changed owners and most of the staff has left.  Dr. Amos was fantastic  as usual but the 2 hour appointment, LONG wait, disorganization and terrible service from everybody else will have me looking elsewhere for my next checkup.

name: Brendolyn Terry
text: I miss dr.pate, but dr. Ansley is good too

name: Christian S
text: They miss represented the quality of the frames they sold me. The metal in the frames fatigued after 6 months and I had to replace them at full cost. This isn't why they get the 1 star. The 1 star is for the poor customer service. I will not return and do not recommend them for purchasing frames/Eyewear.

name: ChaLestar Hill
text: This office is absolutely AWFUL!!! Poor customer service and it takes so long to get your order back. I waited an entire month to hear from them and I have yet to pick up my glasses from them.

name: Kim Hood
text: I have been a patient of Dr. Meyers for almost 20 years. Unfortunately she has sold her practice to Dr. Mansfield and it has not been the same. I recently had an issue with my daughter having frequent headaches so I called to see if I could make an appointment to have her eyes rechecked as I thought her vision might have changed and she needed her glasses adjusted. When the office person called me back, she told me the doctor said if your daughter is having headaches you need to call her pediatrician. We can’t do anything for her. When I went to question and explain more about my daughter’s symptoms and how I felt like they were related to her eyesight the office person got very rude and short with me. I asked to leave a message for Dr. Mansfield to call me back. I still have not received a phone call from her. I called back and asked for Dr. Mansfield’s email address. I wrote her a personal email about the whole situation and still did not receive any type of reply. I called to get mine snd my daughter’s records transferred to a new eye doctor and was never asked if there was an issue or why I was transferring my records. As a health care provider myself, the doctor/patient relationship is very important to me and after you have been seeing a doctor as long as I had in this practice you would think it would be important to them as well. Obviously though by their lack of response I am just a number and not a patient who they truly care to help.

name: David Carpenter
text:
Wow!
I spent a number of years in the eyecare profession and it takes a lot to impress me.  But Dr. Shirey and his highly attentive staff have won my personal medal of excellence.
Beyond making a personal connection, they treated me with kindness and welcomed me into their "work family."
The exam and other tests were state-of-the-art.  The doctor took time to explain the outcome to me thoroughly.  He even recommended a new type of contact lens that I was amazed that is working very well for me.
The bottom line is you get what you pay for.  Although SVC's price structure seems to be in line with other places, the  personal attention and knowledge you will benefit from here are beyond comparison.

text: The nicest staff hands down and one of the most caring doctors I have been to. Highly recommend!

name: Shannon
text:
Positive: Doctor is very knowledgeable and I trusted him. Was very satisfied with the accuracy of the prescription and quality of the exam. Willing to answer questions.

Negative: This office is VERY uncooperative if you are wanting to order glasses online. The glasses that I got at the office were great but cost me $500. They did replace the lenses once because they were scratched. However, when I decided to order a pair of prescription sunglasses online (which I can get for just over $100) they made the process as difficult for me as possible. They seemed irritated with me for trying to get a better deal on glasses even though I was still coming to them for the exam. Then, they refused to give me my PD measurement with my prescription even though they had it on file and had taken the measurement for the first pair of glasses I ordered through them. Then, the woman I spoke with lied to me directly. She said that you have to have your PD measured each time you get glasses because it changes over time. False. I looked it up online and it is VERY rare that your PD will change once you are an adult who has gone through puberty. Very disappointed in their ability to function in modern times!

text: Today  is the last day that I go here. The two stars are strictly because the optometrist nice and very knowledgeable. It is very annoying. I have to constantly tell them that I do not want this added features if it not cover up my insurance provider. I contacted my insurance to ask about the fees that I was charged and they never even heard of them. It's almost has if they are making up fees for patients to pay out of pocket. Don't not go here unless your willing to pay at least $100 of out pocket even if they are you in-network provider.

However, several years ago Dr. Shirey was the doctor on duty. After experiencing his care I made the decision to go miles out of my way to Southern Vision Care. I have lived in New Jersey, Indiana, California, Georgia, and now Alabama. His office has the most modern equipment and the latest technology, and the absolute best staff I have ever experienced. As others have said, you will be doing your eyes and your spirits a favor by going to Southern Vision Care.

Nice doctor, but horrible staff. I decided to go to another eye doctor after the staff messing up my eye exam and then it taking multiple trips to get me in the right contacts. The staff was incredibly rude and short with me and was bad about not calling me back. I didn't like how pushy the tech was with me during my eye exam and angrily grabbing my eye-lid when I was having trouble keeping it open during the exam. I'm not a eye care specialist, but that felt very unprofessional grabbing somebody's eyelid in a dark room like that.

I've had glasses since second grade and contacts in high school and I never had this much trouble getting the right prescription or having staff treating me this rudely before. It just gave me a bad feeling about what would happen if I had an emergency and needed help. I just decided to take my business elsewhere.

name: Trey Bradley
text:
Today(06/2020): 1 Star
The staff, as always, were hospitable and polite. But, my opinion of Dr. Mark Shirey, who is also trying to run for public office - has changed.

Dr. Shirey was a savior to me when he helped me with a nearly debilitating ailment. I have photophobia - no I'm not scared of light. It's a diagnosis for high sensitivity to light. Bright light, and all Sun light, are very painful for me. Dr. Shirey gave me the prescription that helped me deal with this while driving, of which I can't describe how grateful I was for this. It was literally life changing.

But - during my last visit, Dr. Shirey told me that he "doesn't do that anymore". He doesn't recognize a diagnosis that's over 100 years old and recognized by all major medical institutions. His excuse was "ALDOT doesn't recognize it.", which is not true. Neither ALDOT or ALEA list any diagnosis that they do or don't recognize. The law in the state of Alabama is very clear in this regard.

When I got home, I did the research on this. I compiled the information and sent it to Dr. & Mrs. Shirey for review and follow-up. I haven't received anything back from them.

I've dealt with tremendous pain in my life, and live with severe musculoskeletal pain every day. Every day I deal with challenges doing things that most wouldn't have a second thought about. But the pain from bright light is something that stops me from being able to safely operate a vehicle. I have to close one eye and squint the other - all while they're watering. depending on how long I'm exposed, my vision just starts deteriorating - colors start blending/fading.. etc. It's not a pleasant experience when I'm without shaded lenses.

I've been very fortunate to have doctors and specialists that have helped me with a number of things in my life. Doctors that listen to their patients and seek to understand them.

This is the first time I've felt discriminated for a medical diagnosis. By a Doctor.

I'm sure Dr. Shirey didn't think of it like that, or do it out of spite. But it's still a blow to the quality of life for me. Dr. Shirey, like the rest of us, is human. But, in a position where you're responsible for providing care for and improving the quality of life for your patients, you should never assume, discount or interpret your patients plea as unimportant or conjecture.

I'm the one with the condition, not you. You're responsible for having the knowledge and authority to help me cope with the condition.

I do not take any pleasure in giving a review like this. Especially for a local owned business and a member of our community. But, I also take professional responsibility very seriously - and this was an irresponsible action that negatively affected my quality of life, where I was a patron seeking professional help to improve my quality of life. It was a request well within the realm of service that one would expect from this establishment.

This is very important as a leader in the community as well. If you want to run for office, don't start by discriminating against your own patients by directly denying them the help you're tasked with and responsible for providing.

I guess it's good practice for becoming a politician...

text:
Doctor Lowe is the only bright light at the clinic. She is professional and you can tell that she cares for her patients. I am torn because although she is great, the rest of the staff that, I have had the displeasure of seeing, make me not want to return.

When this was a Schaefer Eye Center, the staff was fantastic. The doctors were personable and I looked forward to my visits.

Now is a different story. I am asked the same questions that I have answered numerous times in this last month. If the notes are in my chart, why can't the tech realize which eye I just had surgery on. 3 visits in a row now I have been ask that same question by the same Tech that will not look in the chart to find the answer.

Now this may just be picky but why is it that my eye doctor forces you to put on an open  paper mask. granted I understand it's Covid but when you come in the door instead of allowing you to continue to wear your own cloth mask which is thicker and better. Not only is it a waste of resources there's no way it is more sanitary than my own that I wash constantly. They refused to even talk to you or see you until you put their paper mask on so I put it on top of my cloth mask each time.

The front desk staff has been friendly but I have not had a lot of interaction with them and I'm not sure that I really want to go back. It is an absolute shame that the rest of the practice doesn't live up to the same standards as Doctor Lowe.

The front desk people couldn’t even tell me what astigmatism was.  My husband didn’t end up liking his glasses and it was a complete hassle to get them to refund it back to our same FSA card.  The office manager, Shannon, was not exactly wanting to help until I forced the issue.  My lenses weren’t correct so I had to make, yet, another appointment to examine again since there was no doctor there.    I go to that appointment and they adjust the rx.  Luckily, the ONLY pleasant and HELPFUL person that works there, Kim, had me try sample lenses with the new rx BEFORE they sent it to the lab......only to find out the new rx wasn’t right either.  She wanted to let me see/speak with the doctor about it but he had gone to lunch.  At this point, after going there 3 times and now having to go back AGAIN, I will be returning my glasses as well.  Going to start fresh somewhere else!

resp.text: Colby,  We value your feedback and would like very much to speak with you in hopes to rectify your experience and provide you with the Valued Patient Care that you deserve.  Our goal is to make every visit with us a great experience.  Please contact us directly at myeyedr.com/patientrelations to discuss further your feedback and to grant us the opportunity to win your business. We look forward to speaking with you soon.

name: Dayle Goodwin
text: All I can say is chaotic.  I am sure at one time this was an organized facility.

resp.text: We would like to get some more details about your experience and make sure this gets resolved. We will try to reach out to you, to resolve this situation.  In the meantime, please send me your contact information here,  myeyedr.com/patientrelations

name: Jonathan Hunt
text: Today is sadly the last day i will visit Schaeffer after many years. I had an appointment and was running slightly late, so i called ahead and let them know. They only thing the receptionist said, in a kinda rude way, was that i would have to reschedule for another day if i was 1 min past 15 min late. So i drive like crazy to get there and made it on time! Except i accidentally parked in the optometrist lot next door. After I go in and realize i am supposed to be next door it is of course 1 min past the 15 min late. I was turned away and told i could not be seen. The waiting room was literally empty. I then walked back next door and they were able to see me on the spot and i had a great experience. Do yourself a favor and skip Schaeffer and go next door like i did. You will be happier

resp.text: Jonathan, we sincerely apologize for your experience regarding your scheduled appointment yesterday. Your experience is not how we intend to serve our patients and we regret that we fell short of our expectations of care. We did leave you a voicemail so that we could further discuss this with you. Even though we cannot alleviate the frustration you have endured thus far, please let us know is there is anything we can do that will afford us another opportunity to serve your vision correction needs. Take Care.

name: Regina Martin
text: I went for my first eye exam ever yesterday and had the BEST time. Dawn, who I think *?* is the office manager, took so much time helping me find the perfect frames-it was a blast and she was genuinely interested in helping me find something I'd love. (And I did-SUCCESS!) The Dr. and assistant were both great. SUCH a positive experience and so glad I chose to go with them.

name: Cat
text: Went in for a emergency and had never been there before. They we are great, sweet and to the point. The only thing with out having a appointment the wait was a little long. The doctor was great and to the point and very helpful.

name: Leslie Bates
text: Beautiful, clean building! Nice & helpful staff! Dawn is an extremely wonderful asset to this place!

name: M A
text:
The staff is friendly, but the most helpful is ( Dawn ) the most amazing manager, solved my problem in a second !
Most respectful manager in this office
All my respect 👍🏻

name: Michelle Cook
text:
I wish I could give more than a 5 star rating...

Schaeffer Eye Center in Trussville, AL is the BEST bar none! The ladies in this office are fantastic. The Doctors are phenomenal. Every staff member is always polite, and the place always clean. I have a 5 year old, he is hyper active, and borderline Autistic. He was not yet able to identify letters properly, but he could do shapes. The nurse, Katelin, who was working with him took her time and found a chart, and walked him through the steps. He never cried, he never fussed, and he told me later he loved eye exam.

name: Sharon Rosenow
text: Went in to get my first contact lense fitting done! The Dr was super nice and interactive. The assistant was quite pleasant and explain all my cost options with my insurance. Whole process took just over an hour and I walked out glasses free! My husband has been going here for awhile now and I doubly recommend them to anyone (and those like me who are nerved by eye doctors!)

name: james montoya
text: Amazing costumer service. This lady I think was her name was Dawn, was patient with the whole family and made our experience a real treat! I will always go to her for the rest of my life. She is that awesome.

name: Rachael Winston
text: Wonderful customer service!!  I love my glasses that I got as well. Dawn and Samantha rock. The physician was thorough and nice. I highly recommend this office!

name: Kathy Bessiere
text: Just had a very bad experience.  I pre-scheduled a Saturday appointment a year ago so that I could make sure to get a Saturday appointment.  They called me today to cancel because the doctor was not going to work that day.  Then they told me that I would have to wait until May for another Saturday appointment time.  Way to make your customers feel important.

resp.text: We apologize for the delayed response. Kathy, we regret that your Saturday appointment was cancelled at no fault of yours, and will use this as an opportunity to improve. We can be contacted directly at PatientRelations@myeyedr.com.

name: Sarah Wilson
text: Excellent service! Love my glasses!

resp.text: I love this review, Sarah!  It gives us motivation and helps ensure we all provide high-quality care.  Thanks so much for sharing. We look forward to helping out again in the future.

name: Marci Lewkutz
text: I have been with schaeffer eye in trussville for 3 years and the staff is so polite and I have never had a problem in fact this weekend I encountered a injury to my eye due to my contact and called then on Saturday morning and they told me to come right in and we will look at your eye after treatment I was pleased with the results and the doctor Swain that seen me seen me explained everything that I had to do and told me if it gets any worse they have a eye clinic in birghman  until my follow-up

name: Perla Lopez
text: Love everyone there, so sweet They care about you and your needs!

name: Tahirah Walker
text: Great customer service!

name: Henry Robertson
text: When my daughter broke her glasses, they were able to put her lenses in a new frame and it only cost me $18 total.  Outstanding!

name: Tara Johnson
text: Great customer service and friendly associates!!!

name: Leslie Finley
text: WOW!!!  I was expecting a nightmare coming for an eye test with a 2 year old.  But the ladies at the vision center were so nice and helpful.  The entire staff was friendly but professional .  They were so nice that my Grandson, Lucas was a perfect angel.

name: Jennifer DeGaris
text: My son has had great service there.  They are kind and helpful.

name: Tiffany
text: Very friendly staff and and quick service! Great eyewear selection

name: Janet Green
text: I have to say that the ladies that work in the vision center are great.  They are very nice and very helpful.  I came in there with my prescription in hand to purchase a pair of sun glasses there.  First of all, I went in on Friday and was told that I would get a call when they were ready, probably 1 week. However, I got a call the following Monday, that they were already done.  I have went in to get adjustments on the temples, and they have been so wonderful each time, eager to get the best fit. My sunglasses were about 1/3 of the price that I was quoted from a doctors office in town.  I plan to go back there for my next pair.

name: micah nash
text: All of the ladies here do a fantastic job!  It's enjoyable every time I go.

name: Karen Caldwell-Naylor
text: I love the doctor at the vision center but she doesn't seem to keep a very close watch on the girls she hires. More times than not, they are late or not caring to answer the phones when they are there. It gets very frustrating and it makes you wonder just how much business they are losing because of it.

name: Gail Chambers
text: I have gotten excellent service from a wonderful staff at this Pearle Vision for the past 4 years.  I would highly recommend them to anyone needing any type of service for their eyes whether it  be an eye check up or buying new new frames or even just an adjustment for you eyeglasses, you'll find it all here and walk out happy.

name: Gary Hazelton
text: Excellent support converting from bi-focals to progressive lenses. Good crew to work with!

name: Wendell B
text: I had a great experience Tara was exceptional she made the vist a pleasure

name: Joy Sullivan
text:
They refused to see me because I couldn’t wear a Halloween mask due to me being a asthmatic.
Exceptions could have been made.

name: Scott Jones
text: Friendly staff, was able to get in and out relatively quickly, would recommend.

name: Jeremy (Momsboy32)
text: This place has that small town eye place feel. The people are all great. The Dr. Chambers is very pleasant and she loves sci-fi, which is always a great thing. They have a really great frame selection. The wait time was very short for me to get my new glasses. Once they came in they made sure everything was great my my new glasses. I feel like I got an exceptional deal with great service.

name: samantha pearson
text: Dr. Chambers is amazing! Katy was also very nice and helpful with finding the perfect glasses for my style. I absolutely love them! Great job all around!

name: Maggie Granger
text: I’ve always been a contacts person, but my experience with PearleVision has converted me!   The staff was knowledgeable and helpful, and they found the perfect frames for me.  I’m complimented on them all the time.  My contacts have become my backups.  I will definitely be back!

name: Ceasar Carnes
text: I saw Dr. Chambers and have to say it was the fastest eye exam I have ever experienced.  She was in a hurry from the second she entered the exam room.  I was taken aback at her abrupt dismissal of me when I had questions.  As I continued the process of choosing frames, etc. I observed how the patients were being pushed through quickly.  I don't think this type of office is for me.

name: thomas elliot
text: I came in for an exam this morning and had a wonderful experience. Dr Chambers was helpful and informative and Jason found a great pair of glasses for me. couldnt be happier.

name: Chelsea Winborne
text: I love Dr. Chambers and Dr.Matalka! (I have not yet met Dr. Mallard, but I am sure they are lovely as well.) They are both very sweet and knowledgeable. I moved to Minor, AL and I still travel to be here.

name: erin price
text: I couldn't find the frames I wanted at my doctor. They had an amazing selection my new glasses are beautiful. Thanks Pearle!

name: Donald Matheson
text: I had a very nice check up with Dr Chambers and love the new glasses!

name: Malia Bunt
text: I've lived in a few different cities and been through several different optometrists. These guys run a tight ship. They are professional and friendly. I had tried to wear contacts before but, it never worked. My eyes would get too dry or I would waste them. The doctors at Pearle Vision took the time to find a pair of contacts that work with my eyes and for that, I'm eternally grateful.

name: Mike Carrasco
text: Dr.Chamber was awesome and really wonderful.First time walk in and was greeted by friendly staff.

name: william wesson
text: Awful customer service.  My husband went in to get a copy of his prescription and they refused to give him a copy....the young lady was very rude about it...including ripping out the prescription and throwing into the trash in front of him.  I am waiting on a response from corporate on this matter.

name: Don Petry
text:
This local + woman-owned business completely changed my perspective on eyewear! The entire process from private exam appointment to selection to fitment was customized to my needs. The attention to detail and wide array of options resulted in the best eyewear of my life!

Also, Dr. Andrea carries the Wiley X brand which is known for its exceptional durability and quality. For an avid athlete, traveler and handyman these were the perfect fit. Instead of 3 different pairs of cheap glasses, I have one pair that can do everything!

name: Autumn Brown
text: Absolutely recommend Steel City Eye Care to everyone! So personal and attentive to their clients. Super responsive and scheduling is easy! Please check out Andrea Hudson next time you need an appointment!

name: L Ferg
text: She did an amazing job. Very thorough exam, she was super nice and explained everything prior to doing it. Honestly the best eye Dr. I have ever used and I will continue to use her

name: Stephen Franklin
text: Very thorough eye exam and very helpful filling contact lens prescriptions.  I also appreciate the availability of appointments outside normal business hours.  Very convenient.

name: Erin Elliott
text: Dr Hudson was so great!  She took extra time to talk to me about my benefits, allergy issues with my eyes and going over my history. Her location is so convenient and it was a wonderful experience overall.

name: Celia Davenport
text: Great experience!

name: James Magouyrk
text: Highly recommended! What stood out the most is I wasn't just another patient, she was very thorough and honest. Very caring person!!

name: PHILIP POWERS
text: Very pleased customer! Great place!  The doctor actually answered the phone.  Great service and very flexible hours.  The office is in the Lakeview District near Babalou and parking is easy.

name: K-Diva Licious
text: I absolutely love the staff they were all nice and friendly. The doctor is by far the best eye doctor that I have had. She is very thorough and informative. I always enjoy my appointment when I go there it's like seeing old friends.

name: Susan Johnson
text: My grandson’s glasses were broken so we went here to have them replaced or repaired. Gene was able to do a quick, temporary fix; also, gave us a coupon to use to purchase new glasses. We are always pleased when we go here. Dr. Vanoy always takes good care of my family! I highly recommend this location!

name: Tara Orie
text: Rip-off, you can get higher quality services at much cheaper prices out there. In short, my contact prescription was incorrect and my glasses prescription was incorrect; both of which resulted in my glasses being unusable as well as half of the contacts I purchased. In total I paid over $800 for all services and glasses/contacts. And now over a year later, I'm receiving calls from a debt collector claiming that I still owe another $100. Go somewhere else.

resp.text: Tara, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about your experience in our office! I'd like to look into what happened. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: jirah mccall
text: I love this place and the staff! Everyone is very friendly and helpful. I’ve never had a bad experience.

name: shirley jones
text: This is a very clean and professional environment! Dr. Karen is very patience and knowledgeable! She took her time with Sarah whom is disable.I highly recommend her services!

name: Lashaunda Barganier
text: The experience I had was very wonderful. The people there were very nice

name: Christinay Bogan
text: EVERYONE was really nice and verryyyy professional! My sister spoke volumes of you and this is why I chose to come. I am glad I did. I will be bringing my 8 year old daughter next.

name: Lorenzo Jones
text: I look forward to my yearly visit with the doctor and the staff are very pleasant

name: Christopher Cambron
text: It’s funny how I ended up with my appointment. They sent a text to someone else to verify their appointment. I said , they had the wrong number but I needed an appointment. So they set me one. I have never found a sweeter more knowledgeable staff. Looking forward to getting my new glasses. Thanks again girls for a job very well done.

name: Vanessa Cartet
text: Thanks So Very much for An Awesome Experience!

name: Paulette Boston
text:
I had an appointment with eyecare associates about  a month ago.
the optometrist that did my eye exam was very good I was very pleased.
the night mare began once I sat at the desk to choose my glasses.
the associate reviewed the order due to the fact that she was the expert on eyewear. I ended up with additional  things I did not really need on my
glasses. I got them home and could not see my work computer, everything was blurry even reading. I called and informed them that
the glasses was not working,, the optometrist rechecked my eyes and
the prescription it was good. I informed them it was the coating on the
glasses all that extra that had been added. they did an minor adjustment
I still could not see my computer it was still blurry. I  went back a third time and insisted that they remove all those coating-Ultimate Poly-Carb
Addon*Ultimate Poly*Anti-Reflective Premium*UV400, This was close to
ridiculous that I had to spend time running back and forth for a pair of
new glasses that I could not use. After those coatings were removed
I can see my work computer better but they are not better than my old
glasses. I was so frustrated and disappointed  not only to have to go back today to have the associate to remove the black pen mark they left on my
glasses when they were trying to make the corrections. I have never had this much trouble getting a new pair of glasses. This was not the type
of service that I was expecting, It was as if they could not seem to get
my glasses right.

resp.text: Paulette, I'm Cassie. I'm glad you enjoyed the optometrist at your visit, and I'm so sorry about all these issues with your glasses! I'd like to look into how this happened. When you have a moment, could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Kat Smith
text: No matter how long it's been, I feel like I'm visiting my family when I come there. Everyone is welcoming, warm, and genuinely glad to see me. I always leave with a smile! Their customer service is AMAZING!

name: audraruth
text: Very nice and professional.

name: Cindy Knox
text: I just appreciate how friendly everyone was. I felt like everyone genuinely cared about me as a person! Thanks for the excellent care!

name: Dawn Wilson
text:
I Love My EyeCare Family❤️
The Awesome Group has never let me down!

I had a appointment scheduled very quickly and was treated with much care and respect. Everyone on phone and in person were very inviting and helpful and I highly recommend this location for your next eye care visit!

text: This was my first time visiting EyeCare Associates, Dr. Vanoy and the staff were very helpful and friendly. Dr. Vanoy thoroughly explained all information pertaining to my eye exam. I am happy that I chose EyeCare Associates for my eye care services.
