text:
My husband had to get his glasses remade three times, and each time they were rude. No one could tell us how long a replacement would take and seemed bothered when we asked for updates.

Waiting in the lobby, I overheard the mom next to me say she was here for their glasses to be remade because they weren’t right. Staff seemed to treat her just as they did us.

name: Marcus Williams (TheSevereWay)
text: Dr. Scott is rude and arrogant. The one doctor I liked is no longer there. The office always has an excuse for their continued poor service. I gave them ample chances, in hopes that they could prove to be (at the least) satisfactory.

name: Lorrie Pate
text: This place is amazing! Im partial to dr.mcgowen. but the entire staff is so helpful. Over the last 2 years they have fit us in and regular appointments were so easy!!! Got our glasses in 1 hour! Great service! Great selections and merchandise! If u have ever had a preteen during covid needing eye glasses, its complicated, but cherise was wonderful!!!

name: Madelyn Wiggins
text: I had a very good experience buying my first pair of glasses from here. I brought in a prescription from another optometrist and selected my frames, and my glasses were ready within an hour after ordering. I was especially surprised given that I had two different prescriptions for my eyes, one of which had astigmatism correction. The price for the lenses was also very fair compared to the variety of other places I looked at. The women who helped me were very kind, and helped me by making the process very quick and easy.

name: Chris Devall
text: Very rude! Just called their office to see where my wife’s referral information is from a doctors office they referred me to and was mistreated  and hung up on in my face by their  receptionist because I guess the fax machine was to far away to send the information that was already supposed to be sent. My wife’s is going blind already and that’s just what she needs from another person is that attitude! Thanks Baldwin eye clinic! I wonder if they even care about people eye problems or are they just interested in making money off peoples eye problems and being rude in the process? Thanks Baldwin eye clinic!

name: Shelly Pickle
text: I love Dr. Scott!!!! The ladies are very helpful, great at assisting in finding the perfect pair of glasses for your face and take their time making the adjustments to be certain you have the right fit. I stop in on occasion to have them cleaned at no charge, the ladies are really sweet and it only takes a minute. They also went the extra mile in helping me find contacts that work for me. Which wasn't an easy task. I won't go anywhere else.

name: EggoTheMeggo
text:
Great for people who only need a slight correction since they can get their glasses same day, but if you have astigmatism, don't bother getting your glasses here. Walmart gets them faster. It's been a week since I ordered mine and they still haven't given me an estimate for how much longer it will be for my glasses to be ready. Prices are also so much higher than other options in the area. They also charge for adjustments whereas Walmart is free. Definitely room for improvement.

Edit: I received a phone call from Bay Minette Optical telling me my glasses were sent to their office instead of the Daphne location. This is Friday. Then they proceeded to tell me that they can mail them over to the Daphne location and I MIGHT have them by Saturday. No thanks, I'll just come get them today so I can make sure nothing else happens to them.

name: Warren Wood
text: The staff and doctors at the Baldwin Eye Clinic are all very friendly and helpful. I really like Dr. Scott and his no nonsense approach to solutions to any problems I had with my eyes and vision. He was straight forward with me and resolved my dry eye condition when no other eye doctors would even offer a solution other than eye drops. I would and will recommend the clinic to others.

name: Mike Smith
text: SLOW and unorganized! You will wait at least 2 hours every time. No one ever knows what is going on. Tons of staff just sitting around while customers wait. They need all new receptionist. The ones they have are rude and and are not professional.

name: Doug Snow
text: Great experience, wonderful Doctor and staff, highly recommend

name: Melissa Engelke
text: I've been using this place for a few years. The doctors are great. Prices are a bit much, but so is everything else these days. The only downside I always have is needing to wait 5 - 10 days to get my glasses back. I do not know if this is just because my prescription is a PIA or what. Overall, I do recommend them.

name: Paul Gridler
text: It is always a pleasure to go to Baldwin Eye Clinic. From the time I checked in, took the exam and checked out, everyone made me feel very comfortable. Dr.Adcock also took time to explain what he found and what he recommended.They don't try and sell you something if you don't need it or you don't like it. I highly recommend them!!

name: Carol Anne Stark
text: I have been using Baldwin Eye Clinic for several years and have been very pleased with  the optometrists. I have gotten my appointments quickly and have not had to wait long once I arrived for my appointment. Any problems I have had with my eyes have been taken care of and I love my current glasses that I got there. I highly recommend this clinic.

name: Stephen Bertagnolli
text: Great people, great doctors, quick appointments, superb service. I like how the doctor took time with me to explain things as he went to make sure I understood. It's the little things like that that matter.

name: Dana Pridgen
text: Dr Adcock was great but the prices are not competitive to say the least. There are extra charges and exam costs are overpriced. The woman at the front desk was extremely rude and condescending. I can't believe I actually paid money to be treated like that!! I would only go to Baldwin Eye Clinic if you want to pay too much and be treated poorly.

name: Christopher Irizarry
text: Over priced for what they did. Also the Person that supposly checked me was not listening at all to what I was saying and felt kinda rude from his part.

name: Lauri Breaud
text: Baldwin Eye Clinic went over and beyond my expectations. I found them on the internet and was excited to schedule because not only could I fill out my paperwork online before my arrival, they were open on Friday afternoons (when I'm off of work)! I was literally in and out of there within 30 minutes, and that included a screening, eye exam, vision exam, and choosing out my glasses. Dr. Cobb was great-- she not only told me about my vision, but also about quirky things about my eye anatomy. She seems like she truly loves what she does-- which is something I can relate to and appreciate. The fact that I went pick up my glasses an hour after picking them out was AWESOME as well as the fact that my contacts were in STOCK at the office. Definitely the best eye clinic I've ever been to. I would recomment them & Dr. Cobb to anyone and everyone!

name: Dan Therrell
text: I was referred to Baldwin Eye Clinic by a friend, and I had an eye exam and checkup there recently. I am very satisfied with the promptness, courtesy, and professionalism of the entire office staff. The advice I requested from Dr. Adcock about laser eye surgery helped me understand all my future options and helped me make a decision that I had been concerned about for some time. I recommend Bay Eye Clinic to anyone who needs eye care.

name: Linda Ball
text: I love Baldwin eye clinic! The Dr's and staff are friendly and do a through job! I have never had to go back with wrong eye prescription and you usually get your glasses sooner than they say!

name: Taylor Waite
text: Absolutely the best in Baldwin County. We trust Doctor Bernard Scott & Doctor Joe Adcock for our eye exams, contact lenses & eye glasses. Doctor Scott & Doctor Adcock are some of the most experienced eye doctors in the County & they are on the cutting edge with current technologies involving eye care.

name: NATALIE DUPONT

text: I have been seeing Doctor Adcock for 4+ years now, and he never fails to make my visit as comfortable as possible. His humor and decorum are unsurpassed .  **good thing he is NEVER retiring!!

name: SAH Daddy
text:
Great staff, great docs, great experience!

Ordered a set of glasses with lenses that had Anti-Reflectors, but decided not to get the lightweight due to insurance issues. Told me the glasses would take 2 weeks to come in. Got a call the next day saying they are ready...and found out they were giving me the lightweight addition for free!

I've been going to this place for a few years, and they don't normally dish out freebies to me...but it was nice of them to do that for a semi-longterm customer! (I always tend to scratch/break my glasses beyond repair before insurance will help pay for them...turning 25 and still am a clutz like a 12 year old).

Also love how the doctor I had(horrible memory sorry!) went into detail about my eyes in layman terms. Just an overall great experience.

name: Kristi Riales
text: I love Baldwin Eye Clinic One Hour. Dr. Adcock is an amazing doctor and took his time and explained everything to me. He is exceptional at his job.

text:
I've recently moved to Montgomery so I'm starting from scratch with eye doctors, dentist, etc. I initially booked an appointment with Downtown Eye Care simply because it was the nearest one to my home. My first experience was pleasant and Dr. Marshall is very sweet and personable and its apparent he's somewhat new in the practice (opening in 2013. However, the receptionist leaves something to be desired. She's very dry and rude! Maybe it's just me but I expect good customer service from the time I walk in the door until I walk out, ESPECIALLY if I'm paying for a service.
My second visit was booked for the wrong time and I sat in the lobby for an hour just to tell them my contacts fit. And once again she was rude! Anywho, Dr. Marshall, and the lady that fits your glasses were sweet. I'm contemplating going back.

name: Natalie Jones
text: Dr. Drake is a Wonderful Dr. But his Staff is another thing .. I was a few minutes late and was told I was going to have to reschedule I told them I would have to find another eye doctor then because my glasses were broke and I needed new ones asap.. I was then told I would be fit it eventually.. but was seen immediately because there was no one else in the office..I was rushed to pick my glasses so I hope I like them when I get them.

name: Chance Ellsworth
text: My wife loved them! She went in with our almost two year old little girl with her. Everyone was extremely patient with them. The staff and the doctor have great costumer service and explained everything very well.

name: Tom S
text:
Dr Drake is professional, informative, timely, & was a pleasure to deal with. However, his staff is terrible & lack any people skills as others have also experienced. They rush you out the door with a constant reminder that they are closed at 1. If time is a problem don't schedule people near closing time. Problem solved. They tell  me that i have the worst eyecare insurance although it covered everything, and after a month of waiting for my prescription they finally call me to tell me the lab broke my glasses and it will take another 10 days or more to get the replacements. Hopefully I'll get them before I need a new prescription and they will be correct unlike others reviews  whom have had problems with the prescription coming back wrong. Additionally the staff informed me at my appointment that my insurance was approved and what was covered before choosing options and frames but then called a few days after my visit to tell me they have 1 paper saying insurance was denied but another that says it was approved. Pro tip: check your facts before calling patients to at least make an attempt to seem competent.
First and last visit.

name: bulldog44sos
text:
Details05/05/2017
Went there for an eye exam last year. I purchased some REALLY nice glasses and contacts. Blew about $450 in there. After my exam and purchase, I asked for my eye test results and PD (pupilairy distance) because my employer requires safety glasses and they will not allow me to wear my daily glasses with side shields. Also, since my employer is so strict on the glasses, they provide me with a free pair every year, but my prescription has to be up to date. The ladies behind the desk refused to give me my exam results because it was against their policy. Basically they didn't want me to take my prescription to a competitor and purchase glasses or contacts. I explained my situation and that I had just spent almost 500 on glasses and contacts (and thats additional to insurance paying 150 toward my frames) with them. Didn't matter. I walked to the back and grabbed the optometrist. He gave me my prescription so I could take it to work. That's like a doctor giving you a physical and not giving you your test results because he's afraid you'll use another pharmacy besides the one in his office! That's CRAZY! THOSE ARE MY MEDICAL RECORDS! I'll never set foot into Marx in Cullman again!

name: Donna Ray
text: Thanks to Dawn Pearce for an outstanding visit!

name: Dana Adams
text: Ridiculous! Three hours!

Had such a great experience today at the clinic! Everyone was so kind and so helpful! Took a lot of stress off of me putting my 3 year old in glasses.

text: After years of neglecting personal eyecare because of costs and difficult insurance, I discovered Leeds Family Eyecare. As long as I’m in the B’ham area, Dr. Pulliam and his staff will be my GO TO provider for eye care. Great offices. Wonderful staff. Attentive medical professionals one and all!! Thanks you all of you.

resp.text: Wow!  Thank you so much!!

name: Kelly Fondren
text: Absolutely love the staff and Dr. Pulliam.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Melissa Tims
text: Such a caring team! Always trying to help you in any way they can!

name: Doris Johnson
text: Dr Williams is a very caring person and I appreciate his concerns in caring for my eyes. He is very attentive and personal .

name: Laura Layton
text: I love Leeds Family Eye Care. Everyone there is always so wonderful and they really listen to you and what is going on with your eyes. I would highly recommend them to everyone!

name: Paula Lea
text:
Went to Leeds Family Eye care today. Great experience!!
The staff was friendly snd professional.
The doctor was very thorough.
Great experience!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: hilary matheney
text: The staff and Dr are very friendly, knowledgeable and take time to listen to your thoughts and concerns.

name: Deacon Reggie Ruth
text: Great work the doctors and nurses do love the way they take care of patients keep up the good work

name: Judy Norris
text:
Most thorough eye exam I have had since retiring from UAB.  Very conscious of my needs as far as my computer work with editing photos, reading and my distance vision. Was concerned enough with what he saw in dilation concerning glaucoma that they booked me a follow up appt to do more detailed tests in 30 days and my Insurance will pay for it too. Went on an ordered my new glasses ( first since 2012) and sunglasses with my VSP Insurance a couple of days later after my eyes had settled down so I could choose frames.
Very happy with my services at Leeds Family Eye Care !!!!

name: John W Gregory
text: Kind and considerate staff with patience for questions, etc. Doctor Pulliam was clear in his assessment of my vision. Glad I went to them for eye care.

name: Christine McDaniel
text: I absolutely cannot rave about this place enough. I am hard of hearing and cannot hear on the phone, they go above and beyond to assess to my disability needs without making me feel like my disability is a burden. Not only I am a satisfied patient but my late grandmother spoke very highly of Dr. Pulliam and his staff. Once I met them, I completely understood why. Dr. Pulliam is everything she described and his staff are amazing, giving me their cell phone numbers so I could book future appointments if needed. They truly care about their patients. I absolutely love this place.

name: Amy Terry
text: Absolutely love everyone at Leeds Family Eye Care.  They always take care of Emma and me.  ❤️

name: Cody Thompson
text: I love this optometrist. He is really personable, professional, and willing to talk with you about what is going on with your eyes. His employees are also really pleasant, and his opticians have been really helpful with glass fittings and repair. I would HIGHLY recommend this optometrist, especially over the larger chain optometrists in the Birmingham metro area.....

My appointment was at 10:15. I arrive at 10 in order to have time to fill out paperwork. By 10:30 they have taken another client back who came in after me and also had to fill out paperwork. I was finally taken back at 10:45 and still haven’t seen a doctor and it is 11:15.

I’m now going to be late for work due to the lack of punctuality of a doctor. Not too impressed.

text: Dr. Pulliam is wonderful, explains everything clearly to the patient and has a very friendly staff serving the community of Leeds, AL.  My whole family uses him and will continue to as long as we live in Leeds.

text: By far the best eye care I have ever received! I highly recommend Dr. Pulliam. I had a lot of questions/concerns and at no point did I feel like I was being "sold" on something or that he was not listening. Both Dr. Pulliam & his assistant Shelby were great. So happy I have FINALLY found an optometrist that I am comfortable with and trust.

text: Leeds Family Eye Care is the only place I will go for my eye care. They take their time and the doctors and staff are professional in every aspect.

name: Michaele Rankin
text: I continue using Dr. Pullium even though I moved over an hour away.  He and his staff are worth the drive.  Although I would like to have a bigger eye glass selection to choose from, I can say that they go WAY out of their way so I can get the glasses I want.  They even allowed me to look through an entire case of  eyewear from one of their reps and I found a great pair!  They also work very well with my insurance.

Dr. Pulliam is a Doctor who is really concerned and takes care of his clients. I will be using them in the future and would recommend them to family and friends!

text: I took my 10 yr. old son to see Dr. Pulliam and his staff.  They were very professional and friendly.  They did not rush us in and out like most Dr.'s do.  They took their time and explained everything to us.  Dr. Pulliam was great and my son really liked him.  We will definitely be using him for our family eye care needs.

name: marvin noland
text: My experience was and has been very good...exceptional. The kindness of the assistants were very enjoyable and pleasant. Dr. O'Leary has always been on point. he is very easy to get along with and always willing to do what's best for my eyecare. I really appreciate the service they provide.

text: I always enjoy my appointment. They are so friendly and knowledgeable. Very professional and always pleasant. I can always see when I leave!

name: DeLois Cunningham

name: Theresa Pittman
text: As always, Dr. O and his staff was Professional and Friendly. Dr. O did a thorough exam on my eyes and gave me Great Peace of Mind concerning a situation I had been recently experiencing. He is very poised and knowledgeable in his field and I trust him Totally with my most prized possession.

name: Jane Wilkerson
text: The exam was very thorough by a truly professional optometrist. The prescription greatly improved my vision. Much better exam than I've had at other establishments. The staff was very friendly and competent as well.

name: Keyona Morgan
text: The staff at Lens Crafters was very friendly and helpful! Dr. O’Leary is really nice and personable! I always have a great experience!

Always a pleasure to see Dr. O'Leary he answers all my questions explains the procedures
very professional.

Not friendly
Not helpful
Get ur meds elsewhere

name: Nicole
text: The employees at this location are great! This store is always busy but they do their best to restock things all the time. My only complaint would be that customers are ALWAYS parked all down the firelane and it can be difficult to get in and out of the store.

name: Shunta Jeffery
text: Tasheka at Walmart Pharmacy (Lorna Road) is FANTASTIC!!!!!! Her customer service skills are superb and I hope we get to meet in person! She's a keeper! I told you I was gonna post about you lady!!!!!!

name: Lindsey Kennedy
text: The Pharmacy here has some of the most friendliest staff! They are very helpful, personable, and not to mention, pretty vast as far as Wal-Mart RX is concerned.

name: M Miller
text: Horrible, horrible, horrible. Had an eye exam and ordered glasses. First pair came in with the wrong prescription.  They redid my eye exam and said they made a mistake so they reordered my glasses. 2 weeks later I hadn’t heard a word so I called. Was put on hold for 20 min. I hung up at 20 min. Called back. Was put on hold for 7 min. Finally told my glasses had been shipped back with demo lenses installed. They apologized and told me when I came in I could select a pair of sunglasses as compensation for my trouble. Another 10 day wait. Glasses come in. I go to get them and ask about the offer of sunglasses. A nasty woman announces loudly from behind a counter that she’s the only person that can approve such an offer and she doesn’t know anything about it.  So I tell her, well, that’s what I was offered on the phone. She tells me she’ll have to investigate it. A little while later they call and tell me that they have “a” pair of sunglasses I can have. No choice allowed. I go to get them and they are a pair that was clearly returned by someone. I ask to speak to the “manager” and all of a sudden she’s unavailable.  These people lie. They are overworked and under supported by the company. I’ll never do business with them again. 36 days to get a pair of glasses is absurd and reneging on their offer is simply amateur.  So sad this is what this business has been reduced to.

name: Jackie Jackson
text: Horrible experience.   This is NOT Schaeffer Eye Clinic! But, they don't tell you that.  I did not get what I asked for and  was told i could not get the custom  lenses I wanted.    Yet, the old pair  of lenses from Schaeffer were exactly what I wanted. Selection of frames, Limited, especially on the high end.  Their service is basic and over priced!

name: Debbie Simmons
text: This was the worst Schaeffer experience I've EVER had. I arrived for my appointment a little early and filled out the paperwork to update my information. I was the only patient in the waiting room. I waited 50 mins before seeing the doctor. They directed another patient in to the room I was already in. On my way out after paying I asked for my prescription and they gave me my old perscription and not all of my personal information had been updated and it was not signed by the doctor - which I did not realize until I was ordering my glasses, elsewhere of course. A very unpleasant experience and waste of time. Very inefficient staff. I would not have given them one star but I could not post unless I did.

name: sara soltani
text: I had a pair of glasses and got a second pair here, but the new prescription wasn't working fine for me so I had to go back to change the lenses. Everyone was nice during first visit, but when I returned, Dr. Benjamin was behaving very badly that I got stressed out. I even asked her about it, but she didn't seem to care and called me confused and said  I don't know what I want! (Of course, that's why we need help of a doctor!) I don't know if she had other problems or what but that's not a good excuse to treat a patient like that!

name: Wade Kwon
text:
For some 15 years, I've been visiting Schaeffer Eye Center under the care of Dr. Patricia Benjamin. She has been terrific: friendly, attentive and wry in making sure my eyes aren't suffering from the glare of all those screens.

I see more clearly thanks to Schaeffer.

name: Tracy Jackson
text: The staff here are very attentive and kind! Always willing to help

name: CAROL SKELTON
text: Not the same service as I was used o with Schaeffer Eye Center, been waiting on the correct glasses since June 14, 2019 and  I am being told this morning (7-25-2019) they expect  them to be in by August 1, 2019.  Very strange.

name: Lindsey Cochran
text: Worst experience ever and they don't even care. Told me I couldn't wear contacts (even though I have none to wear anymore) and I needed to wear glasses, except my glasses are broken and I can't see out of them. Bought new glasses told they would be in next week, but when I called they said it would be another week. I also have an eye condition that requires eye drops but they won't approve the insurance to cover them. So now I can't see, have severe migraines because of it and my eyes burn all the time. Every time I call for help and they speak to me as if I am stupid every single time. Don't waste your time here they don't actually help you they just want your money.

name: Miss Lan Pretty
text: Great service

name: Matthew O'Brien
text: Doesn't open on time.

name: Caitlin Fann
text:
I left a review awhile ago about how awful this place was but I removed it because they said they would fix it.
I have called the place several times to fix my bill ( I get mailed a statement).
When I made the appointment I had my insurance on the phone to make sure what they cover and told the lady I only want to do what my insurance would cover ( I was ordering contacts). I kept getting bills saying I owed money and even though when I had my appointment I was told I would owe anything. I’ve called several time and my mom has also called trying to fix it. The last time I called a lady said that they will call me back within the next week.. I never received a phone call.
Eventually my mom stepped in and they actually hung up on her. We talked to my old insurance company and they said they never even received a claim.
This place has highly disappointed me.
It looks very pleasant on the outside and inside,  but the people that work there are the opposite.

name: Ron Davis
text: I have been a patient of Florence Eye Center for years and I have always received great service. I trust my optometrist (Kathryn) and Lyndsey did a wonderful job recently taking care of getting my new glasses. I have several family members that use this business as well. I fully recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you Ron!

name: Shaun Dalton
text:
I bought eye glasses  here 4 years ago,  as well as my  children's glasses, I've also purchased my contacts here as well.
I noticed the coating coming off one of my lenses a few months ago. Brought it in today and he told me that it is the anti glare coating that is coming off. I asked him if this is normal after just 4 years,  he said not really but it does happen?? I've got glasses I've had 10 years and nothing like this has happened. He could have offered to order me some new lenses and give me a 10.00 discount and I would have felt better about my issues.

He said there is nothing he can do since it's been 4 years. 4 years?  400.00 glasses?
Save your money and go somewhere else.
This shouldn't be happening...

name: tony triolo
text: I went to purchase single vision glasses. The sales girl said I should try the progressive lenses and that if I did not like them, I had 30 days to bring them back and they would replace them. The progressive glasses were $90 more expensive. I did not like the progressive lenses and returned them. They said that they would replace them but not credit me the $90. This was never explained to me at the time or I would have purchased the single vision glasses. Bad business.

name: Vicki
text: Thanks to Billy allowing me to address my concerns/ issues and his professionalism  I was able to have resolution and look forward to a better experience in the future. Thanks again!

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that you are having trouble reaching us.  Please feel free to call our office and ask Lindsay. We will certainly make every attempt to help you. 256.766.3139.

name: Kristi Whitlock
text: I had my first visit today with Raleigh and Dr. Thigpen. Both ladies were amazing. So patient with me as I was nervous for my visit and as I tried on almost every pair of frames they have in stock. It was a great experience. They made me feel very comfortable and confident in my final selections. I couldn’t have hoped for more and I cannot wait to pick up my glasses!

resp.text: Thank you Kristi!!!

name: Lynn Wray Dillard (Alabama Creeks)
text: Wide selection of glasses. Very fancy decor and a coffee bar that would make Juan Valdez proud. My daughter forgot her contacts back at college and these nice folks gave her a few pairs to hold her she got back to school.

resp.text: Ha! Thank you so much Lynn!

name: Michelle Hayes
text: Excellent service!!! Dr. Thigpen is awesome as is all the staff! Amelya was also great and so friendly!!! This was my first eye exam and eyeglass purchase!! Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thank you Michelle!

name: Tina Simmons
text: Still waiting for reordered glasses. I waited for the first order for three weeks. I finally called to check, and they said they had the glasses, but had failed to get my phone number. 🙄 So they had just been sitting there. As it turns out, they ordered the wrong kind of lenses, so they reordered over a week ago. Haven’t heard a word. I will call them tomorrow. Maybe they’ve had them there again, although I did double check that they had my number. They have a nice showroom, but if they are going to be overpriced, then they should at least be fast and professional.

name: Alydia Murphy
text: I have been going to the Florence eye center for some time now they are amazing. They’ve got a wide variety of glasses along with glasses accessories and more. Ms.Amanda is a sweet lady she will make you feel at home. She tries to make the patients feels comfortable and wanted. Not saying that everyone here doesn’t do the same probably just as well. But if you want true service check this place out.

resp.text: We appreciate your confidence and trust in us, Alydia!

name: Jennifer Markham
text: I am so thankful for the Florence Eye Center! They are very professional but more than that they are extremely kind.... Thanks to you all!

resp.text: Thank you, Jennifer! Please let us know if we can be of any additional assistance to you.

name: Wendell Moore
text:
It’s a nice place but it’s overpriced for the service you get. I have good vision insurance but they charge you separate for everything it seems. Other places I’ve been to the copay is $10-$25. Here it was $60. Then I priced glasses and was quoted $250 with insurance, came back with cash and somehow they miscalculated and it jumped to almost $400. Then I ordered contacts when my insurance reset and they said I didn’t owe anything, a while later I got a call saying I was being turned over to collections if I didn’t pay money owed. Somehow owed $80 so I paid it. Then I got an eye infection and they kept prescribing $120 drops and it never helped.  Went yo another doctor and was prescribed $10 drops and it cleared it up. Wouldn’t recommend
And no I didn’t use my real name and email

name: Kylie Murks
text: Florence Eye Center is where me and my family will ALWAYS go for our vision needs! Taryn is a tremendous help! She was with us during the exam and picking out glasses AND even ordered our contacts. She can do it all! They also did an exam on my son before he was a year old! Thanks for being awesome to our family!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you Kylie.  You're like family to us.  Taryn really can do it all.  We are so glad that you and your family chose us to be your eye care team!!!

name: Brittany Drowns
text: It was the best customer service I could've asked for! Amanda Brown was the sweetest from the moment I went back to the room! She helped me pick out frames that fit my face and I was so thankful as this is my first time ever wearing glasses! Absolutely 100% pleased.

resp.text: Thank you Brittany!

name: Roy Pearson
text: i would give zero stars if i could. this place sucks

resp.text: We are certainly sorry to learn that you feel this way.  We strive to provide excellence in eye care and eyewear for our patients.  It appears that we have fallen short of our intended goals with you.  We would love the opportunity to change your opinion.  Give us a call at (256) 766-3139 and ask to speak with one of our wonderful managers.

name: Tammy Prince
text: I love this office & will never go anywhere else! They have tons of glasses to choose from and even if they don’t have what you’re looking for, they will find it! The opticians are great and very informative. Such a great atmosphere & amazing service! Thanks!

resp.text: Tammy, thank you for your confidence & trust in us!  We certainly appreciate it.

name: Karan Brawner
text: This office is absolutely beautiful!  I went in looking for frames and Sally helped me.  I tried on many frames and she was very patient and I valued her opinion.  We found the perfect frame for me!!!  Sally is a great asset to your office staff.

resp.text: You are absolutely correct.  Sally is amazing!  Her experience combined with her knowledge simply cannot be duplicated.  Thank you for taking time to offer your opinion of our office and staff!  : )

name: Ginger Witt
text: Florence Eye Center is amazing! Great atmosphere. Best eye doctors and staff around. Sally Pigg, the technician that took care of us was extremely knowledgeable and awesome to work with! Definitely knows her job and how to help. Would recommend to anyone!

resp.text: Wow! Thank you Ginger!  We appreciate you taking time to offer your opinion of our office and staff.  Please let us know if we can be of any additional service to you.

name: Emily Miles
text: I can’t say enough great things about this office, from  start to finish the staff was professional, informative, and caring. I found Taryn was extremely informative and made sure I understood everything before moving on to the next step. She certainly took her time with me and became personable makeing sure my experience was nothing short of amazing. I am completely happy with my experience and will definitely recommend this office to friends and family.

resp.text: : ) Big, Huge, Gigantic smiles from all us at Florence Eye Center!!!

name: Susan Shirley
text: I’ve been going to Florence Eye Center for years. I’ve always had a wonderful experience with everyone. Sally has always been very helpful with everything from the prep before my exam to helping pick out my glasses! She is so knowledgeable about her job! Thanks so much!!!

name: J Conlee
text:
Great atmosphere! Great staff! I especially respected the fact that my tech-person, Kiersten put my phobia of eye doctors to rest. She was calm and took her time to explain each step. And the eye doctor got the debris out of my eye on the first try!!

**edit**

As a former “disgruntled employee” I would have to note that any and all reviews above 3 stars were made with fraudulent intent to cover up the poor reviews of actual customers. The management had a contest for whichever employee has the most high rated reviews on google gets $500.
I don’t understand why they didn’t want to invest their time and money in properly training their staff especially after asking the management several times for help, guidance and training with no avail. Just click on each review and notice how the commenter says similar things for different locations of this branch out in muscle shoals and Madison.
But thank you “owners” (management) for replying to your own employee to toot your own horn and make yourself look like a half decent medical establishment. This isn’t a day spa, people actually come here for medical help and look here for honest reviews from actual customers bc they are spending money on their physical well being, not on a nice day out.

resp.text: We are happy that you such a good experience at our office!  Kudos to Kiersten!

name: Michael Darling
text:
My first visit, with an appointment, I was taken back and left in an exam room for 1 1/2 hr until I opened the door and yelled for someone to help me. Another wait for 20 minutes and I was leaving when the eye doc came in. He said “ oh, I was busy, did no one come tell You?”
This time the ordered my glasses, told me two weeks, and after almost three weeks, I had to go by the office..no one answered the phone tho I tried 3 times... the young girl seemed miffed that I asked her to check if they were in. They were, they handed them to me and said good bye...no fitting to face, no checking if they were right...nothing.
I will find a VSP provider other than FEC next year.

resp.text: We certainly hate to hear that you had a bad experience in our office. It definitely sounds like we failed to provide the level of service we strive for.  Please accept our apologies.

name: Josh Vincent
text: After Walmart quit taking our vision insurance, we made the switch and I’m glad we did. This is a great office, great environment, nice staff and the best doctors. We had great help from Taryn in helping select the correct frame with the best fit. I’ll definitely be back. Thanks!

text: I'm new to town and had an accident where my glasses got stepped on; the frame was bent and a lens had fallen out. I walked in without an appointment and asked if they could help me out. They had my glasses bent back in shape and the lens in within minutes and no charge! Great service all the way around. Looks like we found our new eye care center!

text: Taryn is the absolute best. I definitely recommend her!

name: Patricia McCoy
text: Wrong lens inserted on left eye, tried to replace it but it wouldn't come out. Right eye ok after lens implant for distance. Wish I had never wasted the $$ or time. I could see better with my contacts. Florence Eye Center in SC.

resp.text: I'm sorry..I am having trouble finding you in our system. What doctor did you see? We do not do implant surgery at this office. I think you may have us confused with another office. We will be glad to help you in anyway we can in the future.   We are Florence Eye Center in Florence, Alabama.

name: Mason Boersma
text: I had an amazing experience with Taryn, she was super helpful and sweet as well! I highly suggest Florence Eye Center!

resp.text: Taryn knows her stuff!  Sounds like we are preaching to the choir.  Thanks Mason!

name: jackie smith
text: My mother went here for glasses, both times she was not helped or even spoke to. She had to go to the front desk and ask for help after sitting waiting for over 20 minutes. Terrible customer service and very rude. Would not recommend.

resp.text: Jackie, please accept our apology on behalf of your mother.  We pride ourselves on providing excellent customer service and assistance. We are disappointed to learn that we failed to do so with your mother.  Can you tell us the day of the week your mother was in the office?  We will not tolerate this behavior from our staff.

name: slim whitman
text:
Only reason I gave it one star is because there was not a zero option, worst experience I've ever had. Been wearing contacts for over thirty years, have never paid a "fitting" fee. Basically, my contact prescription is being held hostage unless I pay an additional $65.00, after having a contact exam. I'll never step foot into one of these facilities again, and will quickly discourage anyone considering doing so. BTW, I had a contact only exam performed for less than the "fitting" fee, what a joke.

"Edit" Of course I used a different email than my actual email address, funny how you only addressed that instead of the "hostage fee" you charge in addition to the billed charges to ones' insurance. And no, I'm quite positive it was your facility (Muscle Shoals).

resp.text:
We have researched our appointments history and do not see a male patient with the last name Whitman for the past 6 months.   We hope that you mistaken our office with another.   If not, we are certainly sorry to learn that you feel this way about our practice.    It sounds like you've found a practice that suits you.  We hope that you will be happy there.  If we can be of service, please don't hesitate to call us.

Slim, we really aren't sure what to say at this point.  We do have an office in Muscle Shoals and we do charge a fee to fit a patient with contact lenses.  The fee is usual & customary.  Contact lenses are an option not necessity.  If you choose to wear contact lenses, you pay the fee to be evaluated.  We feel the same as you.  We aren't the right office for you.

name: Lafayette Mecham
text: What an incredible place! Beautiful office, great frame selection, and attentive doctors and staff! 👍👍👍I am bringing my entire family here.

resp.text: Thank you!  We make every effort to make each patient's experience with us exceptional.  We certainly appreciate your kind words!

name: Jena Smith
text: The was every nice.only thing i don't like is how long i have to wait for my glasses .

resp.text: Jena, thanks for taking the time to send us feedback about your experience at our office.  We certainly appreciate your input!  We agree.  We don't like that patients have to wait for their glasses either.  Many insurance carriers now dictate which lens labs we can order eyeglass lenses from.  Your insurance is one of them.  If you want or need glasses sooner, we will gladly make you a pair in our in-house lab.  Insurance would not cover that pair but we can make them while you wait.  It will take approximately 1 hour.  Have a wonderful day!!!

text: They are very nice and everyone keeps a smile on their face. Love you guys, thanx for the hospitality.

resp.text: Mr. Smith, please accept our apologies for not offering our assistance.   Our front desk & optical staff pride themselves on providing excellent customer service.  We are certainly displeased to learn that we didn't perform our jobs well for you.  We would love an opportunity to regain your trust and confidence.  Please accept our most sincere apologies.

name: Richard Herron
text: Our family has been using Alabama Family Eye Care for several years now and we could not be more pleased. Dr. Curl is amazing! My 9 year old just had his first “official” eye exam and even he commented on how nice Dr. Curl and her staff treated him. I would highly recommend this practice if you are looking for a doctor who will treat you like a person and not just a number.

name: Mary Waldman
text: I ended up in Dr Curl's chair with a piece of dirt in my eye. I'm so happy I did because she's a wonderful doctor who removed it quickly and painlessly. Her office staff is professional and efficient and the office clean and attractive. Everyone observed correct hygene which I appreciate.

name: Sam Addy
text: Dr. Curl and the staff at Alabama Family Eye Care have seen to the eye health of my entire family for years, in my case at least 15 years.  They are always caring, courteous, knowledgeable, and professional.  I have recommended them to others and will continue doing so.  They are just great.

name: Jerry S
text: Dr Curl is one of the very best. My entire family has used her for 16 years. Their office is top notch, service from staff is outstanding and Dr Curl is a true professional. I highly recommend them.

name: Jennifer Sinelnikov
text: Very knowledgeable staff. Everyone wearing a mask. Able to answer all questions asked. Very helpful!!!

name: Brian Barksdale
text: Dr. Curl is awesome! Very thorough exam and testing, and pleasant experience overall. She does a great job explaining everything along the way. Highly recommend!

name: Andrea Steed
text: Dr. Curl and her staff were extremely thorough, kind, personable and helpful throughout my entire appointment.  She made contact and glasses suggestions based on my lifestyle.  I felt like she and the rest of her staff was quick and efficient, but I never felt rushed.  I will definitely continue to receive my eye care here!

name: Paul Mascia
text:
Been a patient of doc Curl for 14 years. Enough said. Regarding the 1star rating: Yo! How about YOU checking coverage out with your insurance company BEFORE you call a doctor???!!!. 2star rating: I was there last month and yes it took 2 weeks to get my glasses...that' s exactly what they told me!
See you next year doc.

name: nkeiru obi
text:
I came here because of all the wonders reviews, but just as a few commenters have said, I was not impressed. They were unorganized in calling my name to be led to the back, they let someone go ahead of me who came after me and had an appointment later than mine.
The gentleman who did the preliminary questions of my eye care was apologetic, I appreciated this. I had the eye doctor with long brown hair...not sure if this was Dr. Curl, I’m not sure that I care anyway...  I found her to be passive aggressive, she attempted to sound sincere when I asked questions but she was rushing me. Looking back I think they were a little behind schedule... but I’m not sure that’s an excuse.
The collection of glassware was nothing to write home about, it wasn’t in style, I was under impressed.
It took a full 2 weeks for the glasses I ordered to come in, I’m not sure if this is really their fault, but worth mentioning....
Flashforward to about 3-4 months later these “new” glasses already broke. It was covered in my insurance for a replacement  but they still made me pay a $20 dollar processing fee. 🤭
Needless to say, I won’t be returning ...But I do want to be fair...so  why did I give 2 stars.. here’s why:
1. The eye doctor ( lady with brown hair) was thorough.. still abrasive
2. The girl who measured the glasses to my face after they came in was very polite, she seemed genuine in wanting to help me find a pair I liked, she was honest
3. They give free bottles of water and fruit snacks and mints while waiting

name: G C
text: I have been using Dr. Curl for several years and always have received great care and treatment.  Very thorough, explains every step clearly and plainly, and her staff is professional yet friendly.  Great place!

name: Sharon Grimes
text:
The Optometrists at Alabama Family Eye Care are the best in my opinion! As I have grown older I have more eye problems and they have helped me through them! The staff is the best also, very knowledgeable, warm and friendly! I'm very happy with Alabama Family Eye Care.

Sharon Grimes

name: Ron Baldwin
text: Prior to moving out of state, my wife and I used Alabama Family Eye Care for a number of years.  Both of us were very pleased with the care that we received.  When I located a new optometrist, she confirmed all of the same potential vision issues that Dr. Curl had been tracking for me.

name: Chainsaw McCulloch
text:
Look - 5 stars says absolute professionalism!!!!  I don’t know of any doctor that takes the time with her patients as much as Dr Kurl does.

The ability of the techs on the optical side are just the same. The attention is wonderful and complete. The part I love is if there is any problem (and I mean any problem) with the glasses OR contacts they always do it for free if something isn’t right.

name: Dougie Fresh
text:
I would give it 10 stars if I could! Amazing staff, beautiful and convenient location in Hoover. They treat you like family and that is very rare at a doctor's office. They walk you through everything and make you feel super comfortable the entire time. The techs are polite, informative and super knowledgeable. The prices are great too!

For those who are tired of being treated like you are just another patient, go here. I promise you, it will be the best decision you have ever made for your family.

name: Jennifer Patton
text: If you are looking for a great optometrist, your search is over.  Dr. Curl is fantastic in every way.  Beautiful office with the newest technology, competent, caring staff, and excellent time management are just a few of the things that that will impress you about this office.  Dr. Curl is thorough and makes me feel  confident that the health of my eyes are in good hands.  I wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: Elizabeth Zazueta
text: I am very happy with Dr. Curl & highly recommend her. I have a few issues she has been checking for me & I guarantee you she is very thorough. She does an excellent job of explaining test results, comparing last year's results to this year's & she makes sure to wait for you when she asks, "do you have any questions". I am fond of her technicians. They have always been very kind to me. I have never felt rushed. Picking out glasses has been fun. I just purchased another pair & I enjoyed being allowed to take my time & try on as many as I wanted. I never felt rushed. I feel she truly cares about my well being & that is what we all want. I highly recommend you go see Dr. Curl.

name: Donald Henry
text:
I've been a patient at Alabama Family Eye Care for the last couple of years.  My experience with the staff has always been exceptional and they make me feel like I'm part of their family.

Dr. Curl and Dr. Craig's exams are thorough, as they takes her time to make sure I have the best possible prescription for my contacts glasses.  Dr. Curl recommended a specific type of lenses for my vision and they are awesome!

The optical section has a great selection of fashion forward glasses and the optician did a great job in helping me find the right pair of frames for my personal style.

I will be a patient for many years to come!

name: Lydia Kirkland
text: I’ve been going here since I was in high school, I love the atmosphere and friendly nature of the staff. I never wait too long and if I have an emergency they always are able to fit me in. Great frame selection as well!!

name: Mary Horne
text: Dr. Curl recommended cataract surgery and also recommended a fantastic surgeon. She took care of my eyes post surgery . She is very very thorough and consistent. I trust her so much that I sent my son to see her. She has taken excellent care of his m as well.

name: Veronda Berry
text: Dr. Kurl always gets my prescription spot on. The staff is very friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. I would recommend Alabama Family Eyecare to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words!

name: Maria Fandetti
text: Last minute call for emergency appointment and took me right in. Excellent concern and care.

name: Betty MIMI
text: Excellent service. I appreciate the detailed information about my eye health.

name: Jolene Bernhardt
text: I arrived on time and was greeted by the friendly front desk staff. The wait was less than 5 minutes. I was immediately evaluated by a student doctor who was quite thorough. However, some of my numbers seemed to be incorrect. I waited less than 2 or 3 minutes for Dr Craig. She agreed the numbers weren't matching up to my previous visits. She performed her evaluation and we were thrilled to discover my pressure in both eyes had decreased significantly! Great news! She recommended I return in a few months for my regular pressure check. Checkout was quick and the staff was extremely polite and helpful. I couldn't be more pleased with my experiences with Alabama Family Eye Care.

name: Sherrie F
text: I've been seeing Dr. Curl for 18 yrs. She's the best eye doctor I've ever been to. Her whole staff is friendly and very helpful. Very nice office too. I would recommend Alabama Family Eye Care to anyone.

name: Matt Gray
text: Thanks to Dr. Curl & her amazing staff, I get fantastic eye care. They have all the latest technology to insure that I maintain great eyesight. The care here is excellent & should you need eye wear they have the perfect fit & style.

name: Marty Johnson
text: Great service and care

name: Joe Cory
text: We've had great care by their Ophthalmologists. They are good with kids, thorough, and do a good job of talking through any issues or questions we have. We recently had a billing issue, but their staff helped resolve the issue in a timely manner.

name: Terri K
text: I came to Dr Curl with multiple issues. She couldn’t have been more patient and helpful!  She answered all my questions throughly and didn’t make me feel foolish for asking them. A previous office visit to an ophthalmologist in Vestavia was quite the opposite experience. Thank you Dr Curl!

text: I've been a patient of Dr. Curl for over 10 years and by far the best and most thorough  eye care I've experienced. A warm, tremendous atmosphere that's comforting for all. Always great to visit and see Drs. Curl, Craig and the staff.

text: I came to Dr Curl with multiple issues. She couldn’t have been more patient and helpful!  She answered all my questions throughly and didn’t make me feel foolish for asking them. A previous office visit to an ophthalmologist in Vestavia was quite the opposite experience. Thank you Dr Curl!

text: Dr. Curl and her staff are warm and welcoming. A professional atmosphere, thorough examinations and complete eye care.

name: Bradley Isbell
text: The first question I asked them was do you accepted my type of eye insurance. After I made my appointment I asked them again to make sure. Well guess what? They don't. I wasted my time and lost money taking off of work because they clearly don't care about other people's lives/schedule. Thanks for nothing. You guys suck.

resp.text:
Bradley,

We apologize for our mistake with your insurance. We do accept your type of vision insurance, but the person who booked you was not aware that there are a few plans under that specific insurance that we are not allowed to accept (This is mandated by the insurance company, not us). We absolutely care about your time and schedule and sincerely apologize for our mistake.
